choices: Her mom wakes her up
She wakes up on her own
Something else
She wakes up in the night
1.content:
Wendy was sitting in her living room one night eating some chips when her parents came in.

"Wendy, we think you have gone too far." Her dad pointed out

"With what?" Wendy asked

"Dear, it's time to go on a diet. Your dad and I are worried about your weight." Her mom stated

Wendy's Dad took the bag of chips away from Wendy.

"What? 260 pounds isn't fat." Wendy cried

"Dear, that is pretty big. Even for an adult!" Her mom pointed out

Wendy poked her stomach. Then she leaped for the chips. She missed and slammed into the floor.

"That's it! Go to your room!" Her dad said sternly

Wendy went to her room, her belly jiggling up and down.

"Hmph! They suck. Having the nerve to call me fat!"

She turned out the light and got into bed.

"I wish every meal was junk food." She mumbled

She soon fell asleep. The next morning...
1.title: Wendy

choices: Wendy's mom leaves to go bring her more food
Wendy's mom leaves to go make her a lunch for school
Wendy makes a list of food she wants her mom to go get and bring her
11.content:
"Honey it's time to wake up!"

"Go away, I don't want to see you." Wendy replied. She was still very upset from last night when her parents told her about her new diet.

"But dear it's time for breakfast."

"I don't want to eat your low-fat cardboard of a breakfast." Wendy was actually starving, but was craving something more sweet than she knew what was waiting for her.

Wendy's mom giggled "Honey there is nothing low-fat in pancakes. I used real butter and pure maple syrup."

"What!" Wendy popped her head out from under her covers. She looked at her mom holding a big plate of pancakes that looked absolutely to die for. She sat up faster than a bullet and motioned for her mom to put them in her lap. Her mother brought them over with a smile on her face. "What about my weight? I thought I was on a diet."

"We were out of line last night sweetie, if you want junk food for every meal who are we to stop you."
11.title: Her mom wakes her up

choices: After breakfast Wendy decides she will go to school
Wendy decides to stay home and just eat all day long.
A week later...
111.content:
"are you serious?" Wendy asked in complete surprise
"yep, you can have junk all day ever day and if you get fat then we'll supply you with new clothes to fit as well. We decided that your happiness is all that matters and if you're happy being obese and living off of junk food then we are happy too" she smiled as Wendy looked at her mum in surprise, clearly something strange had happened to change her parents attitudes so suddenly, but then again she didn't want to complain, now she could live out her dream of gorging herself constantly on delicious fatty foods.
"thanks mum, that's so kind of you" Wendy smiled and gave her mum a kiss on the cheek and then taking the pancakes
"it's my pleasure" she smiled happily "now you stay here and eat your pancakes, we have more food for you downstairs. Then you can choose if you would rather stay at home and eat all day, or go to school"
"wait, i don't have to go to school now if i don't want to?!" Wendy said shocked
"not unless you want to, we just want you to be happy my dear" her mother smiled and then left her room to get her what would no doubt be even more high calorie, delicious tasting breakfast treats.
"I could get used to this kind of treatment" Wendy said happily and laid back in bed as she began to dig into the huge plate full of pancakes, covered in melted butter and rich maple syrup.
111.title: Wendy's mom leaves to go bring her more food

choices: After breakfast...
Later that night...
1112.content:
As she finished the pancakes, Wendy's mom came back into the room with another plate, this one loaded with cinnamon toast; her mouth watered at the sight of it, and she quickly swapped plates.

“I thought you could do with some more food before breakfast, you have been starving yourself lately.”

Any thought of a diet sped out of her mind as she gobbled down the food, crumbs falling onto her sheets. As she finished, she could smell more food coming from downstairs, and with the greasy plate in one hand, she walked down the stairs, to find the dining room table covered in breakfast treats – more pancakes, bacon, sausages, a huge omelette, a big box of chocolate cereal, stacks of toast – and more pans frying on the cooker....
1112.title: Wendy decides to stay home and just eat all day...

choices: That same night...
In Wendy's dreams...
11122.content:
After a whole day of gorging, Wendy got into her pajamas.

Wendy began to button her shirt, and found it fitting even worse then the previous night. When she finally buttoned it, her rounded stomach was bulging through the buttons, and the waistband was digging into her waist.

Wendy was getting into bed when her mom knocked on her door and opened it a crack. Her mom caught a sight of her daughter's rounded, doughy belly and smiled sweetly.

"Looks like someone is going to need some new pajamas soon!" She said and walked into Wendy's room. Wendy's eyes bulged when she saw what her mother was carrying.

A mound of chocolate chip cookies were on a large plate in one of her hands, and in the other was a large glass of 2% milk.

"I thought you might want a little snack before bed." Wendy's mom said.

Without a word, Wendy snatched the cookies and milk from her mother's hands and sat on her bed, gulping them ravenously. Wendy's mother left Wendy to the cookies, which were quickly disappearing. With every bite, Wendy felt her stomach stretch more and more.

When Wendy took the last bite of the cookies, there was a loud 'pop'! Wendy looked down and saw one of the buttons that was trying to restrain her stomach had given up, and now was across the room.

Wendy put the plate down and rubbed her hard, full stomach with her pudgy hands. It was noticeably bigger, even after a day. Wendy squeezed it gently and enjoyed the feeling of the fat under her fingers.

Full and satisfied, Wendy slept better then she had in days.
11122.title: Later that night...

choices: She goes back to bed...
She finds more food...
111221.content:
After only a few hours, Wendy woke up; her stomach, trying to ease itself out in between the buttons of her pyjamas, was rumbling. She put the empty plate aside, and tiptoed out of the room, heading to see if anything was available in the kitchen for a midnight snack. Quiet, trying not the make a noise, she silently moved through the hall and into the room.

Waiting for her on the table was another plate of chocolate chip cookies, the same as the last batch, with a note, “Thought you might be hungry in the night.”

She grabbed a bottle of lemonade from the fridge, sat down at the table, and hungrily devoured the cookies, crumbs flying out of her mouth. The buttons on her top were under even more strain with every bite; all too soon she was out of cookies. She got up, reached into a cupboard, and found three bags of crisps, and these went down in fistfuls with the last of the drink. Another look in the cupboard yielded a few more chocolate bars, which she greedily consumed.
111221.title: That same night...

choices: Breakfast!
Wendy Dreams
1112212.content:
Wendy's shirt creaked as she devoured the last of her food until the buttons finally gave under the strain sending all the one's on the bottom half of her shirt flying. She moaned and rubbed the now exposed skin on her enlarged gut.

Despite the enormous amount of food she had eaten she still felt she had room for more.

She went back to the fridge and took out a trio of pies and a gallon of icecream. Not wanting to heat up the pies she simply took several scoops of ice cream and put them on each pie until it was covered. Then she brought the first pie to her mouth and devoured it.

Despite just being taken out of the fridge the pie wasn't hard or uncomfortably cold and although she would have prefered it nice and warm she still liked the taste of this pie now identified as cranberry. She siftly downed the pie the ice cream and cranberry causing a mess on her face and pyjama shirt. After that she moved on to the next, lemon morang, then the last one, blueberry.

She groaned and sat down in the kitchen chair to let her rub her belly. She looked over at the ice cream pail which still had some icecream in it and decided to finish it off.

She took scoop after scoop greedily gobbling up the creamy treat almost getting her face right in the pail.

When she was finally finished she put down the pail and pulled up her shirt fully explosing her swollen tum. She resumed rubbing it as it made it's digestive noises finally satisfied.

"I guess I should get back to bed if I want to be awake in time for breakfast."

She groaned as she got up off the chair and removed all the garbage she had created then went to the bathroom to clean up the pie and icecream stains from her face. Although slightly disressed about the ones on her shirt she felt that her mother wouldn't mind, not the way she was now and resigned herself to another blissfull sleep.
1112212.title: She finds more food...

choices: Mom comes back with more
Later
11122121.content:
The smell of food woke Wendy from her sleep and she opened her eyes dreamily just in time to see her mother enter her room with a trolly stacked high with coiled sausages.

"Good Morning", her mother greeted. "Start on this while I get more."

"More", Wendy murmured dreamily.

The instant her mother left Wendy reached out and grabbed the sausage coild and began to slurp it up. She quickly realized that it was all one long coil and she would be able to consume it all with minimal effort.

Soon after her mother returned with two more trollies and moved one on each side of her. The one on her left was stacked high with muffins and toasted bagels while the one on her right had towers of buttered toast and biscuts.

"I'll be back with more later," Her mother said.

Wendy quickly began grabbing items from both trollies and shoving them into her mouth while still slurping up the chain of sausages.

She kept up a rapid pace of shoving food into her mouth and sucking on the sausages until all three trollies were simultaneously empty and her belly had enlarged to the point where it was forcing her legs apart and lying on the bed between them.

Patting her food laden belly contently she smiled.

"I'm loving this."
11122121.title: Breakfast!

choices: Lunch
Dream
111221211.content:
Wendy's mom returned shortly afterwards.

"Finished already?"

Wendy simply nodded in response.

"Alright then I'll just get these carts out of here and be right back.

Wendy smacked her lips and rubbed her large gut eagerly. She couldn't wait.

Just five minutes later her mother returned with two more trollies packed with treats. The first trolly was stacked high which at least two-hundred donuts, eclairs and assorted pastries. The second trolly contained a pitcher of water and tarts piled nearly as high as the other cart.

The meer sight of it all made Wendy drool and she licked her lips in anticipation.

Her mother moved the trillies so that one was on each side of her bed.

"Dig in Wendy. I'll be back later."

The second her mother left Wendy attacked the trollies in a ravenous frenzy, shoving half a dozen pastries into her mouth at a time.

The huge pile of pastires quickly evaporated as Wendy steadily devoured them and stuffed them into her tightly packed belly.

When at last she had emptied both carts of food she grabbed the pitcher and tipped it until its contents poured into her parched gullet.

She smacked her rehydrated lips and placed the now empty pitcher abck on the cart.

Suddenly she felt a pressure in her belly and realized that the pastries were absorbing the water and swelled another full inch strait out before it subsided.

She sighed in relief and layed back on her bed to go back to sleep and let her feast digest and turn into fat. Although she did like the feeling of a big full belly she cared most about eating so the more room in her belly the better.

She tried to cover herself up with her sheets but her bloated gut took up too much leaving her feet and shoulders exposed. At first frustrated she started to admire the large mound of flesh that was her belly and smiled. She felt a great sense of accomplishment.

Settling back down she ignored the lack of coverage and drifted to sleep eagerly awaiting lunch when she would eat more.
111221211.title: Mom comes back with more

I was and asked if she would join me and she said yes so they dove right into the food...Time pass...

choices: Piles of food for Wendy.
Something else.
11122121112.content:
Two weeks had passed, and Wendy had grown so large, she'd outgrown her bed. It seemed each day she was fed more and more, and just kept gaining weight.
Eventually, Wendy stopped sleeping and just kept eating and eating. Her clothes were too small for her, but it wasn't like she was expecting to leave or get company anytime soon.

It was noon, so Wendy's mother would be bound to come up with her lunch any time soon. When her mother did come up, she was carrying...
11122121112.title: Two weeks!

choices: Follow along for the next week as Wendy keeps binging
Skip ahead to the day of the tryouts
111221211122.content:
When Wendy's mother came up to her room she was wheeling in the first of what would be many trollies of food, but she also had something else.

“Wendy, you won't believe this!” she said, excitedly. Looking up from her pizza (folded in half like a large pita bread) Wendy saw her mother was holding an envelope and letter. “It's from the people at 'America's Got Appetite,' the top eating competition show in the country. I told them about your recent gains and how well you've been binging, and they say you should qualify for their show.”

Wendy, still unfamiliar with her mother willing to let her stuff her face to her heart's desire, had no idea just how different this world was from her own. A televised eating competition? Sounds awesome, the tubby teen decided.

“When” belch, “can I be on it?”

“Don't get ahead of yourself,” her mother chuckled. “There's a tryout next week, and if you impress the judges you'll be invited onto the show later this year.”

“What do I have to do?”

“Don't worry your head about it,” her mother replied, “I'll take care of everything. All you need to do is keep eating and stretching out your stomach.”
111221211122.title: Something else.

choices: Both were much skinnier than Wendy. Looks like this'll be a piece of cake!
Both are about the same size as her.
Both are much fatter than Wendy. Has she lost already?
1112212111222.content:
When the day of the tryouts came Wendy's mother woke her up bright and early so she would have enough time to wash up and get dressed in the multiple-XL suit her mother had bought for her. Made of stretchy material, the blue and gold onesie hugged every roll of fat and disappeared into every crevice on her body.

“Look at how fat you've gotten,” her mother said. “If it were up to me you'd already be on TV, showing those women how to truly gorge.”

Wendy certainly was fat. Swollen to over 500 pounds in just three weeks, the girl she had been was unrecognizable under the pile of belly-centric blubber she was now. Wendy wasn't sure she had seen anyone as fat as her.

The drive to the tryouts, almost two hours on the highway, was the hardest part. Wendy's mother, worried about her daughter stuffing herself before the big moment, only stopped for food twice, and even then she limited her daughter to two large combos and two extra-large milkshakes. By the time they reached the arena where the competition was being held Wendy's stomach was crying out for food. Hunger had become a foreign concept to her, almost unbearable after being able to let loose so much.

Once they had parked Wendy's mother helped her behemoth daughter to the registration area, Wendy huffing and puffing after weeks of inactivity. Standing at the table where her mother was filling out paperwork, Wendy detected the faintest aroma of food coming from behind the double doors to her right. She almost had to stop herself from following her nose, and as she and her mother had to wait another ten minutes before being called time almost came to a stop. When her name was finally called Wendy was ravenous.

Following the headset-wearing intern to the double doors, Wendy found herself in a large room in front of three judges. A couple banquet tables covered with food were between them and her, with three chairs on her side. It took remarkable restraint for Wendy to not rush the tables and begin chowing down, but a sudden attack of nerves as three pairs of eyes stared at her kept her in check.

Wendy was directed to a chair and told not to start eating yet, and once she was seated two other contestants were brought in. One man and one woman, Wendy sized up her competition.
1112212111222.title: Skip ahead to the day of the tryouts

choices: Wendy won all three matches, and had to compete in the final round.
Wendy did well until the third round, where she was too full to continue.
11122121112222.content:
It seemed as if she'd have fair competition, as the other contenders were nearly the same size as her.
"Good luck; You'll need it." One said to her, threateningly.

"Welcome to America's Got Appetite, we've got a few new faces out there, so why don't we start with introductions?" The host announced.
The first girl, wearing a belly shirt and ripped pants, stated, "I'm Tabitha, I'm 13, and weigh over 850 pounds!"
The next girl, who was wearing a rather revealing dress, stated after Tabitha, "I'm Alice, I'm 16, and over 900 pounds!"
Finally, it was Wendy's time to speak, "I'm Wendy, I'm 15 and weigh 950 pounds!"
"Well, we'll be seeing their weight explode in size by the time this competition is over, I'm certain! Now, moving onto our judges..." The Host then gestured towards the Judges, which were now illuminated by the Spotlights.
"Same with last season, we have Daniel Richardo, Harriet Maldery and, one of our old champions, Fredrick Harswick!"

After the Judges made their introductions, the rules were explained.
The first round would consist of seeing how much the competitors could eat in 1 hour, while eating average, regular desserts.
Second round would have more fattening foods, but would only have 30 minutes to finish it all.
Third round would consist of the even more fattening food, but with only 10 minutes to finish.
Final Round would take the two who ate the most, and the one who persisted the longest would win.

The bell rang, and the competition began.

A burping contest

World record broken bottomlessly rich!!!!

Her belly button pop out for the world to see so had her mother who was still going and this contest continued for about 8 hours there bellys where filled to leaking with soda and then they waddled out side and than her mother burped causeing a small tremor to happen shaking the soda inside her stomach was making bobbles 20 inches long and than BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPpppppppppp!!!!!!!!!!!!
1112212122.title: A burping contest

choices: Be Careful What You Wish
Ignore It
11122122.content:
Wendy dreamed that she was a fairly large princess, seated in front of her throne room, wearing an over-sized white dress. A servant from the other end of the room, banged the floor with a scepter, and the big oak doors slowly opened.

To Wendy's surprise, it was a multitude of servants carrying sweets, and treats of various degree. Wendy just wanted to get out of the chair and rush for the food. But a servant blocked her with his arm stretched out in front of her; he shook is head soon after.

Wendy was confused, and more importantly, hungry.

As the carts and trays holding the delicious food stopped before her. The servants brought them to her one by one, and in a quick flash, Wendy devoured them in no time at all. Although she didn't see it, there were carts and trays running out of the door, including out of the castle, and onto the village nearby. This was Wendy's day!

As she ate, Wendy thought to herself of being the biggest princess in the land. The biggest... princess... in... the land? A look of concern came over as her mouth was full and messy.

She didn't have to worry about this though any longer as the alarm on her clock beeped loudly. Wendy moaned and groaned as it was time for another day of junk food in the real world. But that thought still came over her...

Is there a limit to how much she could eat?
11122122.title: Wendy Dreams

choices: First period
Skip to the end of school day
111222.content:
In Wendy's dreams, she found herself on her bed, just waking up to a new day.
But there was something different about her.
Wendy looked down and saw that her gut was almost down to her knees, her ass was as wide as her bed, her legs were chunky mounds of soft fat (as were her arms), and her breasts were far bigger than they had ever been.

With some difficulty, she gets out of her bed and waddles to her closet. All of her clothes were huge one-size-fits all sweatpants, sweat shorts, and shirts with her all girl's school name on them."Oh my god, I'm huge!!!"
"Wendy, come downstairs, you're going to be late for school!"
Wendy put on her sweat shorts and shirt, but no shoes.

Wendy reluctantly goes downstairs to see a huge spread of breakfast on the kitchen table. Her mother comes out of the corner, as big as she it.
"Well come on Wendy, dig in!"
Wendy sits down and digs in to mounds of pancakes, waffles, french toast, bacon, and milkshakes. She is nervous, but having too much joy in eating to say anything.
After piles and piles of food, Wendy cleared her plate off, feeling full.

"Alright Wendy, off to school!"
Wendy got out of her chair and waddled toward the door.
"Not that way silly! The school gave you a scooter for a reason!"
Wendy looked to the corner of the kitchen. There was a rascal scooter with an extra wide cushioned seat, a leg rest, a cup holder, and a pouch on the side with snacks. She sat down in it. It was practically a recliner on wheels. It had the words "Lazy Chair" on the side. She didn't even have to move a finger, it just drove her out of the door and to her bus stop, where all her friends sat on their own Lazy chairs in the same outfit as Wendy. They were all just as fat as her. And none of them had shoes either. Well, they didn't really need shoes because their chairs would keep their feet off the ground.

The bus came and they all got on and went to school.
It was then she realized this was no dream.
111222.title: In Wendy's dreams...

choices: Go to McDonalds for lunch
Try out the new 'all you can eat' place
Stay at home and watch TV
1113.content:
The week had gone in a blur of sugar, chocolate and grease. Wendy was lying in her bed, dreaming, as usual, of mountains of delicious food, when her mother gently woke her, rubbing her belly through the sheets. As her eyes slowly opened, she saw her mother was carrying her usual platter of pre-breakfast treats – a stack of pancakes glistening in butter, a huge pitcher of creamy milk, and a stack of peanut butter sandwiches. The tray was placed down at her side and she eagerly began to tuck in, shovelling the food into her mouth. After five minutes, the food was gone, but she was still hungry; she pulled open a draw on her bedside table and reached in, her fat fist pulling out a handful of candy bars. She eagerly unwrapped them, pushing them into her mouth and chewing on the chocolate and caramel.

“Breakfast!”

About the only thing that could convince Wendy to move quickly was food...she slid out of bed, still holding a candy bar in her hand, and waddled towards the door. The week had an obvious effect on her; her pyjama top was bulging at the seams, and a trace of belly could be seen reaching over her waistband. Moving through the door, she shoved the candy bar into her mouth and dropped into her seat. A huge platter, loaded with bacon, sausages, fried bread, and eggs was placed in front of her, along with a large fork; she eagerly began to dig in. A large bottle of coke was placed by her side that she took swigs from in between bites. As the tray began to empty, she gasped out, “More, Mom!”

“Wait honey, before I bring over your cereal, what do you want to do today?”
1113.title: A week later...

choices: Afternoon Nap
Visit to the Supermarket
11131.content:
In between mouthfuls, Wendy spluttered out, “McDonalds”, sending small pieces of bacon flying across the table. After she had finished the last of the food on the table, she pushed herself up, took a last swig to finish off the bottle of Coke, and went back to her room to change; her mother was already out getting the car ready. Eventually she staggered into a pink tracksuit, which revealed a sizeable muffin top; she grabbed another handful of chocolate bars to eat on the journey.

The trip took a long half-hour, and she eagerly anticipated lunch; at this point Wendy could not conceive of not being full, and patted her eager belly expectantly. She walked into the shop and up to the counter, and began to order.

“Er...four Big Macs, a dozen McNuggets, make that two dozen, make that five Big Macs, with three milkshakes, and supersize it!”

She pushed the cash over the counter, with her mum simply ordering a few McNuggets, and was rewarded with a tray loaded with the greasy food she loved. She dropped the tray on a table and began to pig out, stuffing fries into her mount with a snorting noise and gobbling away at the burgers, in between slurps of milkshake. She did not notice the attention that she was getting from the rest of the customers, nor noticed that her top was rising up over her belly. She gasped for breath after her third burger, but went back to finish with a resounding belch, and patted her now full belly happily.
11131.title: Go to McDonalds for lunch

choices: Enter the mansion...
See wakes up...
111311.content:
Stopping off briefly to buy a half-dozen candy bars and a packet of crisps, Wendy made her way back to the car, and sat herself down in the back seat. The smooth ride lulled her gently to sleep, her mouth filled with chocolate, and her hand patting her contented belly, and she began to dream.

She was no longer in the old Toyota; she was now sitting in the back of a huge limousine, a pink tracksuit straining to contain her belly – which was now somewhat larger than before, and could clearly be seen. By her side was a huge tub of popcorn and another filled with chocolate bars; to her other side was a row of buttons, each marked with the logo of a different fast food restaurant. She stabbed her finger down on the Pizza Hut button, and the limo started up, heading at high speed down the road.

She then noted a drinks fountain in front of her, and some litre-sized plastic cups in a holder. She pushed a tab, and cola came flooding out of it. She filled the cup to the brim, and started to drink it down in quick gulps. After a few minutes, the limo stopped, and the window came down – to reveal a Pizza Hut attendant bearing five pizza boxes. Wendy eagerly snatched them, and the window quickly wound up. Each was hawaiian, her favourite, and she hungrily began to scoff them down. Tomato juice and melted cheese ran down her double chin as she gnawed away, but within only a few minutes, she found that she was on her third pizza. She quickly stabbed the 'Taco Bell' button, and the limo speeded on again.

She had just run out of pizza, and let out a loud belch that sent the fabric of her tracksuit vibrating, when the limo pulled up again. Wendy dumped the boxes out of the window, almost on the foot of the attendant who gave her a paper bag filled with a dozen tacos. She knew that this wouldn't last, so she pushed the McDonalds button almost as she started to eat, chomping away at one taco after another, sauce flowing onto her top, even onto her belly itself – which remarkably hardly felt full, though it was stretching the material a little.

Her greasy fingers slipped and hit the wrong button – instead of McDonalds, she was heading for home. She sighed, and chewed the last of her burgers, but after a few minutes, the windows came down and she was heading through some ornate gates, over which was written 'Wendy's', and a huge mansion lay ahead, as the limo crunched down the gravel.
111311.title: Afternoon Nap

choices: Sit back and eat...
Explore the mansion...
1113111.content:
The limo door opened, but before Wendy could get out, a motorized chair was pushed into position for her to sit in. Tired from her meal, she happily sat in the chair, and was surprised – but pleased – when a servant placed a huge bowl of chocolate mousse with a ladle on her lap. She began to gulp it down as the chair went down the drive, and her stomach began to slowly expand with the food.

When she entered the mansion, she gasped for breath, sending chocolate dribble flying through the air. To her right was a swimming pool filled with Coca-Cola, fizzing away as if inviting her in. To her left were hot plates spilling over with delicious food, and a dozen attendants with trays ready to leap into action. A huge chocolate fountain filled the centre of the room, and spread on every remaining surface were platters loaded with cakes, chocolates and sweets.

The chair moved forward to a large throne at the head of the room. While she was on her way, the empty bowl cluttered to the floor, and a pair of attendants brought up platters loaded with cream cakes and chocolate pies; she eagerly dug in, grabbing one with each hand. Sitting on the throne – which was huge – more attendants came forward – one with a tray filled with burgers, each of which went down in two bites, another with a dozen milkshakes which went down in a few gulps.

Her stomach began to rise like dough in an oven, and a large muumuu – extremely loose – was placed over her head, briefly interrupting her feeding. Four different attendants were holding up trays for her now, and her hands were becoming a blur. It no longer seemed to matter what she wanted – there was always an amazing greasy treat within reach. She began to get fatter and fatter, and could feel her old clothes tearing under the muumuu.

Two attendants then brought up an enormous cake, five tiers high, covered in chocolate sauces. One held up a cake fork, but Wendy just looked up in disbelief before grabbing bits off with her mouth. After a few minutes, even this was not fast enough, and she dived in with her face to grab anything within reach. All too soon, it was gone, and she lay back on her thrown, panting, as a dozen attendants waited to serve her more delicious food.
1113111.title: Enter the mansion...

choices: The Feast of a Lifetime
A Celebratory Meal
111312.content:
As Wendy sat back in her chair, patting her belly – which was now well and truly peeking out from underneath her T-shirt – she gulped on the last remains of her fourth Coke.

“That was great...let's go home. I don't want to miss my soaps.”, she said.
“I'm sorry...we need to pay a visit to the supermarket. We're almost out of food.”, her mom replyed.
“But...but...”
“Sorry, we gotta go...”

Reluctantly, Wendy got up from her chair and they made their way across the mall to the supermarket. She moved slowly, the large amount of food digesting in her jiggling belly, and entered the supermarket. This had become a nearly-daily visit for mom, but Wendy hadn't been here for a couple of weeks. As she reached for a trolley, she heard a fanfare over the speakers, and then a man in a suit came up to her.

“Congratulations! You are our one millionth customer!”
“Cool. What'd I win?”
“You have ten minutes to fill this trolley up. Anything you put in there is free!”

He began to pull out a stopwatch as Wendy began to salivate at the prospect. She poised herself for action, and made a mental note of the isles she was interested in.

“Go!”

She burst into action with a speed that surprised her, heading immediately for the confectionery section, pausing only to tip a couple of dozen bottles of fizzy drinks into the trolley from a side unit. Reaching up with her arms, she pushed boxes upon boxes of chocolate bars into the cart, followed by bags and bags of jelly treats. Two shelves were rapidly growing emptier as she made her way further up the isle, to pull huge bags of crisps into her cart. She had managed all this in just three minutes...

The sugar craze was upon her...she pushed her trolley, now half full, up to the bakery section, pulling a dozen and a half boxes of delicious doughnuts down, before reaching the fresh-baked section. Cakes, cream puffs, eclairs, dozens of such treats found their way into her cart, as she rapidly emptied out the section.

Still with three minutes left, she looked back at the biscuits section, quickly depositing a dozen bottles of milkshake into her cart. Tube after tube of biscuits found their way in, and the cart was becoming dangerously full. Only two minutes left, and she found herself in the frozen food section – junk food heaven. Dozens of pizzas, fried chicken, burgers, pies, chips, all the greasy food she could grab, and the trolley was heaped with produce as the stopwatch ran out.
111312.title: Visit to the Supermarket

choices: 4 weeks later(very fat Wendy and mom in burp to riches!)
6years later(Into a world where fat has move the world into the intergalactic age!
1113121.content: When they got home her mother went to action and made the food that was cold or needed to be baked or deeped fried or adding fatting toppings or fillings to them it took about 2 hours(With some help from 4 gallons of coffee and 3 bars of chocolate and some cola but she got it done it made her very hungry though)The table was to small for all the food so they got out a picnic blanket and put the food on it than it became the meal that Wendy or her mom would never forget.
1113121.title: The Feast of a Lifetime

choices: start of the contest
24 hours later
11131211.content: After awhile a big contest was made and the winners would be billionaires so Wendy and her mom enter the contest right away.
11131211.title: 4 weeks later(very fat Wendy and mom in burp to...

choices: The door goes; lunch has arrived.
Wendy's Dreams...
11133.content:
“Can't we order in? I don't feel like going out.”, whined Wendy. In fact, this had been the case for the last week; she hadn't left the house since her parents had had their change of heart. She dunked her spoon into a huge bowl of chocolate cereal, and started on her second bottle of Coke. As she finished, her mother left the house for a trip to the supermarket and to McDonalds; as the door slammed, Wendy began to scramble up from the table over to a cupboard full of snacks. She grabbed a chubby armful down, and wandered over to the couch; its springs protested as she collapsed onto it, punching the TV on.

She wasn't really watching it, and was far more concerned with the food in her lap. She scooped Pringles out of a couple of tubes by her side, and grabbed handfuls of Smarties. Empty wrappers were thrown over the back of the couch; once she couldn't see them, she didn't care any more. This continued for twenty minutes, and she popped the last Pringle and began to massage her swelling belly; it gave a loud rumble as she patted it with a sticky, chocolate covered hand. She began to drift off to sleep.
11133.title: Stay at home and watch TV

choices: She's beginning to think she is being fattened up...
One month later...
111331.content:
Wendy spent the next two hours watching television, grazing on a collection of snacks kept by her side. Still her stomach was rumbling when the doorbell rang, and she made her way to the door, sending a collection of wrappers flying. The door opened to reveal the pizza delivery guy – which whom she was growing better acquainted, lately – holding three pizza boxes. She grabbed them out of his hands, and mumbled a thank you as she closed the door, making her way to the kitchen table.

Stopping only to grab a couple of bottles of Pepsi, she dropped the boxes on the table and opened the first one. She wolfed down the first few slices, tomato and cheese running down her cheeks, the started to swig down gulps of Pepsi, giving off loud belches. She rolled up the last slice, and chomped away as it went into her mouth, giving off a sigh of satisfaction.

The second box yielded a Hawaiian pizza, which rapidly began to go the same way as the first. An empty bottle cluttered to the floor as her greasy fingers struggled to open another. Slice after slice went down, and her belly purred with satisfaction. Two slices at a time, the pizza went in.

Then the third box. She was gasping a bit at this point – horror of horrors, she almost felt full. A full meat pizza sat there, tempting her to dive into its cheesy goodness...and she just could not resist. Her hands reached in, grabbed three slices, mashed them together into a sandwich, and began to chow down. Three slices at a time, she could not resist any more, and belched her way through the last pizza. Her stomach had pushed her T-shirt up still more, and she slowly waddled to her room, collapsing onto her bed.

At that point, there was a knock on the door, and her mum walked in carrying four shopping bags – the contents of which she poured over the bed – dozens of chocolate bars, packets of eclairs, doughnuts, bags of crisps. Wendy rubbed her belly with glee...
111331.title: The door goes; lunch has arrived.

choices: Buys into her concern, and starts investigating her mother
Just a childish paranoia, goes right back to fattening herself up
1113311.content:
Wendy filled her curved cheeks with food, a smile on her face as she practically inhaled her snacks. She felt a slight pang in her belly as it was pushed to its limits, but that simply generated a strange sensation in Wendy, a pleasurable one, but strange nonetheless. What was this feeling?

Soon, she recognized it as indigestion.

"Hey, mom, hang on a sec," Wendy gulped, taking time out to relax her bowels.

"Oh, anything for you, my sweetie pie," her mother said, resting her hands on her daughter's shoulder. Her fingers pressed into her flesh, and, soon, Wendy came to realize something was a tad off about her touch. It wasn't like this was the first time her mother had rested her hand on her shoulder, but right now, there was just something strangely unsettling about her touch.

As though she were measuring just how much flesh she had on her.

Was her mother fattening her up? That was a silly idea, really. What reason would she have for trying to plumpen up her own daughter into a butterball? Was it perhaps to teach her a lesson for wanting sugary junk so often? That would seem a little extreme of a response, wouldn't it? Even so, it was odd how she'd magically just change her tune overnight like that. Or what if her parents right now were really lizard people disguised as human beings, fattening Wendy up just so they could eat of her flesh!?

...nah, that'd be stupid...

Even though, by eating her full she'd be playing into her mother's plans, assuming her paranoia had even a thread of truth behind them. Then again, maybe this whole ordeal was stupid. Probably was. She should just enjoy the environment.

Shouldn't she?
1113311.title: Conspiracy?

choices: In the night...
The next morning...
11133112.content:
She shrugged her shoulders, and continued to tuck into the feast. As her mother passed her the last chocolate bar, she was gasping for breath, but she managed to cram it in, chew, and then lie back on her bed. Her pants were struggling to contain her jiggling belly. She licked her chocolate-covered lips as she slowly drifted off to sleep, her hands – and her mothers – slowly rubbing her soft stomach, kneeding in the food as it rapidly turned into fat.

Some glorious smells woke her up a few hours later. She struggled to get out of bed, and waddled out of her room into the kitchen. Her stomach was rumbling, and strangely enough, despite her feast, she was starving; she looked at the clock in the hall to find that just three hours had passed. That wasn't right; where the flowers had been this morning, there was a bowl full of doughnuts. They looked so tempting, she couldn't help put eat one; it exploded in her mouth like a puff-ball of sugar, and she grabbed another one as she headed into the kitchen. The table was set for one, and her mother was frantically moving around between the microwave, grill and oven; the smells were amazing.

“Sit down, dear, I'll serve you now!”, Wendy's mother said.

Wendy sat down at the table, and grabbed a knife and fork; dropped in front of her was a tray filled with sausages, which she speared with her fork and shoved into her mouth; grease ran down her face – past her rapidly developing double chin, and down onto her already messy top. Five, six, seven, eight, all went into her mouth one after the other, each tasting better somehow than the last. There were still three left on the plate when her mother snatched it away, and she quickly forked one more. She felt a tearing sound as the seat of her pants began to gave way.

Placed in their stead was another platter, filled with cheeseburgers, all huge and loaded with toppings – onion rings, hash browns, but without even the slightest trace of salad. Wendy struggled to get her hands around the first of them, and struggled even harder to get it into her waiting mouth; there was an eruption of fat and grease, spattering across the table, as she took the first bite. And there were five of them to finish. She gulped and gasped her way through the first one, then reached down for the second, chewing and chomping the greasy meat down her throat. Once again, the plate was taken away before she had quite finished – she reached down and grabbed the fourth burger, hastily beginning to cram it into her mouth. She gasped a deep breath, and a button flew off her top, exposing more of her stomach.

Hot dogs! Two dozen of them! Loaded with onions and mustard. These went in one at a time, and she was almost able to slide them into her mouth. A little voice at the back of her head was telling her that she had eaten enough, to stop, but a louder voice from her greedy belly demanded more, More, MORE! Ten, twelve, fourteen; she had one hot dog in each hand now, but again they were taken from her before she was quite finished. The waistline of her pants gave out, and her stomach began to roll across her lap.

Placed in front of her now was a huge blancmange, made of chocolate, almost eight inches high and about as wide; it was about as big as her head. With a spoon almost as big as a ladle in her hand, she tucked in, shovelling the chocolate into her mouth in huge gulps, traces running down her chin, sliding down the grease from the previous courses. Wendy barely stopped to breathe, not wanting this to be taken away before she had finished, and she attacked it vigourously, while her stomach continued its march forward. Finally, she dropped the spoon into the bowl, hearing it clatter against the bottom, and sat back on her chair, gasping for breath. She held her newly-enlarged stomach in her hands, moaning slightly.

“You go and have a lie down, Wendy.”

She needed no further encouragement, and staggered back into her room. The doughnuts didn't tempt her this time, and she only had one on her way back to her bed. Running through her mind was a sense of triumph at having eaten so much, and other thought of just how big she was going to get if she kept on eating like this. She pushed open the door of her room – and found a tray of cupcakes waiting on her bedside table, calling to her...
11133112.title: Just a childish paranoia, goes right back to fa...

choices: More people bring her food
She sees a supermarket
111331121.content:
Slowly munching on the last of the cupcakes, Wendy began to drift off to sleep. Her belly was full, almost to bursting, but it felt right...she deserved all this...it felt right...

Wendy was walking down the street, a street that seemed vaguely familiar, but that she couldn't quite place. Everyone was looking at her, though; she strode down the street in killer heels, the latest fashions, and covered with jewels. A man walked out of a shop with a box of a dozen doughnuts – that wasn't right, they were supposed to be hers. She strutted over to him.

“Those are mine. Give them to me.”, she growled.

Without a second thought, he passed her the box and walked on. Gripping the box with one hand, she began to wolf down the doughnuts with the other. A street vendor walked past, with a tray of hot dogs.

“I want some of those. Make me four of them.”, she said.

Again, without a word, she was passed four hot dogs, loaded with onions and mustard. They went in, one after another. This was fun. Her stomach began to swell slightly. Looking around, she saw a McDonalds – a group of teenagers were coming out of the store with their food. Not theirs – hers!

“Give all that to me.”

They passed the food – five Big Macs, fries, and Cokes – over to her; she went back inside, sat down, and started to eat, tearing the burgers around. She began to grown again, her clothes expanding to encompass her. Letting out a huge burp, she reached over to the next table and snatched an uneaten burger from another customer polishing it off.

Sweets now. She walked over to a news vendor, and just began to help herself to chocolate bars, eating one after another. When – unusually – she came across one she didn't like, she simply threw it aside.

“Would you like my Danish, ma'am?”, said a old woman who walked over to her. Now they were getting the idea. She snatched it away and ate it in one, and looked down to see that her belly was getting larger and larger, as was the rest of her. She was growing fatter by the minute, and loved it.
111331121.title: In the night...

choices: Wendy had suddenly become skinny
Some of the people were beginning to bring Wendy food instead
1113311212.content:
Although weighed down by her now very large belly, Wendy managed to waddle her body towards the local superstore, in that dream-like way of covering a distance in no time without realising you'd done it. Along the way a few more passers-by must have offered her food, because her hands were full of donut boxes and candy. With one larger-than-life bite she ate all of it, but still felt unsatisfied, so she entered the store.

The lights were on, but nobody was home. The store was empty, and so were the shelves. Not a single bit of food anywhere to be found! Wendy started frantically searching, she was not hungry, but she wanted food. She wished hard for it, harder than she had wished for anything else. She strained to change the dream so that there would be food, but nothing happened, she was just standing in the middle of an empty store.

But wait! She saw movement out of the corner of her eye. She lumbered down to the aisle and saw that there was a person at the end of it, carrying food! Joyously, she ran after them, shouting out, "wait! That's my food!"

When she reached the end of the aisle and turned the corner she saw that the person was feeding somebody else. And that somebody else was also being fed by other people. A LOT of other people. Twenty, maybe thirty people were crowding around perhaps the fattest woman that Wendy had ever seen, and that woman was eating with pace and intensity and sheer volume that Wendy could only dream about (and, in fact, was only dreaming about). Wendy was about to question this obese blob that was being force-fed when she looked down and realised...
1113311212.title: She sees a supermarket

choices: a plain room with a single person in it
a plain room filled with food
11133112121.content:
All of a sudden, Wendy did not recognise her own body. She did notice it as her own, of course, but it was not the way she remembered it. She knew that her body had a large, full belly, which couldn't be restrained by tops. But now she had a flat stomach, and her clothes were baggy. It was ridiculous, it went against the natural order of the world! She demanded change.

"That's mine!", she shouted, snatching food from the hands of one of the feeders. She didn't know what food it was but she shoved it into her mouth, trying to make her belly bigger. "It's mine, it's mine" she shouted again. "I NEED it more than her" she exclaimed.

This was a disaster for Wendy. Food surrounding her but she could not have it, because it was somebody's elses. This dream had become a nightmare, her body seemed to be LOSING weight, her once plump, sexy breasts were disappearing to mere insect bites, her bones were starting to show, her stomach was so empty. With one last, intense, scream she declared "THIS FOOD IS MINE" and, with that, the dream shifted, and she was somewhere new...
11133112121.title: Wendy had suddenly become skinny

choices: Wendy's parents have bought her a year's supply of chocolate
There is fast food growing on the trees in Wendy's yard
111331121211.content:
It was just Wendy, a large white-lit room, and a short Asian man, sitting on the floor cross-legged. "Not many people find this place" the man said.

Wendy didn't feel like she was in a dream state. Of course this wasn't real but still something was strange. This seemed both real and unreal, at the same time.

"Let me explain a little," the man continued, getting to his feet. "There is no word in your language to explain what I am so I'll make an approximation. I am the concept of gluttony given a human form that can be understood by humans." He was standing up now, a little shorter than Wendy, and of very average size. He smiled at Wendy. "Oh yes, I am the concept of gluttony, yet I am not fat. Very strange. Very..." he paused.

Wendy was not able to speak, the dream-state was not allowing her. She wanted food but nothing emerged. It was just the two of them and the empty room.

"You wished so hard..." he continued. "You wished firstly to make junk food every meal, so it shaped your world around you so that your parents would believe giving you only junk food was normal. Then in your heart you kept wishing for more, not just food from your parents but now, in the dream-world for the food of others around you."

Wendy felt a shift in the dream again. She was waking up. She was going back to normality.

"When you wake up, things won't be normal, the man said, as his face began to blur. "Your desire has shifted reality. This was the right time. All those wishes of spoiled desirious children such as yourself have built up. You were the obese straw that broke the cosmic camel's back".

Wendy didn't understand what any of this meant but the reminder that she was obese cheered her a little as the dream finally faded away, and she awoke to find her parents faces beaming down at her.

"Wendy," her mother said, "you have to come and see this..."
111331121211.title: a plain room with a single person in it

choices: Wendy wanted help feeding herself
Wendy was sick of chocolate, she wanted some other food
1113311212111.content:
Wendy felt far too drowsy for cryptic games, but her parents were smiling broadly and encouraging her up, so Wendy pulled herself to her feet and got out of bed. She half shuffled and half was dragged by her mother's hand downstairs until they finally reached their destination. At first she believed she was still dreaming, but when Wendy reached out and touched the huge pile of candy that had replaced where the sofa had once been, she knew it to be true.

"This is all... all for me?" she questioned, worried about a possible trick.

"Yes of course", her mother beamed, the same smile fixed in place on her face. "We thought to ourselves, oh, we don't REALLY need all this furniture in the house do we? So we counted up how of it we had to sell to buy you a year's worth of chocolate, and that's what we did! I hope it's enough for you, my love"

Wendy gradually became aware that the two sofas, double-wide chair and two bean bags had been replaced by a fairly simple, but well-cushioned chair, that could just about fit two average-sized butts. Wendy had, of course, far surpassed average-sized, as her tight dressing gown and jiggling flesh reminded her at that moment, but she still fit pretty snugly into that chair. She examined the pile and discovered that her parents had bought her all of her favourite treats. And yet in the back of her mind, she found herself almost disappointed. Really, a year's worth? Sure, it was a huge pile, that covered a quarter of the entire living room and rose high towards the ceiling, hundreds of lbs worth of chocolate. But Wendy was salivating looking at the pile and her belly, despite still being full from yesterday, gave a huge groan of desire.

Using her arms to scoop up as much as she could carry, Wendy collapsed into the chair, which was quite comfortable around her swollen derriere, and began to snack with the TV on, in much the same routine that she had enjoyed for over a week now. She had quickly grown used to having her enormous appetite constantly catered to, and she wondered how on Earth she had ever managed to survive on so little as 3000 calories a day. Thank heavens for this sudden change of heart! In the back of her mind she was a little troubled by the strange dream that she could quite remember from the previous night, and also the fact that her parents were selling off their belongings in order to fund her superhuman consumption. But in those moments her eyes drifted back to that enormous pile of chocolate, and her greed overtook her. She wanted to eat it all, she imagined having a mouth and throat twice the size so she could eat twice as quickly. That was Wendy's thought process ever as she gobbled her way through a mountain of chocolate. "Not enough". "More chocolate". "Quicker". "More full". "More food". "More".

The hours began to pass in a chocolate-stained blur, during which Wendy came to the decision to tell her mother something very important...
1113311212111.title: Chocolate, chocolate and more chocolate!

choices: Go buy some new clothes
Go find more of those heavenly food plants!
1113311212112.content:
Wendy's parents helped her out of bed, and motioned her towards the door. She was still in her underwear, no bra and just a t-shirt that went down just about to her belly button. The family went out into the backyard and Wendy realised what the fuss was about. There were plants growing in the grass that had not been there before. And on the plants... food! Wendy couldn't believe her eyes. Fast food literally growing right in front of her. There was a plant with pizza slices hanging off it, another with chunks of chocolate cake, one with burgers, another with huge meatballs drenched in sauce... Wendy was in heaven.

She did hear her parents saying to her "we saw the news, apparently there are hundreds of these plants growing all over the world!" but Wendy paid only a little attention to them. She had already started plucking food from the first one, the burger one. She shoved a burger into her mouth... it was amazing! Had Wendy thought about it she might have realised that a burger plant growing directly from natural would be made of natural ingredients and not mass-produced with chemicals the way fast food chains made them. She didnt think that, though. She just grabbed a second burger and tried to fit that into her mouth whilst the first was still in there.

An hour later, breakfast was finished. She had emptied the plants of all the food on them and she was now sitting on her lawn with her fatty legs splayed out in front of her, breathing deeply as her swollen belly got to the work of digesting her meal.

"That was amazing," Wendy moaned to herself, resting a hand on her tight belly. "I need more, but I don't know how much my stomach can take. And I can barely stand up!" The obese teen took a minute to get herself together then hauled her body upwards to a standing position. The day before she had eaten a ridiculous amount, and her body hadn't dealt with that yet, let alone the huge breakfast. Wendy almost fell off balance as her heaving gut pulled her forwards.

Back in the house Wendy changed into proper clothes, but none of her pants would button up and none of her tops would cover her belly. So Wendy decided to...
1113311212112.title: There's fast food growing on the trees in the yard

choices: No people and lots of food plants!
Lots of people and empty food plants!
11133112121121.content:
Wendy got on the bus to the mall and looked around to find that several other people had clearly had the same kind of morning she had had. Lips were stained with grease, bellies were pushing out from underneath shirts, satisfied expressions revealed the sated bellies of a handful of the people who had been lucky enough to come across free fast food. Some skinny teenage girls at the back of the bus were looking around disgustedly, so Wendy decided to walk to the back and sit right next to them. Her flabby butt covered the seat and spilled over onto the girl next to her, who recoiled slightly, but didn't say anything. Wendy burped contentedly.

It was a struggle for Wendy to get up and walk around, not just because of the fullness of her belly and the thickness of her thighs, but also because her clothes were so tight around her, the pants especially causing her a lot of discomfort. Wendy's mum had confessed to setting aside a "food budget" for making sure Wendy was constantly fed, but with the food trees appearing, had given her a large wad of cash for spending on clothes instead. Wendy bought herself several tops in three different sizes, the largest of which looked like it was made for a whale but made Wendy salivate when she thought about how much food she would have to eat to fit into them. She bought herself a full new wardrobe and asked the store to deliver them to her home because of the number of bags. Wendy didn't want to carry a thing, it sounded like exercise! She did however put on a baggy red shirt and a pair of denim short shorts so as to get out of her old tight clothing.

As she was walking around the mall, Wendy was starting to notice people carrying food, donuts and burgers and pizza that all looked very similar to the ones she had seen that morning. Her stomach had, apparently, finished digesting all the food from yesterday and that morning, and Wendy begun to realise just how long she had spent at the mall. A whole three hours had gone by without any food at all, and Wendy began to feel an intense hunger swell from the pit of her belly.

"Excuse me," she said to a chunky blonde in her 20s who was wolfing down on some pepperoni pizza. "Can I ask where you got that pizza from?"

The blonde woman pointed to a fire exit nearby, not wanting to wast a second of eating time talking to a teenager. Wendy rushed off towards the exit, trying to find where the free food was. She felt a pain in her belly that was unmistakeably demanding. She was starving! Wendy had rarely felt such a hunger, she usually kept herself too stuffed to ever feel hunger like this. Maybe she was getting so fat that even a couple of hours without food brought out these pains.

Finally, after following the empty coridoor to the end, Wendy found a patch of grass with...
11133112121121.title: Go buy some new clothes

choices: she was so full, better go home
she was still hungry, find more food
111331121211211.content:
There was a patch of grass, a park bench, and surrounding the bench was maybe a dozen food plants, all of which looked untouched. The plants seemed to bend towards the bench, making it the perfectg seat for stuffing. Wendy was enthused by this idea, lazing on a park bench in the warm sunshine, stuffing herself constantly on food that was practically forcing itself on her, nobody to disturb her gorging, it was like a dream come true.

She parked her large rear down on the bench, and grabbed from the plant on her left hand side. Hot dogs, just like the ones she had dreamed about the previous night, full of onions and covered in mustard, the dog itself was huge and plump, and Wendy moaned as she slid it into her mouth and took a colossal bite. She finished it off in two more bites, and had already plucked another one off the plant and moved it to her mouth. She kept grabbing greedily at them, blissful in the sun, until she found she had emptied the plant's contents. It had been twenty minutes and she had eaten lord knows how many hot dogs and yet there was nobody about. It was almost eerie. Free food, out in the open like this, and so much time had passed with nobody around!

Wendy kept going, massaging her belly from time to time to free up some room in her stomach so that it could handle as much as she desired, which, as she already knew, was an almost unlimited amount. The time came, eventually, as it was approaching evening, when every plant was empty of food, all the pizzas and cakes and donuts and calories had finally ended up in Wendy's belly, and she looked down at herself, belly completely bursting with fullness, finally satisfied. She was huge and the shirt she had bought just earlier that day was now a snug fit rather than loose.

Her belly grumbled...
111331121211211.title: No people and lots of food plants!

choices: another extremely fat glutton
a whole forest of food plants
1113311212112111.content:
Although Wendy would've loved to have eaten more, her tastebuds and brain were alive with desire, her stomach simply could not take any more, not that there was any more to take. Wendy wasn't a math genius but did a few basic sums and come up with an approximation... she had eaten enough food for thirty meals! Well, Normal Person meals anyway, which is a completely different amount to Wendy meals.

But she felt fairly satisfied, and least a reasonable amount considering her epic gluttony. She would be sated for several hours. Well, two hours... maybe one...

Wendy had to take a deep breath and concentrate hard to be able to get herself to her feet, and even then she nearly fell right back down as her centre of gravity shifted around her huge full belly. She began to take pondorous steps, back the way she came, when she realised the fire exit was not empty. There was a group of people standing wtching her.

"Oh, er, don't get up," one of them said, a young-ish male with glasses. He walked over to her, took her hand and went to support her weight. "Sorry for this but, er, we want to help." He looked sheepishly at Wendy's puzzled expression. It was lucky for him that Wendy was full and had muddled thoughts or she may well have reacted worse to his intrusion.

Wendy was led back down the fire exit by a group of five people, each helping her take each step, one or two of them seeming to caress her flesh as they did so. It was a struggle for Wendy to form an emotional reaction to all this, it was creepy and weird but certainly less weird than fast food appearing out of the ground, and she really did appreciate the assistance in walking. As she walked, the guy in glasses was talking, nervously, it seemed, but sort of adoringly at the same time, in a way Wendy liked even if she didn't rally know what to make of the words coming out of him.

"...and when we realised what the plants were it started changing people, on the one hand you had people who become gluttons, who started gorging themselves on as much food as they could, and on the other hand you had people like us, who suddenly developed an obsession with watching people eat. I got here first, and I couldn't take my eyes off you. You ate like food was the air. That you needed it in you constantly just for survival. Just an excess of consumption that I felt attracted to without understanding why. Every now and again a person appeared, I would either turn them away or allow them to wtch you with me. We became..."

Wendy drifted in and out of the man's words as she was led down hallways and coridoors and stairs... had there been stairs earlier? As she was led on, in her food stupor she daydreamed of an endless line of servents carrying food plants, walking a long red carpet to a golden throne the size of a house upon which she sat, forever being fed huge quantities of food by adoring slaves, never having to lift a finger, queen of gluttony forever.

"Um..." Wendy began, before realising there was little she could think to say. She'd been led into a small simple room, with a few chairs and a single window, as if this were an old abandoned classroom. Seated on one of the chairs, or more precisely, two of the chairs, was a very fat woman nibbling on a chocolate cake. She waved to Wendy and swallowed the mouthful of cake.

"Don't be shy, please", she said, reaching into one of the many plastic containers that surrounded her seating. "I have some chocolate cake you can eat while we wait. It's got chocolate sprinkles on top of white chocolate icing and there's a layer of caramel icing and I think cherry liqueur as well." She took out a fist-sized slice and crammed it into her mouth. The cake looked decadent, until it was smeared all over the mystery woman's mouth, that is. There were food stains littering the top of her body giving Wendy the impression that she had been eating for a long time, but unlike Wendy herself, betrayed no signs of fullness.

Wendy introduced herself timidly, as the woman handed her a plastic container. "A girl your size at such a young age" the woman chuckled, "ah that takes me back to my youth. My name is Sydney, and maybe in ten years you can catch up with me." She took a bite out of the cake that made Wendy gasp. How could so much food fit in one mouth? How did she not choke? "Impressive, don't you think?" she winked, "I'm 450 pounds, I've always been huge but in the last couple of years I've decided, to hell with it, I may as well go at top speed. Food is the only thing that drives me into the next day. What is life about if not self-pleasure?" Sydney pondered to herself. "You're not eating your cake" she added at Wendy.

Not wishing to appear ungrateful in front of such esteemed company, Wendy began to nibble at the slice, ignoring the protestations from her midriff, but insisted to herself she would have no more. However, having idly chatted to Sydney about her day-to-day life, and school, and the miracle of these food plants, Wendy soon found had devoured four slices of cake and was unwrapping a fifth. Her gluttony was so uncontrollable she was consuming on auto-pilot, and the thought of continuing made her even more desirous for food. Unfortunately, once the fifth slice had disappeared into her monstrous, but now comparatively undistinguished, belly, the pair found that they had finished all available food.

"The guys promised us more food, you know", Sydney said, "What was it that they told you?"

"Oh, I have to confess, I zoned out a little," Wendy said blushing, "I'm sure they said something but I was, well, fantasizing at the time".

"Yeah, I get that a lot too. Well, what they told me was that they plan to...

111331122.content:
Wendy had dreamed of food; during the night she had savoured a thousand tastes, and in her imagination had devoured a hundred meals. Increasingly, food was coming to completely dominate her life, and she hugged her growing belly tightly while she slept. She woke up with a start, the room filled with a delightful combination of smells, all manner of deliciousness. Her stomach began to rumble, and her mom pushed the door open, bearing a large platter.

“Pre-breakfast for you, dear! Two stacks of pancakes, some jam sandwiches, some peanut butter sandwiches, and another pitcher of milk.”

Twice what she had eaten for pre-breakfast yesterday; her stomach rumbled in anticipation. The platter was dropped down on her lap, and she began to gulp it down. A fork loaded the pancakes into her mouth, two at a time, syrup running down her chin; another hand alternated between the jam and peanut butter sandwiches. Every few minutes, she took another gulp from the pitcher of milk. There was a slight creaking from her pyjama top, the buttons beginning to complain at the new strain they were facing. She ran her fingers across her chin to collect some of the syrup, and discovered her burgeoning double chin.

While she ate, her mom brought in another three bags of chocolates, crisps and other snacks, and piled them onto her desk and bedside table, before bustling out. Soon the smells from before intensified, and she hurried to finish her first snack. The last of the sandwiches was gone, and the last of the milk – somehow she was still hungry, though.

She stood up, and moved to the door – waddled would be the best word for it – slothful and filled with food. Outside, the hall table had a pile of eclairs – she grabbed one, gulping the creamy goodness into her mouth, before taking a second one. She was still holding it as she entered the kitchen, when her eyes boggled at what lay in front of her.

The table was once again laden with food. Bacon piled high on a plate, sausages on another; it looked like an entire pig had been sacrificed at the altar of her appetite. A stack of waffles filled another plate, loaded down with maple syrup, and a heaped pile of cinnamon toast covered another. Ten fried eggs were arranged around what looked to be a whole loaf of toast, all swimming in butter.

She sat down at the table, grabbed a large spoon, and began to shovel in the greasy, fatty food. Remembering dinner last night, she bolted it down, hardly even stopping to breathe; she was eager to eat every mouthful of the delicious food. Grease swam down her chin as she abandoned the cutlery to eat with her hands; she hardly noticed when her mom refilled the sausage and bacon plates after she had finished them, only aware that there was more food, more!

Her pyjamas gave up after the cinnamon toast; while the buttons held, the seams did not; the tearing noise barely registered; she was pouring a bottle of orange fizz down her throat at the time. All of a sudden, the food had run out; Wendy sat there, gasping for breath.

“Oooohhhh....”, she groaned.

“Go and have a lie down in the sitting room, watch some television. I'll bring in some snacks for you to much on while I get lunch ready.” Her mom said.

“More food?”, Wendy said, half interestedly, half uncertain.

“As much as you want. Just like we said, if you want to eat nothing but junk food, you'll eat nothing but junk food!”

Wendy waddled into their sitting room, where (unsurprisingly to her) there were trays upon trays of fattening treats waiting for her. She sat down, and the couch sank with her weight. She dug into her treats and they were gone within a matter of minutes. She didn't feel like watching television, so she decided to go up to her room.

"Lunch is in 15 minutes!" her mom called

Wendy entered her room and grabbed her scrapbook, which she thought was odd. She hadn't looked in it ever since the junk food thing. She started flipping through the pages. She looked at a picture of herself about a year ago. She weighed about 150 pounds back then.

Wendy put the book away and went into the bathroom.

"I haven't even checked how much I weigh now! I must be what? 230? 240?" She said to herself

She was wrong. 340. She was astonished. She had been gorging so much that she hadn't even noticed her gain. Her little belly had now turned into a massive 3-rolled behemoth of a gut. Was Wendy worried?

11133112211.content:
Wendy shrugged her shoulders nonchalantly. It wasn’t that much weight, she reasoned, and plus, what rich eatings she was having! Patting her massive belly, still glutted from her breakfast feast, Wendy waddled unsteadily into the kitchen where her mother was unpacking 5 incredibly greasy pizzas and bags and bags of Mcdonald’s treats, as well as a large stack of giant burritos. Wendy gulped greedily and plopped herself down onto the creaking chair with a loud *GLOP*. Giggling at her appetite and ravening hunger, she dove into the mountain of food without a second thought.

The pizzas were the first to go, Wendy giving them her classic treatment of mounting three at a time and shoving them into her mouth. all four meat-lovers pizzas rapidly disappeared into Wendy’s burgeoning gt, and she had to rest for a few minutes as this new feast slammed directly on top of her monumental gorging from breakfast. Wendy belched happily and chugged her second two liter coke and gave her gurgling gut a few heavy, happy slaps. Damn, pizzas were delicious, she thought, its too bad there are only four of them here. All the fattening greasy meat and cheese made her food-clogged heart just sing with joy. Wheeling back into a sitting position with soft gurgling emanating from her ponderously glutted stomach, Wendy resumed her lunchtime feasting.

The burgers, fries, chicken tenders and burritos, all topped off with mountainous trays of cookies and fudge and gallons of ice cream, passed in a food-induced blur for Wendy. She greedily shovelled more and more into her ravenous gullet as if her indulgent mother would take it away from her. Her overencumbered stomach compliantly spilled ever more gelatinous-ly over to her knees and her three mammoth tire rolls bloated out with gorging into a single massive, shaking, burbling spare tire of quaking lard. Finishing her meal finally by managing to shove two entire mammoth cheesecake into her belly (of course smothered in whipped cream) in record time, Wendy unexpectedly hiccupped loudly and she let out a thunderously rich and oversatisfied belch, allowing her superstuffed stomach to churn her fantastic gluttings in weary, resigned indigestion. Leaning back tiredly in her chair, Wendy gave another unexpected hiccup and wearily patted her giant belly woozily: “HIC...UUUURRRPPPP...oooooofff That was good, Mom! Damn I can’t believe I ate that much...HIC...even two cheesecakes. TWO, mom! That was unbelievably rich, but I feel like my belly’s gunna bust...BUUURRRPP HIC HIC.” Wendy’s mother smiled indulgently: “I’m glad you liked it dear. I gotta go shopping to get stuff for dinner, remember last night? That’s going to happen again. Go to the couch and lie down and I’ll bring you some snacks before I leave.”

Wendy hiccupped again and squealed: “HIC...eee! more food? my belly’s favorite thing...HIC!” She delightedly struggled to heft her newly-grown form out of her chair and she carefully plodded to the couch where she collapsed with a thunderous *GURGLE GLOP*, punched the remote, and slowly wheeled her overgorged form into a reclining position and immediately jiggled her churning gut happily to make room for more food. Grabbing as much of her lard-filled gut as she could, she sloshed her rich eatings back and forth in a slow wave-like motion that calmed some of the churning indigestion in her superswollen stomach. Wendy’s mother wheeled in her trolleys of treats and left the house, saying: “Bye Wendy, enjoy your afternoon of gorging!” Wendy’s eyes glinted greedily as she stuffed a quarter of a cheescake into her mouth. She certainly would.

Slowly, but surely, Wendy's large tummy grew even larger as the days went by. She eventually settled into a routine of meals:

First, her mother would bring up a pre-breakfast platter that only grew in size as Wendy did. She'd eventually make her way downstairs for the main breakfast feast before sitting in front of the television, snacking on various cookies, candies and pastries to tide her over until she had a brunch that easily matched the size of breakfast. After a very large lunch, consisting of things like nachos, pizza, fried chicken, etc., she would watch some more television while building up her appetite for very large 4-course dinners, which included things like steaks, lasagna and turkey before digging into a veritable dessert buffet, which was made up of mountains of ice cream, piles of pies, and hoardes of cakes.

All throughout the month, her mother only had a serene smile plastered on her face as she served her daughter all of these fattening meals. After outgrowing the last of her wardrobe at the end of the first week, Wendy decided to keep a diary tracking her weight gain, jotting her first weigh-in at around 190 lbs. The numbers only continued to climb during the month.

After eating the usual pre-breakfast feast, Wendy detoured to the bathroom to check her weight on the scale...

11133112221.content:
She looked down at the scales in mild disbelief; the needle stopped around the '300' mark. She looked at herself in the mirror; an almost perfect pear shape looked back at her. Double chin wiggling, with a few greasy stains left over from breakfast, huge belly sticking out, jiggling slightly under her too-tight sweat top, huge butt, and wide legs. She sighed, stepped off the scales, and waddled into the TV room, plopping herself down on the couch. Next to her was a big bowl of popcorn; she turned the TV on with one hand to one of her Spanish soaps, while taking gulps of popcorn with her other hand; some kernels dropped out of her mouth, leaving greasy marks on her top.

“Fancy a little snack, dear? Brunch will be about half an hour.”, her mom said, as she dropped a couple of bags down beside the popcorn, already almost running out.

“Half an hour? That's ages.”, Wendy whined. She reached into the first bag, coming out with a box of doughnuts; more jam and cream, little sugary bombs dropping into her stomach. She began to daydream of having as much food as she wanted, whenever she wanted – trays and carts of it, brought forward by servants to feed her ever-growing belly. All she ever thought about was food, nothing else seemed to matter.

The doughnuts ran out while she was having her daydream, but she mechanically switched to the other bag, filled with chocolate bars. She unwrapped them with one hand while eating them with the other – chocolate, nougat, caramel, a dozen different flavours. Twenty chocolate bars disappeared, and she was – at least temporarily – sated, and began to concentrate on her show. She could already smell cooking from the kitchen, and another little feast would soon be hers. But she wanted a big feast, huge rooms filled with food, and all for her...

The radio began to play, music dying away to an announcer reading something out. Just news. As long as the price of sugar didn't go up, why should she care? After a minute, she realised that the sounds of cooking had stopped, and she heard running footsteps.

“Wendy, it's amazing! We've won the lottery! Fifty million, and all ours! I just checked. And it's all going in that belly of yours!”

Her dreams were getting a little closer...
11133112221.title: 300 lbs,,, yeah, she's fat, and then some.
