Going on holiday in the morning...
111331122211.content:
The month had flown by. The old house was a distant memory; the new villa had its own private beach. And two kitchens, which was most important – and four chefs, which was even more important. Only just up the road was a huge food court, one of the best Wendy had ever seen. A month of non-stop eating of the most fattening foods she could find; she'd gained two pounds from the celebration binge alone. Nothing but the best, and all she could eat!

And it showed. Wendy lay sprawled on a divan, her three chins jigging as she pushed in chocolate after chocolate from a silver tray laid by her side. Her huge belly sprawled outwards, almost off the divan – another, larger one was already on its way – and her flabby arms bulging out of her velvet top. Legs almost seeming useless, covered in fat. Around her fat neck were a dozen necklaces, with precious jewels mounted; a diamond-studded tiara was perched on her head. Not that she cared about the finery at the moment. Pictures of feasts stared down at her from all the walls. A clock ticked down to her next meal.

She had fallen into a new daily routing fairly easily. Pre-breakfast and breakfast were served in her palatial bedroom, her four-poster bed designed to make it easy to get platters of food in and out. The two meals were increasingly running into each other. Brunch she had on her divan, usually. She had lunch in the huge dining room, at least three fattening courses. Afternoon tea would be back on the divan – she was waiting impatiently for this now – and dinner and supper would be in the dining room again. With snacks throughout the rest of the day, of course; the servants scattered platters of sweets around the villa for her to eat wherever she went.

It was a hot day, and still half an hour till her next meal – she had raced through lunch today – and so she decided to head for the pool. She quickly changed – she looked like a huge stuffed sausage in her bathing suit – and then slowly waddled outside. On her way she stopped for a pile of bonbons, taking the platter in her hands and dropping it to the ground when she was done. She stepped into the pool, and reclined back onto an airbed; the bed dropped precariously as her bulk fell onto it.

One of her maids, also in swimming costume, came out with another try of snacks – mostly cream cakes. Wendy grabbed the first one, and shoved it into her mouth greedily, and quickly followed by a second. A large eclair this time, oozing with cream that ran down her flabby fingers. She licked it off, more and more for her belly. Lying there in the sun – another tray of food already on its way out to her – she was in a palatial heaven of food. But the best was yet to come...
111331122211.title: A life of excess...

choices: OK, what's going on?
Another month like this!
11133112222.content:
Wendy staggered off the scales, hardly believing what they read – 401 pounds. Her food-dazed brain could hardly comprehend how much she had eaten, but that was the definite figure. She slapped her huge belly, hanging down with an enormous muffin top, before waddling back into the dining room for another mammoth day of eating. The day passed by in a blaze of food, junk food all – no pretense at health food was allowed anywhere near her. Soon it was time for the highlight of the day, dinner.

She collapsed on her chair in the dining room like the mountain of blubber she had become, and grunted for her food. The greasy, calorie-laden grub was dropped in front of her – two plates of fried chicken, and another loaded with links of sausages. A big basket of french fries. No knife or fork were present; Wendy just dived into the food with her hands. She took a huge bite out of a piece of chicken, licking her fingers clean, while a fat fist dived into the french fries. Grease ran down her chin.

Her stomach rumbled as the second course was placed in front of her. More fried food – three sirloin stakes, half a dozen pork chops, half a dozen eggs. Again she dived in with her hands, dropping the bones to the floor when she had finished, eagerly diving into the next piece of fried meat. Half way through, the steak plate was refilled; she must have eaten half a cow by the time she had done. Her top began to ride up again, exposing more of that flabby belly.

The third course – lasagne. Served in what was almost a small trough. Garfield's delight, she joked to herself. This time she needed a spoon, and she had one almost as big as a ladle. There was no time to really taste it, she just focused on shovelling it into her mouth – pasta, meat, tomato and all. Three baguettes of garlic bread were placed on a side, and she dunked it into the rich sauce, taking big gulps. A straining noise could be heard from the seam of her pants, trying to contain her growing fat ass.

The lasagne was gone. Time for dessert. Still her favourite part of every meal, so she'd told mom to make it part of every meal! This came in courses just like everything else. The first course was three cakes – chocolate, strawberry and vanilla, loaded with cream and oozing with food. With her hands she began to shovel them in, alternating bites to mix up the flavours, taking occasional swigs of fizzy drink. Two side dishes contained pastries – mostly eclairs, but stuffed with lots and lots of cream.

Then the final course – a mountain of ice cream. Must have been forty scoops, with a dozen different flavours. This would have to be eaten quickly, it was already starting to melt! Ladle first – shovelling the cream in, getting a periodic brain-freeze but ignoring it for the delicious tastes. Then she began to shovel it in with her hands, digging out huge scoops and pushing them into her throat. Finally, as the mountain became a hill, she simply dived into it with her face, gulping it down in huge bites. She lay back on her chair, gasping for breath, holding her belly with her hands. She panted, to look up and see her mom with another platter, loaded with sugary treats.

“More?”

Once she finished, the voices in her head screamed in protest, but her stomach felt happier...and then the door opened, and a second trolley came into the room, laden as heavily as the first.

She snatched slice after slice of heavily buttered toast from the platter, daubing them in honey, jam and peanut butter, mechanically consuming every crumb on the plate. Then cereal – but the most chocolatey cereal she had ever seen, turning the full fat milk brown as soon as the first flakes touched it. A small trough of it went into her mouth, shovelled in with a small ladle. She was gasping for breath, and only two buttons remained on her pyjamas. Sweat beaded up on her brow.

She lay back on the bed again, deeply breathing in and out. Both her hands were on her stomach, failing dismally to wrap themselves around it. She must have gained another pound from that, she thought, but it was not yet over – as a third trolley was pushed in. This one was her dessert – a hundred doughnuts, a great stack of cream cakes, a jelly as big as her head. The last trace of self-control faded away, and she reached for the sugary treats with both hands, scoffing and cramming into her gaping maw of a mouth. A sheen of sugar covered the grease stains around her triple chins, jiggling up and down; finally she was scooping the jelly with her hands, and the second to last button went on her top, leaving only one complaining one left.

“I'll bring in some more snacks in a minute. Brunch in an hour OK?”, said her mother, with a large smile...

Wendy rubbed her massive soft belly, a task she had taken to enjoying the bigger and bigger it got. She was pretty full from her day of eating, but her midnight snack was looking pretty temping. As the last bit of restraint was lifting before she started eating again, she reasoned with herself that she loved food and there was no problem with how much she was eating or with how her parents were acting. Wendy did want one thing though, and it was to get out of the house. After that thought she couldn't hold back and started to gobble down all of her deserts snacks causing her to really tip over the end of fullness. The big full girl drifted right to sleep and was only woken up by the sound of her breakfast being wheeled into her.

"Mom I want to go out today!" Wendy said as she started to sit up and reach her hand out and grab her breakfast tray.

"Sure thing honey, I'll prep her car." Wendy's appetite meant that she car needed to be fully stocked with food for their trip. The glove box full of cookies, back seat full with bag of chips and candy, Tupperware containers with brownies and cakes, and of course Wendy needed plenty of room for her massive belly. Wendy ate all of her breakfast before jiggling out to the car. The toasty sun beat down on her pale skin. Wendy had not been out side in the longest time. She never had time between meals and snacks for much of anything. She even struggled to find time for her weigh-in's.

Wendy's wardrobe was non-exsistant. She had gained 200lbs in a month and nothing fit her. Her parents had found a bra that could contain her large boobs, and a shirt that covered them too. No pair of pants could fit up the girls chunky legs so they had custom made a skirt she could slid on. The thing was so small and was tightly covered across her huge ass. Her belly was fully exposed and hung way over her waist band. The mass shifted and jiggled as she walked.

"Mom lets go to the mall and get some clothes. I bet I can find some cute boys too." They sped off in the direction of the mall, Wendy snacking all the way. First stop was the big teen girl store. They had all the latest fashions for teen girls Wendy's size. It's was a popular destination at the mall, especially when the moved it next to the food court. Wendy chomped on some cheese burgers they had aquired as they walked to the store. Wendy picked out some tops and some pants and her mother paid for them. Her hunger had come back so they went and got a large bag of tacos. Wendy continued to stroll around the mall eating taco after taco out of her bag as she walked. All the boys couldn't help but notice Wendy as she walked by. They were used to big girls around here but not as big and beautiful as Wendy. She started getting food offers from all the cute boys. They'd bring her ice cream, or smoothies. She's flirt with one boy until her treat was gone and then she'd move on to the next. She got offerings of cookies or fast food, and would gobble them up right in front of her male compatriots. She started making dinner dates and movie reservations with all the boys. Thursday, Friday, and Saturday nights were all booked up. she could picture it now, getting picked up by a cute boy and taken to a fancy restaurant where she could eat plate after plate of fancy Italian food. She was getting giddy from the thought of it. After a few last hours in the food court she reconvened with her mom and they went home. Her mom went straight to work on dinner, while Wendy went to work finishing the car supply of food. She then tried on some of her new clothes. She was bursting out of them but that's how she liked to look. She couldn't wait to wear them on her hot dates this week.

“More! I'm still hungry!” Wendy screamed at the top of her voice, sending her six chins wobbling.

She lay sprawled on a huge divan in the middle of the room, her five-hundred-pound form unceremoniously spread out, covered by a huge muumuu covered in food stains. Her face was covered in the remains of her second pre-dinner snack, and food wrappers and discarded scraps lay on the floor around her. One hand patted her huge stomach, peeping out through the buttons of her top, while the other trailed a selection of cupcakes from a large bowl by her side into her eager mouth, dropping them in one at a time.

Her increased appetite meant that she needed a full-time cook to keep her full, as well as the output of some fast-food restaurants. As the last cupcake dropped into her mouth, and as she prepared to give out a massive scream for more food, her mother pushed the first dinner trolley into the room, pushing it to her side. On it was a huge stack of burgers, hot dogs, and steaks. There was no cutlery, Wendy simply began to tear into everything with her hands. A massive vat of french fries loaded with sauces was dropped in front of her and she began to gorge.

As the food ran out, it was replaced with different delicacies – the burgers were replaced with fried chicken, the hot dogs with kebabs, the steaks with fried pork chops. A constant flow of food trailed into her mouth, before she dropped her greasy arms to her side, sending streaks down her top.

“Can't move. Feed me.”

Her mother summoned a maid and taking one side each, they began to take food to her waiting mouth. Wendy closed her eyes – she didn't care what the food was any more, just that it went into her belly. She could feel it pushing against the buttons on her top, feel it slowly expanding. Suddenly the tastes changed, and she could see a huge vat of scrambled eggs being brought in, a huge ladle scooping it up into her mouth.

11133112222122.content:
"Woah..." Wendy muttered, taking a moment to gawk at the meal before her. Instantly, her mother was by her side-

"What's wrong, sweetheart? Aren't you hungry?" She asked, looking at the pile of food spread out before her daughter- who hadn't even bothered to get out of her ill fitting pajamas. Wendy's sleeveless top barely coverer her massive, doughy chest- a fair amount of both cleavage and underboob pouring out from the top and bottom of the fabric. Her pillowy arms that hung low and wobbled as she moved them were free to open air. Similarly, her bottoms- which had been long pants- only reached about halfway down her calves, and the waistband cut into her doughy butt, two semicircles of pale flesh pouring over it in the back. She was completely barefoot, probably unable to squeeze her feet into her old shoes at this point.

"No- no-" Wendy said, "of course I'm hungry, it's just..." She gave her mother a questioning look, her features framed by large softball sized cheeks and five thick chins. "It just seems...n-nevermind, actually," Wendy said quickly, beginning to dig in.

There were no utensils, as usual- they only slowed Wendy down. She grabbed mitfulls of bacon, grease dribbling between her fingers as she made short work of the platter. It must've been two or three pig's worth of the stuff, since it was piled a foot high and a few feet long, on one of those massive serving platters usually reserved for parties. Wendy shoveled it down as quickly as she could, before tackling the omelets. There were ten of them, each one a twelve-egg omelet, packed with ham, cheese, caramelized onions, but no bell peppers or mushrooms- those veggies, even as components of one of these monsters, would be far too healthy to pass Wendy's lips.

By this point, she was stuffed- especially since her stomach was still partially full from the midnight snack her mother had brought her in bed last night. But that didn't matter. Wendy knew how to ignore that full feeling and just keep binging. She grabbed a gallon of chocolate milk, hoisting it to her lips and messily guzzling it. There were several gallons on the table, as one would by no means be enough for her.

A plate of butter caught her eye- about fifteen sticks of it, unwrapped and stacked up. Without a second thought, Wendy's pudgy hand darted out and started grabbing them, as she ate them like chocolate bars- one after another. Naturally, she then moved on to the cakes. Five of them, four layers thick each, three being rich devils food cake and two being light angel's food cake. Wendy messily tore out fistfuls, shoveling them into her mouth- licking the icing off her fingers. Immediately after finishing all five cakes, she chugged another gallon of chocolate milk.

And so she went on- working her way through a pile of thirty super fluffy pancakes, emptying four containers of whipped cream in the process. Rich, juicy sausages, thicker than her fingers, chains of upwards of twenty vanishing between her lips.

By the time it was over, Wendy was actually tired. It took a lot out of her to keep it together, and just keep stuffing and stuffing more into her mouth- she almost felt sick.

That's when her mother came up, and cheerfully said "oh, you're done! So, that means you're ready for the second course!"

111331122221222.content:
She looks at what her mother brought in a sweaty daze.

Two platters full of jumbo double chocolate muffins and massive cinnamon rolls. Each are coated liberally with cream cheese frosting and powdered sugar. 24 pieces of grease soaked French Toast next to a large bottle of...high fructose corn syrup? And lastly an extra large mixing bowl filled with oatmeal that she sees her dad mixing in an entire two pound bag of brown sugar.

Her faces grows more flush thinking about the food in front of her.

“Mom, I think I’m pretty f-“ Wendy starts to say before a large, almost inhuman growl comes from her stomach.

“I know dear you are still hungry, let me know when you are ready for more,” She says walking away leaving Wendy to her second course.

She sluggishly starts with the muffins taking huge bites of each decadent calorie bomb before switching to the cinnamon rolls. Her previous course putting a strain on her feeling some heartburn coming along.

Wiping her sweat off her face, she takes a big swing of her jug of chocolate milk before starting with the French toast.

She looks at the bottle of high fructose corn syrup and yells, “Hey mom, what happened to the maple syrup?”

“We accidentally bought the wrong bottle sweetie. Once it’s finish we can go back to maple syrup.”

Shrugging her shoulders she douses her French toast with half the bottle and begins chowing down.

She realized she did not mind the new syrup and it goes well with the new bacony, greasy taste of the French toast. The syrup makes the French toast even easier to eat feeling it slide down with only minimal chewing.

However, when she finishes the French toast stacks she is really feeling full.

“Mom,” Wendy whines, “I’m full.” Her mom walks back into the dining room and sees the oatmeal untouched with half a gallon of milk left.

“Nonsense sweetie you have so much food left.”

Wendy starts to complain, but her mom comes over and starts rubbing her tummy. She quietly burps, when then her mom slaps her belly hard causing her to loudly belch for 5 seconds straight. Seeing an opportunity her mom starts to feed her the oatmeal.

“See if you have space for air in there, you have space for food.” She takes another huge ladle full of oatmeal and feeding it to her daughter.

Wendy closes her eyes and slowly swallows the slop feeling her belly get tighter and tighter with each subsequent ladle.

Wendy’s barely tastes the oatmeal other than to notice how sweet and rich it tastes. Eventually her mother reaches the bottom of the bowl scraping up the last of the oatmeal giving it to her daughter.

Wendy’s mom commands her to open her mouth which she does with hesitation. Her mom takes the rest of the gallon of milk pours it into the bowl and takes the bowl tipping it to Wendy’s awaiting maw.

Thick streams of milk and oatmeal drip down the side of her mouth onto her shirt as she glugs down the last bits of her breakfast.

Her mom takes the bowl and feels Wendy’s gut as taut as a tire.

“Wendy how do you feel now?”

“Full,” she gasps trying to catch her breath from all that eating.

“Great why don’t you move over to the living room while dad cleans up and I start on lunch?”

Wendy nods her head, as she carefully gets up from the bench waddling her way over to the living room. Feeling dazed and seeing spots she looks down noticing her stomach has lost most of her rolls and does not sag anymore due to her fullness. Feeling a little proud of herself she plops herself down on the love seat. The love seat creaks and groans ominously as she feels her hips touch both sides of the seat. She wipes the sweat off her brow and turns on some cartoons.

She takes a swig from a 2L bottle of soda next to her to help refresh herself after that walk and falls asleep.

Wendy woke up from her nap after she started to smell pasta sauce and chocolate from the kitchen. She groaned and stretched out her arms to try and get the sleep out of her body. Wendy reached down to her stomach finding that the previous bursting feeling is gone and replaced with hunger. She smiled at her hungry belly and started to rock herself out of the couch in order for her to start her lunch.

“Hello Sweetie,” Wendy’s Mom said to your daughter, “I hope you slept well and got some more space in that tummy of your for lunch. Today you are having lasagna, chicken Alfredo, cheesy garlic bread, fudge with icing on top, and some extra thick butter milkshakes.”

“Don’t worry mom, this stomach works quick and I have a bunch of space for delicious food,” Wendy replied while she shook her stomach causing loud belches to escape.

Wendy got on the bench and enjoyed hearing the sound of the bench bending and creaking under her heavy load and began to dig into the food. She started with the two trays of lasagna looking at the greasy meat stuffed pasta with a look of a predator who caught her prey.

She ravenously dove into the food and started scooping as much food as she can barely taking breaths inbetween her mouths of these cheesy goodness. She plowed through the lasagna with ease using the garlic bread to mop up any extra cheese and grease she may have missed. Next, she moved onto the two big pots of chicken Alfredo and licked her lips in anticipation for the next part of her lunch. She dug into the food with the same gusto as the lasagna using the garlic bread to scoop up any missing bits of food.

Wendy started to sweat and pant after the amount of exertion she used to eat and the food weighing heavily in her stomach. She reached over and grabbed a pitcher of milkshake to quench her thirst and started on the two trays of thick chocolate fudge with chocolate frosting on top.

With the thickness of the fudge and the richness of her pasta her eating speed slowed dramatically. She labored through the trays taking large swigs of her milkshake to help cool her body off from the exertion of eating and digesting her food. Eventually she reached the end of the trays and took the last swig of milkshake feeling BLOATED and FULL.

“Mom,” Wendy pants, “I’m done.”

Wendy’s mom walked over and saw all the plates and trays free of any food. “Good job sweetie, why don’t you watch some TV as your dad and I start Dinner,” she replied.

Wendy’s stomach let out an angry gurgle at the idea of more food but Wendy patted her stomach to quiet it down. “Okay, Mom.”

Wendy started the slow process of getting out of her bench while her stomach tried to anchor her down. After a five minutes she beat gravity and got her body up and moving. She slowly waddled to the couch with bursts of gas leaving her stomach and bum. She looked at the couch with her eyes already closing and plopped her body down.

At this point two noises were heard simultaneously. The first a large SNAP that indicated the couch could not support her weight anymore. And the second a loud bassy belch that lasted 10 seconds from the Wendy as her stomach was jostled about. Than a third noise was heard after the first two of loud snoring coming from Wendy as the exhaustion of eating and moving 15 feet overcame Wendy.

Her parents looked at their daughter with large smiles from the kitchen.
1113311222212221.title: Wakes up after a couple hours ready for lunch

choices: "...yes....Yes- it is. I want to eat everything!" Wendy answered, greedily
"...What's really going on? This is just...TOO weird!" Wendy asked, angrily
11133112222122213.content:
As the days ticked by and the exorbitant proportions of dangerously decadent meals filled out Wendy's figure more and more, her quickly and continuously fattening body rapidly outgrowing every new clothes size, her parents worked extra hard to support her growth- spoiling her as much as they could. Wendy began to spend a majority of her time almost entirely nude, except for a very overstretched 4XL t-shirt, which looked like a sports bra on her at best.

Other than that, Wendy's pale tremendously obese figure was on full display- her expansive fat serviceable enough in preserving her modesty, not that the bloated behemoth babe ever went out in public. She spent her days lazily lounging in the comfort of her living room, parked in front of the TV.

Since her gigantic fat butt already broke the sofa, and taking the stairs back up to her room was out of the question, Wendy's doting parents had painstakingly moved her bed down the stairs and into the living room, allowing their obese daughter to lounge on it all day and night, growing lazier by the minute, as they brought her immeasurable amounts of food, waiting on her hand and food. Of course, Wendy soon broke the bedframe beneath her weight, but she still had the nice comfy queen sized mattress covered in pillows to sit on, as her ever growing gut spilled out onto the floor in front of her! Plus, she soon became so fat, that her enormous butt and back rolls served as the perfect backrest for her to recline.

Wendy went for weeks without having to move a muscle- her parents encouraging their daughter's laziness, advising her to avoid exercise completely, so that she doesn't burn any of those precious calories! Wendy thought it was a bit weird that they were so eager- but she absolutely hated exercise, so she was more than happy to comply. Even without moving around, Wendy's breathing was heavy- and she was sweating an awful lot from all the junk food she ate, plus how warm her fat was. Wendy was beginning to develop a noticeable ripe body odor because of this. She also never bothered to wipe away the odd stain or crumb that fell onto her pudgy face or bust as she put away her monstrous meals. She didn't care about her hygiene though- as long as she could relax and live her life in maximum comfort- eating all she wanted of the unhealthiest foods she could! Her parents did everything they could to enable and encourage her, making sure she got bigger and bigger portions every day- hand feeding her so she didn't have to lift a pudgy finger, adding dessert to all three meals so she never had to wait too long for sugary rich decadent sweets, and in between meals making sure she was almost always snacking on something! They would even give her belly rubs, back massages, and footrubs whenever she asked. It was like her house turned into her own personal five star resort!

One day, about a month since she first broke the couch- Wendy was actually up and walking for the first time in weeks! And not having had the time to adjust to her weight, the poor girl wasn't taking it very well.

"Uuuggggghhh-huff...huff... mooOOoom! urrrp" Wendy whined, sweating buckets even harder than usual as she painstakingly waddled along, shuffling one heavy leg at a time which wobbled from the motion, her fat bare feet squishing against the floor like bags of dough with five pudgy little toes poking out, every step making the floorboards creak. "Couldn't you....have just....bwoOOorp...put me on it?" She asked.

Wendy had gotten utterly enormous- her belly being a foot or so wider than a single doorway, and hanging down past her knees, to her shins. As she waddled along now, her father was holding it up for her- to make it easier- using both arms and straining from the effort. Wendy's hips were even wider than her belly- pillowy thighs going out a good few feet, even as they hung weighed down by their own fat- and she had a butt to match, her surprisingly rotund rump that quivered with every step, resting on her own thigh fat, big enough to comfortably fill out a loveseat. Her torso was wrapped in a thick cocoon of lard- twin rolls of love handles bulging out to her sides, resting on her hips, so much that her arms (which were extremely fat themselves, too much to bend at the elbow fully) rested on them- like she was doing a droopy T-pose. Her chest was beyond any cup size, straining the shirt she wore so much that it looked like they'd need a small hammock to replace it- breasts that were each as big as her belly once was sloshing with each labored step. Her face was framed by soft tender chubby cheeks and a tire of neck fat, which wobbled gently whenever she talked, belched, or ate. Heck- all of her jiggled whenever she did anything.

"I told you, sweetheart- we can't lift you!" Wendy's mother said, walking alongside Wendy- every few seconds, reaching over her daughter's immensity to feed her a whole donut- sometimes giving her swigs from a bottle of soda. She hoped it would be enough to replenish whatever weight poor Wendy lost walking all this way. "The scale is only two and a half feet away, sweetie- you can do this!" Wendy's mother encouraged.

Wendy groaned- letting out pants and gas in between her glacial steps- before eventually- they managed to get her on to the industrial scale, meant for weighing shipments in a warehouse. Wendy sighed, relaxing as her dad gently put her belly down- feeling it rest comfortably against the front of her legs, and she eagerly scarfed down the entire pot of chicken alfredo which her mother presented her as a reward- washing it down with a gallon of chocolate milk- sauce and milk dribbled down her fat roll of a chin- which in and of itself was bigger than most girl's waistline.

"Alright- now let's see!" Wendy's mother said, turning on the scale and waiting with bated breath. After a moment, she grinned, happily and proudly reading out "956!! Amazing- congratulations sweetheart!!!" Wendy's mother squealed, hugging Wendy- sinking into her pale, sweaty flab. A hug her father joined, laughing loudly. Wendy couldn't help but smile, in spite of herself. It was pretty impressive, she thought.

"You gained more than four hundred pounds this month! Just this one month!" Wendy's mother said, quickly doing some calculations- "and that means....gasp- You're gaining more than ten pounds a day! Heck, probably more than fifteen pounds a day!!!" She exclaimed, seeming almost bizarrely gleeful. Wendy was still smiling, still proud of the size her dream lifestyle had given her- but she found her mother's level of excitement to be...odd.

"You're doing so amazing, Wendy! Why- at the rate you're going, I think we can aim for fifty pounds a day next month!!" Wendy blinked, her smile faltering.

"Fihhh....fifty pounds...every day..?" She murdered- trying to count in her head. That means a hundred pounds every two days- and six days, three hundred- plus another fifty..every single week?

"I know! It's exciting, isn't it?" Wendy's mother cut off her train of thought. "I didn't think we'd be here 'til the month after next! And- I know it may seem like a lot of food at first- you may start to feel full- but you can push through and keep on eating! And it'll all be worth it in the end."

Wendy's mom noticed Wendy's hesitation. Smiling warmly, she leaned in- patting Wendy's enormous belly, sending ripples through the fat. "Hey- don't worry! Just because there's more food doesn't mean it'll be lower quality! Your father and I are still gonna make absolutely sure every crumb that passes your lips is as sugary, fatty, greasy, and calorie dense as possible! And you can still relax all day! Just eating and eating and eating-" she smiled, lovingly, as Wendy started to sweat for a slightly different reason.

"All the junk food in the world...Isn't that what you want, Wendy?" She asked, sweetly.
11133112222122213.title: Another month, another mouthful!

1113312.content:
The month passed in a blur of food; Wendy's skin grew paler as she ventured outside less and less, spending more and more time in her room as she continued to indulge and to be indulged. She slowly expanded as the calories rolled on, somehow managing to eat more and more every day.

She woke up in the morning, and reached over to her bedside table, where a packet of doughnuts awaited her, her favourite early-morning snack. Half a dozen cream and jam doughnuts barely made an impression, and she rapidly gobbled them down. Her room was a shrine to consumption; there were bags of crisps, chocolate bars and other goodies scattered everywhere. She scrambled out of bed, her belly rippling from the exertion; she patted it gently to settle it down, before sitting down at her desk in front of a large box of chocolates. Today was a special day...

1113321.content:
Wendy was sitting down at the head of the table, with a platter of hamburgers arrayed in front of her. She grabbed each one with her greasy hand, and pushed it into her mouth with two or three bits, smiling in happiness; at that point, her friend Tracey came walking towards her with a tray of fried chicken; in one action, she took away the platter of hamburgers and placed the new tray down instead. Wendy reached out for one last burger, before taking a sigh and reaching for the chicken. The buttons on her shirt were growing more and more strained, and her double chin was rapidly changing into a triple chin.

After just five minutes, Wendy was making rapid inroads into the pile of chicken, sauces dribbling down her chin and on to her complaining shirt, gulping down chunks of meat as fast as she could. Hearing footsteps, she looked up to see another friend, Danica, walking towards her bearing another platter, loaded with pizzas – there must have been a couple of dozen scattered on the plate. She hurriedly worked on the chicken, but Danica took the platter away before she had quite finished, leaving her to struggle.

She was having some trouble now with her tight shirt; the buttons were really digging in, and the fabric was complaining, but she quickly dived into her pizzas, hurriedly tearing off chunks and stuffing them in, usually two or three at a time. Her belly swelled still further, and flab was hanging from her arms; the only noise she could hear was the constant munching and chomping of her mouth, working overtime.

Then her mom came walking towards her with another tray, loaded with Chinese food of all varieties – more fried chicken, prawns, spring rolls, noodles, and a mountain of rice covered in sauce. The last pizzas were taken away, with Wendy straining over to reach them but failing as her huge belly began to get in the way, and she began to shove fistfuls of food into her eager mouth, slobbering away as quickly as she could. Her belly was beginning to push her away from the table now, and she redoubled her efforts, eventually just going head-first into the mountain of rice and gobbling away like a pig.

Then Tracey, Danica and her mom came again, taking away the food and replacing it with heaped mountains of desserts. A huge pile of doughnuts on one side, a massive, jiggling blancmange on the other, and a towering gateaux in front of her. She quickly reached for the doughnuts with one hand and grabbed at cake with the other, cramming them in. Her huge, swelling body was finally too much for her shirt, which ripped and tore down all the seams, and then with a loud creak, the chair gave way beneath her. She could see more trays coming as she was pinned to the floor...

11133211.content:
Wendy lay on her back, gasping for breath, a doughnut half stuffed into her mouth. She tried to push herself up, but couldn't; nor could she reach the food waiting for her on the table. Seeing her distress, her three maids – their outfits seemed to have changed to those of domestic servants, began to bring food to her. Danica was loading the blancmange into her mouth, while Tracey held a plate filled with cream cakes in easy reach.

Then the food was taken away, and the three of them brought in new platters loaded with more fast food – dozens of burgers, stacks of pizzas, fried chicken. Wendy's greedy belly was slowing rising, and was higher than her head; it felt warm and comfortable. For the first few minutes Wendy used her hands to shovel in the food, but before long Tracey and Danica were pushing the food into her mouth as her belly continued to rise. As one platter was finished, another was brought forward, each time growing bigger and bigger. Her belly grew larger and larger.

Her mum then brought in a funnel, shoved it in her mouth, and began to pour lemonade down her throat in two-litre bottles, four of them, before the food resumed – this time a huge tray of cream cakes. The cream spread around her mouth as she continued to feed, though she was no longer stopping to chew; there seemed to be a void in her stomach that she had to keep filling, and the quantities of food continued to increase as her belly continued to grow...

Wendy tried to look up, but all she could see was a large, billowing mass of a belly, spread out over the floor and rising four feet into the air. She tried to wiggle her toes, but the flab between them made it impossible; nor could she move her arms. “More food! I need more food!”, she cried out, and the two complied, pushing snack after snack into her mouth. She eagerly chewed on more and more of the greasy food, no longer caring what it was, simply wolfing down burgers, pizzas, pastries and cakes without regard, as well as the occasional huge bottle of fizzy drink. Something at the back of her mind was telling her that this wasn't real, but it felt so good that she did not want the dream to end. The portions kept on growing bigger and bigger, and she could swear that her bulging mass of a belly was continuing to grow. She could no longer feel her toes or her fingers. She gasped for breath as a huge hoagie was shoved into her mouth, almost a foot long, and she chewed it down rapidly, giving off an enormous stomach-jiggling burp.

"Hey there, Wendy!" At the sound of her name, she glanced up. There was a girl standing behind her mother, munching on a creme filled donut, the soft insides spilling out over her plump cheeks, wide and fluffy. Her doughy double chin churned gracefully as the strange new girl patted her jiggly belly. She moaned in ecstacy as she turned to face Wendy, only to pull her into a tight hug.

"Hey," Wendy replied, struggling to hide her confusion. This girl sounded like her friend Tracy, but Tracy had been 110 the day before. This girl was just as plump as she was right now, thick and fat as though she had never eaten a stick of celery in her life, a snack Tracy seemed quite fond of as far as Wendy could remember. Was she asleep right now, dreaming of some other sort of world where she was the skinny girl in their group of friends?

"Are you guys going to school soon, or would you like some sweets first, Trace?" her mother asked, curiously.

"Please, can I have a couple donuts if it's not too much trouble?" Tracy asked, barely finished with her first donut. Wendy stared in awe as her mother nodded, and handed the girl three donuts. Her mother then turned to Wendy, and gave her the same amount, which she stared in, awe struck. It wasn't like she was afraid to eat it or something, it was just she was in awe that something as miraculous as her mother allowing her to eat like this regularly could occur. She decided it might be best not to mention this change in behavior. It looked as though she was the only one aware that anything had changed at all.

Might as well enjoy this while she could, after all.

As the two girls left the house, bags on their backs, Wendy glanced at her now plump friend, and asked, gently, "Hey, Tracy, I have a question."

"Sure, shoot."

"Have you always been this big?"

12111.content:
Wendy walked into her classroom, but she was surprised to find it was replaced with a huge cafeteria. On the way in, she and everyone else were handed large lunch trays.
A whiteboard at the end of her table read "Today's assignment: Eat no less than 10,000 calories.
"What's going on?" She said.
A girl across from her replied "Just a normal day, like any other."
"Don't we read books or do math or anything?"
"Why would we do that? The only books we're taught to read are cookbooks. And what's math?"
"I think I like this"
A bell then rang. At once, everyone got up and filled their plates with food in a buffet line that went around the whole cafeteria. Wendy just followed along.
There was no fruit or vegetables, just deep fried foods, burgers, pastries, pizza, and pastas.
Wendy followed along and filled her plate with burgers, fries, soda, and a few slices of cake. She sat down and started in, like all the other kids. She then helped herself to seconds, then thirds, and so on. This went on for six hours, before school was finally dismissed. All the students were handed slips of paper with grades on them. She read hers.
"A+, 15,000 calories consumed. Great work, Wendy!"
She looked down at her shirt. It was bulging at the buttons and it looked like they could pop at any moment. She was completely stuffed.

choices: One of the most popular boys takes notice of her
The PE teacher offers Wendy a spot on the eating team
121112.content:
It didn't take long for Wendy to get used to her new school curriculum, as it was her new lifestyle. Spending six hours a day eating was little different from what she was doing before and after school, only here she knew she was being graded on her intake. Around the cafeteria the men and women she recognized as her former teachers monitored the students, estimating the calories in all the food each student took from the buffet and tallying them up.

Her first day Wendy had just eaten to eat, taking more food because it all tasted so good and her belly called for it. The grading part struck her as unnecessary, but only because she wasn't paying attention that first day. The second day, as she was handed another paper with another A+, she noticed a couple dozen classmates still sitting around the tables, most rubbing their bellies and moaning.

“Looks like Carla has detention again,” Danica commented. “When is that girl going to learn how to eat properly?”

“Detention?” Wendy said, the idea of being punished for not eating enough striking her as odd.

“Yeah. Well, I guess you've never had it, have you?” And she slapped Wendy's large, pale belly with a laugh.

“The students who can't reach 10,000 calories on their own need to stay after class,” Tracy explained, wondering if her friend really was unfamiliar with the concept, “They'll be able to go home once they get to the minimum, though this will go on their record.”

Wendy pondered that as she went home, her mother greeting her with a table full of Danishes and sizzling sausage she couldn't resist. All the adults in her life pushing food on her, her friends turning up fat like her, school being no more than an extended meal? It was fun, no doubt about that, but the lack of answers or greater logic behind this was putting her ill at ease. Part of her feared there was something sinister afoot, though what kind of evil plan involved fattening up teenagers she couldn't imagine.

For the next week Wendy went along with things as she was expected to, which also happened to be doing what came naturally to her: eating all day, every day. On the third or fourth day she started to fear she would get sick of the endless stream of the greasy, the salty, and the sweet, but it never came. Every day her mother or her school provided a fresh, ever-changing menu, and Wendy eagerly dove in to whatever new thing was available.

She certainly was suited for this new world. Every day she received an A+ on her intake, her teachers (in this world they were referred to as 'nutritionists') always offering her compliments on her capacity. She wasn't even trying, she was just giving in to the gluttony and hedonism she had always craved.

But even with her exemplary 'academic' performance, she was still more or less a face in the crowd, just another student among hundreds. But that changed when
121112.title: Next week

choices: Wendy accepts the date
Wendy rejects the date
1211121.content:
Wendy continued to gorge herself. She had eaten another ten plates heaped high with food. She was suddenly interrupted by Tracy. “Take a look at that guy. Quickly now,” she said, pointing over her shoulder. Looking, Wendy saw a tall, thin, blonde haired human male with his back turned to her. “There is nothing to see,” she said, turning back with a doughnut in her mouth. “There is not now, but a moment ago he was looking at you. With a look of lust in his eyes,” Danicia interjected. “Yeah, so what. There are plenty who want me,” Wendy said. “Indeed. That is true. But that is John Stevens,” Tracy said.. “He is unarguably the best feeder in the entire school. And when I say that, I mean it,” she continued. “He's thin, however. I doubt he eats the required 10,000 calories a day,” Wendy responded. “Yes. Both of those are true, but his ability to feed others is quite amazing. That's actually the whole reason he has not flunked out of school. Do you see Joan Li over there?” Ai said, pointing to another table. Looking there, Wendy saw a tremendous women who, although she could not have been over five feet, appeared to weigh at least 900 pounds. And she sat among other, similarly large women shoveling food into their mouths. “Just a few short months ago, she was anorexic, only weighing 200 pounds. And she was also always in detention for not eating enough. Every day.” Ai paused. “Everyone tried everything to try to get her to eat. Special force feeding summer camps. Stomach enlargement surgery. Multiple times. Threatening jail time. Nothing worked. And then John decided she was worthy of his attention. Having tried everything, the teachers decided to let him try. They thought he would fail. And in 10 months, he made her into what you see.” “And?” Wendy asked. “Every woman who was sent to John has had the same transformation happen to her. In fact, you the whole table you saw was made of women he fed.” Awestruck, Wendy got back to gorging.I better eat really well today, she thought.

The bell rang, and school was dismissed. But Wendy made sure to clear her plate first in case John was watching her. As she staggered to her feet, her swollen belly dragging her down slightly, she felt a hand under her shoulder. “Hello,” came a voice. It was definitely masculine. “I saw you eat today,” it continued. Turning around, Wendy saw a man who could only be John Stevens. Tall, thin, and very angular in the face. “Are you John Stevens?” She asked. “Yes. The miracle feeder, as you heard today.” John said.Might as well be blunt.“Do you like me?” Wendy asked. “Indeed,” John responded. “In fact, I want you to be my girlfriend. You will be well fed.”
1211121.title: One of the most popular boys takes notice of her

choices: To a buffet
To John's house
12111211.content:
“You work fast,” Wendy laughed, making a jest to hide her desire to shout 'Yes!' He was even more gorgeous up close than she expected.

“Sorry if I am direct,” John said. He was casual but self-assured. Wendy could sense a hint of entitlement about him. “But I don't care much for games or teasing, pretending to not be interested in someone and hoping that makes them want you more. I believe in forthrightness: if you want something, go for it.” He looked down at Wendy's belly, swollen taut and peeking out from her shirt. “And I think you share my perspective. I've seen you eating for a while now, stuffing yourself every day not because you have to, but because you want to. You want food. More food. Always more food.”

“Yes.” Wendy felt her face flush. It was disturbing to hear someone voicing the desire that had been growing in her during her time in this world, but also so damn sexy.

“Do you want to be fatter?” John asked. “Tremendously obese, possibly even immobile?”

“I- I hadn't thought about it. I just love to eat.” She was whispering, even though the cafeteria was almost entirely empty. Only her friends were still there, hanging back far enough to give John and Wendy privacy.

“The fatter you get, the more you can eat.” John was leaning closer now, his flat torso bumping against Wendy's fat stomach. “It's a testament to your gluttony, a symbol of pride for you and a source of envy for others.”

“I'm not that fat,” Wendy protested.

“Not yet.” John took Wendy's hands in his own, “But I've seen women smaller than you become the fattest in their neighborhoods, and they didn't have a fraction of the drive you do. My gift is to help women become all they can be. I've spent years honing this talent, refining it as I helped the frightfully thin become living works of art. And you... You're the one I've been waiting for. The woman who can use my talents to the fullest.

“Be my girlfriend, Wendy. Be my <i>raison d'etre</i>, and I will make you the fattest beauty to ever grace this Earth.”

“Make me huge,” Wendy whispered, breathy and with all the sensual desire of another woman saying 'Ravish me.'

“I will make you titanic,” John smiled, stroking her cheek with the back of his hand. Then he put a hand on Wendy's belly and pressed. There was give. “And we'll begin now.”
12111211.title: Wendy accepts the date

choices: At Wendy's house
At Wendy's house
121112111.content:
“Call your parents. Tell them you will be late coming home from school.” John said, helping Wendy to her feet. “As you wish” Wendy responded. She waddled, panting heavily, into the hallway. Reaching into her pocket, she grabbed her phone and dialed her mom. “Hello Wendy. What's up?” Her mom said. “I am going to be late coming home.” Wendy responded. “But what about your first and second after school snacks?” countered her mother. “Later. A situation has developed that does not allow me to go right back home.” “What situation?” her mother asked, her concern obvious in her voice. “The best feeder in the school asked me out on a date!” Wendy shouted excitedly. “Go. I have no interest in interrupting your fun,” her mother replied. “”I'll eat my snacks later,” Wendy added.

Waddling back to the cafeteria, she saw her friends staring at John with a look of lust in their eyes.He's mine. Wendy thought. John displayed no interest. “Wendy, I see you have finished,” he said. “When am I going to start eating?” Wendy asked. “In earnest, not until later. But I would like to see how you eat. At an all you can eat buffet” John responded. “All you can eat? I can eat a lot” Wendy said. “I doubt you can out-eat an all-you-can-eat buffet,” John responded. And with that John and Wendy got into a pickup truck and drove off.

John drove down many miles of road. Then he spoke “There. This is my preferred buffet,” he said, pointing out the window. Following his finger, Wendy saw a giant warehouse with a sign. “The benchmark buffet,” she said.What a weird name.“The portions there will put you through your paces.”

As Wendy and John entered the benchmark buffet, she could not help but notice the weight based pricing. “what is with the weird pricing...” She began. “Oh. The weight based pricing,” John interrupted, laughing. “That's a funny story. The short form of it was that my mom and sister found this place, and they so enjoyed it that they ate here frequently enough they almost bankrupt it. So they instituted weight based pricing to make enough money off of them to stay in business. And also to deter them from coming. But let's see how much you weigh. Strip down and get on the scale so my friend may charge us,” he continued.

Wendy removed all her clothes and got on the scale. John stood with a notebook. And the cashier stood by to charge them And John wrote down a number. “three hundred pounds. Not bad. But also not good,” John said, handing over twenty five dollars to the cashier. Wendy put her clothes back on and was measured by John in all the relevant statistics: height, waist size, hips, butt, and breasts.

Wendy and John sat at a table. “I'll grab all the food and drinks you need. Do you want anything in particular?” John asked. “No. I want you to surprise me,” Wendy responded. He returned with a staff member helping him carry 2 party sized pizzas, a dozen milkshakes, and ten heaping bowls of salad. These were not the salads Wendy knew from before the world became so fat friendly. These were spinach and avocado salads covered in bacon and cheese, and absolutely drenched in dressing. ”Enjoy,” John said.I'm actually scared. Wendy thought.How am I going to eat all of this.Seeing her concern, John said “you don't have to. I just wish to see how you eat.” Wendy dug in. “consider myself surprised,” were her very last words.

The instant the very first bite touched her lips Wendy felt an incredible hunger greater than anything she had ever felt. It was a ravenous beast that was bent on consuming everything in its path. And she let it loose. John sat in awe as Wendy dumped an entire milkshake into her gaping maw in one move. He was amazed when, a moment later, she took two of her salad bowls and began eating from them. He practically died when she drank the remaining salad dressing from each bowl, burped, and then turned to the pizza without slowing down, eating up to five at a time. She then alternated between pizza and salad. She vaguely remembered saying “More please,” to a shocked John.

Wendy reached for a plate of burgers, only to discover there were none. She looked around in amazement, only to discover a table covered in empty plates. And Jack, obviously struck by something. “What is on you mind?” Wendy asked. “Nothing. You just ate the most of any girl of your weight I have ever seen,” John responded. “What did I eat?” Wendy asked. “Ten bacon and avocado salads, twelve gainer shakes, two party sized pizzas, and twenty burgers,” John muttered. “That explains why my belly hurts. Would you please give me a belly rub?” she responded. “Of course,” John responded, rubbing the back of his hand slowly over her stomach. “do you require any more food.” “No, I cannot eat any more,” she responded. “Well then I suppose when you are able to move I should get you back to your parent's house.” “I want to see what I weigh and measure first,” Wendy muttered. John then proceeded to weigh and measure her and record them, muttering to himself in approval.
121112111.title: To a buffet
