His twin sister, who he's fattened up to 2,000 pounds
121112112.content:
“We'll go to my house,” John said, leading Wendy out of the cafeteria. To the side, her friends watched with happiness and envy, swooning over John's dashing looks and the idea of what he could do to them if he were to feed them.

John's car was a luxury sedan, but one designed with large occupants in mind. The car was wider then normal, the passenger seat and back seat so large it was like an overblown set for a kid's show or something. Wendy felt positively tiny in the plush seat.

His house, more like a mansion, was equally as grand and imposing. John came from a family of means, and Wendy smiled to think what this meant for her attempts to get fatter.

“I want to show you something, Wendy.” John led her inside, through the massive double-doors at the entrance, “Something to reassure you that I can deliver what I've promised.”
121112112.title: To John's house

choices: Wendy starts training for the eating competition
Skip to the day of the eating competition
1211122.content:
“Ms. Graham?”

Wendy turned around, a slow shuffling movement as her belly was a rock-solid mass restricting her mobility, to find Mrs. Hood, the school's PE teacher behind her. Though in this world Wendy had no idea what 'physical education' would entail, and Mrs. Hood didn't look suited for much exertion herself. The formerly trim/a bit buff woman was a round mass of flesh in this world, though still favoring gym shorts and cotton shirts.

“Yes, Mrs. Hood?”

“I was wondering if I could have a little chat with you.” She motioned the teen into her office.

…

“An eating team?”

“Yes.” Mrs. Hood was a little surprised by Wendy's confusion. “I admit, we haven't been going to any state championships in quite a while, but I am rather proud of turning the team around over the past few years. And I think with you on the team, we can do even better.”

“Me?”

“You. I've been watching you the past week, you've been stepping up your game at the table. I don't know what it is, but I've seen you tackling the food with as much gusto as any competitor your age.”

“Uh, thanks. I just really like to eat.”

Mrs. Hood cocked an eyebrow. Was this girl implying she was approaching her schoolwork as a lark? That she could eat even more, even faster? She had to get her on the team.

“Wendy,” She put a hand on Wendy's shoulder, leaning closer. Her face beamed with excitement. “I think you have the makings of a great eating champion. You could possibly go pro. And I'm not just blowing smoke.”

“Wow, uh, really?” 'Professional eater' sounded almost like a joke, but in this world it probably was an actual thing. And what else would Wendy strive for?

“And I'll level with you, Wendy.” Her voice lost a layer of enthusiasm, “Carlson has to fly to New Hampshire for a funeral, and we'll be short a woman this Saturday. If you say yes now I can get you on the roster in time. Would you at least try it out, see if you like it? It would be a tremendous help just to do it this once.”

Wendy had already made up her mind.

“I'm your girl, Mrs. Hood.”
1211122.title: The PE teacher offers Wendy a spot on the eatin...

choices: Wendy asks to be taken off the team
Wendy sticks with it and the day of the match arrives
12111221.content:
The next day Wendy arrived at school toting an already stuffed belly but determined to eat as much as possible today. But as she got in line Mrs. Hood found her and pulled her out.

“You're on the eating team now, Graham. You get priority.”

And she led Wendy down to the front of the line, where a couple other girls were loading up two trays apiece to overflowing.

“Take as much as you can carry, then take a seat there,” Mrs. Hood pointed to a table with a 'Reserved' sign on it right in front of the start of the buffet. “Your training begins now.”

Wendy copied the girls in front of her, a redhead and a Latina who were as much belly as they were woman, piling as much food onto her plates as she could and (carefully) carrying them to the table.

“So you're taking Kari's place this week?” The Latina said, already tearing off half a doughnut.

“Yeah, I'm Wendy. I'm kind of surprised I was asked, but I guess-”

“Graham! If your mouth is empty put food in it!” Mrs. Hood yelled. Startled, Wendy crammed an entire strip of Canadian bacon into her mouth, struggling to chew.

“Don't talk with your mouth empty,” the redhead said around some sausage. “We're not here to chat, we're here to eat.”

“I can do that,” Wendy said, swallowing some bacon and replacing it with a fresh strip.

For the next six hours the three girls ate and talked, sometimes talking but always eating. Wendy learned quickly that even though her appetite would carry her past the required 10,000 calories, she was now being expected to consume as many calories as possible, however many that would be.

The other girls – the redhead was named Cassandra and the Latina was Nicole – explained the rules of the eating competition to their new teammate. It was actually as simple as it sounded: two teams of three girls would be given an hour to consume as many calories as possible, a panel of judges inspecting all the empty plates to estimate the total number of calories eaten.

It was a group effort, the final score for each team being a combined number, but special point bonuses could be awarded by each judge for admirable bouts of gluttony.

“Admirable bouts?” Wendy asked.

“Getting creative, or just greedy. Like this.” Nicole said, grabbing a couple strips of bacon, then a jelly doughnut, and then running both through a bowl of sausage gravy she had in front of her. Opening her jaw as wide as possible, she took a bite that would have choked a lesser person.

“The bottom line,” Cassandra said, “is to take in as many calories as you can. Combining stuff like this not only gets more into you but makes for a better 'show' and wins the judges over. There have been matches where the calorie count is close enough that the judges decided the victor.”

About halfway through the school day Wendy was at her limit, and her teammates came to her help again, telling her to take some soda or milkshake and nurse it while she digested.

“Just don't stop putting something in your mouth,” Nicole said. “Have to keep your momentum going.”

Wendy did as instructed, eventually taking to looking at the clock every five minutes and waiting for the day to be over. She never thought she would reach the point she couldn't eat, much less didn't want to, but it had happened. She was struggling to chew, struggling to reach for more food and struggling to keep it down.

Relief did come, though, the bell for the day ringing and most of the students getting up to leave. But neither Wendy nor her teammates could think of moving, all three teens rubbing their bellies and concentrating on their breathing. Wendy's skin was pulled tight, and she feared any jostle would make her split open.

Across the table, Cassandra was leaning over and... talking to her belly.

“You did a good job today, sweetie. I'm so proud.”

Nicole caught Wendy's confused look and explained

“She thinks talking to her belly soothes it and helps it digest.”

Wendy nodded slowly. Oooooooookaaaaay...

“Good job, Graham.” Mrs. Hood said, though a bit reluctant to be too encouraging. “Still got work to do stretching your stomach, but we'll get there.”

It was an hour before she felt ready to move, her discomfort easing as she burped and belched and relieved pressure. But it was so painful, and the idea of eating becoming a chore, something she had to do, worried here. At that moment, she wasn't sure if she could do this for the rest of the week or on Saturday. Perhaps she should go to Mrs. Hood and bow out.
12111221.title: Wendy starts training for the eating competition

choices: Wendy eats too much, too fast and makes herself sick
Wendy pushes herself to the limit and helps the team squeak out a win
121112212.content:
By the time she was walking home Wendy had almost convinced herself to stick to it. Sure there was discomfort now, but wouldn't there be pain and fatigue if she was training for an athletic sport? Like Mrs. Hood said, with time she would get her stomach stretched out and be able to eat more. And the actual contest would only be an hour, a fraction of the school day.

By the time she arrived home Wendy was determined to stick through for the rest of the week and go through the match on Saturday. It's not like she had a permanent spot on the team, anyway, so at the very least she should fulfill her favor to Mrs. Hood.

For the rest of the week Wendy pushed her intake to the max and practiced the tips and 'cheats' Mrs. Hood and her teammates taught her. Breathing was the big thing; when she got too full or had her mouth filled with stuff it became easy to start struggling.

But then Saturday came. Per Mrs. Hood's instructions Wendy ate a breakfast just big enough to take the edge off her hunger but not enough to make her full, and then she headed to the school for the match. In the locker room she changed into a spandex one-piece in the school colors – blue and silver – that hugged every curve of her body. She tugged on it experimentally; it was nice and loose, giving her belly room to bloat and expand as she ate.

“Two of you already know I'm not much in the way of pep talks,” Mrs. Hood said when the three eaters were changed and assembled. “So Graham, I'll just say that all you have to do is what comes naturally. I'm not expecting you to carry the team after just a few days of practice, but I believe your natural talent will give us a real shot at winning.

“Unfortunately, we're against Woodridge and they brought Jessi Reynolds.”

Cassandra and Nicole both groaned.

“Yeah. But we're early in the season, so there's not a lot riding on this. Just go out there, do your best, and then we'll look ahead to next week.”

“Who's Jessi Reynolds?” Wendy asked, but before she could get an answer a middle-aged woman in a navy blue skirt and jacket came in, looking at a clipboard.

“Wendy Graham?”

“Here.”

“We need to do a weigh-in. Hop on the scale, please.”

Wendy did as instructed, the woman (an official of some sort) looking down at the readout.

“284 ¼ pounds.”

Wendy hadn't thought about her weight since waking up in this world, but the fact that she had gained almost 25 pounds in less than two weeks was surprising. Not worrying, not troubling, but surprising.

And then she was being ushered out of the locker room to the gymnasium. The stands had a generous amount of spectators, but Wendy's eyes were drawn to the center. A couple banquet tables were set in the middle, both laden with more food Wendy thought could be eaten in an entire day, never mind two hours. To one side another table was set up, with three officials already seated; the woman who had weighed Wendy and two men.

On the other side of the gym the opposing team was coming out. Dressed in red and white spandex, Wendy initially thought they looked a bit... skinny for an eating contest.

Then she got an answer to who Jessi Reynolds was.

The girl was massive, at least twice as big as Wendy, carrying a belly in front of her the size of a dump-truck. Her neck was hidden by multiple chins and she could only take slow, lumbering steps. When she settled onto the bench there was a sense of finality to the action. She wouldn't be getting up anytime soon, or easily.

She was sitting in the middle of her team, and by chance Wendy ended up sitting across from her. Because of the mound of food on each table Wendy didn't have a clear look at her, but she was already intimidated. The girl looked like she could be her own team.

“There is a chance,” Cassandra said, “The Woodridge coach likes to rely on Jessi's appetite, to the point that she gives her so much leeway she has trouble keeping anyone else on the team. Nobody can stand being around her. Neither of those two look like they'll contribute much, probably roped in just this week.”

By contrast, Nicole and Cassandra had shown themselves to be true eaters. As Wendy sat and waited for the starting whistle, she tried to prepare herself mentally. If she could get a good pace and keep it going for the full hour, if she could carry her own weight, their team might win. Or at least not be trounced.

One of the officials stood up, microphone in hand. After the traditional welcomes and introductions, he told the timekeeper to set the clock to 60 minutes. The digital clocks set along the walls read 1:00:00.

“Competitors, get ready. Get set. Go!”
121112212.title: Wendy sticks with it and the day of the match a...

choices: Wendy turns Mrs. Hood down, wanting to reunite with her friends
Wendy decides to join the team, dedicated to expanding her capacity and intake
1211122122.content:
Wendy, Cassandra and Nicole all leaned across the table and grabbed platters of food, bringing them to the table in front of them. The closest thing to a strategy the team had was each girl picked a different item and they left the food within reach of the others so no one had to try to eat a dozen servings of just one item. Variety of tastes was important in a good binge, Mrs. Hood had taught them.

And there was a variety, Wendy couldn't deny that. The first 'course' for the three eaters was soft shell tacos spilling out meat and sour cream, bacon-wrapped balls of gouda, and – to Wendy's pleasant surprise – deep-friend cheesecake.

Each portion was giant-sized, even for this world of junk food and gluttony, another potential intimidation for Wendy. But she just pushed through this, taking a giant bite of cheesecake, chewing rapidly, and then swallowing. With her free hand she grabbed a taco; some of the filling spilled out, but she ignored it. The tacos were in front of Cassandra: it was her job to scoop up the remaining bits once the platter was cleared just as it was Wendy's to clean off any crumbs leftover from the cheesecake.

Yes, the officials were that precise when assessing how much food was eaten.

Food in each hand, Wendy alternated giant bites of each item, getting into a rhythm of bite, chew, swallow, bite. After a while she was able to turn her attention elsewhere, taking in how her teammates were doing, and risking a look across the banquet tables at the other team.

Cassandra's prediction wasn't off: the two 'skinnier' girls were stuffing their mouths as best they could, but before long they were flagging. They were forcing themselves to eat, their chewing was slowing down.

The real problem was Jessi. In contrast to Wendy's team she was going forward with single-minded abandon. She would grab a platter of food, perch it on her belly, and hoover everything into her mouth. Once a plate was clean she swapped it for a fresh one. There was no rhyme or reason to what she ate; she just grabbed the nearest plate.

The 20 minute mark came, the Woodridge team down to one member plowing through her food and two people there for show. One of the girls had stopped trying to eat proper servings and was playing clean-up with Jessi's cast-aside trays, scooping up all the crumbs and sauce and remaining bits. The other girl was holding a giant glass of soda, holding it up to Jessi every now and then so she could replenish her fluids. Occasionally she would grab some food for herself, but she wasn't a factor anymore.

Wendy's team was still going strong, Nicole and Cassandra's determination boosting her own drive. They had cleared the first round of platters, moving onto deep dish pizza, bacon cheeseburgers and brownies the size of bricks.

The final seconds of the first half hour counted down, Wendy and her teammates trying to summon their second wind. Halfway there, and Wendy was feeling the contents of her stomach like a lump of concrete. She still had room, she wasn't in pain, but the pressure was building. She put it out of her mind and grabbed another brownie.

Across the tables Jessi was apparently slowing down, taking her time with each bite now.

People in the audience started cheering, most of them rooting for the hometeam. Wendy wished she could get a boost from that, but all she could do was concentrate on the food in front of her.

She looked across at Jessi, still cramming food into her mouth. Neither of her teammates were eating now – Jessi was cleaning each platter herself – but with Jessi's speed Wendy didn't believe victory was assured.

Then the immense girl paused mid-chew, a hand going to her belly. Could this be a lucky break for Wendy's team?

Jessi released a thundering belch, temporarily silencing the cheering crowd. And then she was back to stuffing food down her mouth, her speed a little quicker.

Cursing softly, Wendy went back to her own food, forcing another bite. The pressure in her own belly was climbing fast, she could feel it churning and storming, and then

BEEEEEEELCH!

Breathing was a little easier, the pressure eased. Hit with inspiration, Wendy grabbed a can of soda, chugging half of it in one go. The pressure started climbing again, and with a free hand Wendy started rubbing and slapping her belly until another burp came. And then another.

She worked fast to fill the empty space forming in her belly, finishing another slice of pizza and dunking the crust in garlic sauce to make it go down easier. And then, as she strained to reach over to grab more food (a difficult proposition, considering the state of her belly), another burst of inspiration hit. Grabbing a large bowl of gravy, Wendy fell back into her seat, breathed in and out a couple times, and then brought the bowl to her lips. Not stopping to think, she began drinking the gravy in great gulps.

The audience began cheering again, clapping and stomping their feet, and Wendy pushed herself forward, draining the bowl. There was still enough stuck to the bowl itself, and with all the determination she could muster Wendy grabbed a brownie and began wiping the bowl clean.

21:01 read the clock. Not yet at the two-third mark. When the bowl was practically spotless Wendy tossed it aside and tried to catch her breath. The crowd was almost screaming, but Wendy could only moan. She was struggling to breathe, her legs spread apart by her belly, and she didn't think she had any room left in her.

A sharp nudge hit her side. Nicole, her mouth full of cheeseburger, shot her a look. 'Don't stop. Find something to nibble, something to sip. Every calorie counts.'

Obeying, Wendy grabbed a cheeseburger and took a bite. She took a hefty bite and chewed, chewed, breathed and chewed. She swallowed, took another bite. She wasn't tasting it, but she kept eating.

Wendy's teammates seemed to be doing better than she was, but they had reached their own hurdles. Still, none of them stopped chewing or eating entirely.

When her burger was half done Wendy reached for a bowl of ice cream. By this point, more than two-thirds in, it was a bowl of soup, allowing Wendy to dunk her burger and making it easier to chew and swallow the second half. Grabbing another burger she repeated the process, building up something like momentum and carrying herself through the next ten minutes.

Across the tables Jessi had come to the end of her initial burst, her speed slowing down and each bout of chewing taking longer. But she wasn't in pain like Wendy was.

The ten minute mark approaching, the brownies and pizza were gone. When Nicole grabbed the last burger, dunking it in a bowl of BBQ sauce until the bread was mush, Cassandra grabbed a bowl of potato chips. She and Wendy began taking handfuls, letting them melt in their mouths before chewing once or twice and swallowing. Every mouthful swallowed made Wendy hurt more, but as the final minutes counted down her desire to finish strong started to build. Knowing the end was in sight she was able to ignore her brain shrieking 'You've had enough!' to keep shoving chips into her mouth.

Two minutes to go, all three were forcing themselves past the point of pain and common sense, taking giant bites of whatever was closest on hand and eating what they could. Their bodies were on autopilot now as the crowd counted down the last ten seconds.

“TIME!” The official called, and all the competitors held their hands out and dropped whatever they were holding. No attempts at eating after the fact would be tolerated.

As all the girls sat back and relaxed the referees gathered all the platters, both empty and those that had any food taken from them, for calorie counting. What felt like an hour (but maybe it was just 15 minutes) passed before the judges called for everyone's attention.

“The final tally,” the main official began, “has Woodridge at 22,850 calories consumed, and Miller High at 21,900 calories.”

Wendy started to groan, but then she noticed her teammates and the audience were still sitting expectant.

“For bonuses,” the official continued, “we are awarding 500 calories to Woodridge for dedicated gluttony, and 2,000 calories to Miller for creativity and dedicated gluttony.”

“What?” Wendy asked, the crowd around bursting into wild applause.

“We won,” Nicole said, “Remember what I said about bonus points for combining different foods?”

“It was you drinking the gravy straight from the bowl that put us over,” Cassandra said, slapping Wendy on the back.

Wendy supposed they should stand and soak up the applause, but her belly was so large and so heavy all she could was lean back, looking at it rising before her like a hill coming before a road. Her teammates were in the same boat, and for half an hour the three just sat there as their classmates and other fans came to congratulate them.

“Great job, Graham!” Mrs. Hood said when the three of them finally shuffled to the locker room to change. She threw her arms around Wendy, being careful not to squeeze too hard. “I have to say, I have never seen a rookie perform like that. Any chance you'd want to join the team permanently?”

“What about Kari?” The girl Wendy was there to replace for this contest.

“We're not limited to just three members,” Mrs. Hood said. “We can only enter three people in each contest.”

For all the discomfort still bothering her, Wendy had to admit she had enjoyed this. Nothing could break her of her love of eating she now knew, and the cheers of the people watching and the praise of the other eaters and Mrs. Hood made her feel good.

On the other hand, Wendy hadn't been able to hang out with her old friends much over the past week. Her 'training' during school left her too stuffed to meet up with them after class, and she felt/feared she was drifting away from them. The answer wasn't that clear cut.
1211122122.title: Wendy pushes herself to the limit and helps the...

choices: Wendy wake up the next day, finding her hunger still insatiable
Wendy's gluttony was a one-day thing, but her mother insists on feeding her
Wendy has a dream. A weird dream.
12111221222.content:
“Sure, I'll join!” Wendy said enthusiastically. Or as enthusiastically as she could given her still packed belly and labored breathing.

“Wonderful!” Mrs. Hood said, and the other girls slapped her on the back, welcoming her to the team proper.

When she met her mother in the parking lot, and after her mother had swooned over her daughter's performance, she settled in to the car, ready to go home and sleep until Monday morning. It was almost off-handedly that she mentioned to her mother she had joined the team as a permanent member, garnering another round of ecstatic glee from Mrs. Graham.

When they got home Wendy trudged to her bed and was out as soon as she hit the mattress. When she woke up the sun was sending its last bits of light through her window. She wanted to stay there, lying back and enjoying the warm feeling, but her belly had other ideas. Despite the pressure it had endured that morning, it was empty enough now that it not only could accept more food, it was demanding it.

Wendy was not one to disappoint. Heaving herself up, she made her way to the dining room to find her mother had already predicted her daughter's hunger (or maybe she just wanted to have plenty of food on hand to tempt Wendy). The table was filled with greasy, fatty dishes waiting for the growing teen.

Wasting no time, Wendy sat down and started on a plate of French fries and pile of teriyaki burgers. Then she had some caramel bites, then a key lime pie, then...

She ate with less determination than she had shown back at the match, but with no less enthusiasm or appetite. The empty plates piled up, a hint of pride entering Wendy as she had a growing tally of her gluttony sitting right there in front of her. It helped push her to keep eating after she was sated, an informal desire to take this as far as she could.

“Wonderful, Wendy,” her mother said, bringing in a plate of thick slices of ham. “Keep it up. I've still got another pie in the oven, plus some onion rings and curly fries coming up.”

“Oh, mom. I don't know if I can eat all that,” Wendy said; already she was starting to feel the first forceful signs of fullness.

“Nonsense, I know you can.” Her mother leaned down and pressed on Wendy's belly, feeling how much give there was. “Besides, if you're going to be a competitive eater you have to treat every meal like a training session. You can't just eat for fun anymore, you have to take it seriously. Stuff that belly, don't stop until you can't swallow another bite. I know there's a champion eater waiting to get out.”

Her mother's encouragement was odd, but effective. Buckling down, Wendy continued cleaning plate after plate. But she had her limits, and as her mother brought in the promised pie Wendy could feel she was at the end. Maybe a slice of pie and that would be it. It looked too good to leave sitting there untouched.

She cut a moderate size, but when Wendy brought the first forkful to her mouth something happened. Tasting the delectable meringue and fruit filling and graham cracker crust, she was hit with a sudden and undeniable desire to have it all. The whole pie. The idea of leaving food uneaten before her became shameful, but really she was just... greedy. Wanting more for the sake of having more.

It was as if her stomach was on the same wavelength, either emptying or expanding itself or doing something to allow her to not only eat the slice she had cut for herself, but the rest of the pie as well.

“I knew you had it in you,” her mother said, beaming at her daughter and the table full of empty plates. “We won't even have any leftovers tonight. That's a first!”

Rubbing her belly, Wendy was both confused by the new level of gluttony she had reached and eager to simply enjoy it.

“Actually, mom,” she burped, “is there any ice cream left? I could still go for more dessert.”

“Of course!” Her mother didn't hide her shock, nor her glee to see her daughter so gluttonous. “Wait right there.”

She went to the kitchen, then returned with three cartons of ice cream: rocky road, peanut butter, and mocha. Grabbing a serving spoon, Wendy dug in. When her mother came back with bottles of chocolate and caramel syrup, Wendy simply drank several chugs from each other, in-between spoonfuls of ice cream.

When it was done Wendy felt properly stuffed, but without any of the pain or discomfort she had grown accustomed to after weeks of indulging her appetite to its utmost. Looking her belly, looming large before her eyes like a monolith of flesh, she felt only a pleasant fullness.

She wondered if she could eat even more, but by this point it was almost 10:00 and she was starting to feel tired after a day spent sitting around, doing nothing but eating. Carrying herself to her bedroom, the full weight of all the food she had eaten for dinner pulled her along.
12111221222.title: Wendy decides to join the team, dedicated to ex...

choices: The next day, Wendy's appetite has an influence on the other girls
The next day, Wendy's appetite makes Kari, her new teammate, jealous
121112212221.content:
The next morning Wendy woke up as if it were a normal Sunday, the previous day's stuffing sessions only coming back to mind after she had showered, dressed, and went to the dining room to have breakfast.

Again her mother had gone all out, with stacks of pancakes, platters of bacon and punch bowls of gravy with biscuits like ice settled in covering all available table space. Starting 'slow,' Wendy pulled a bowl to her and began eating.

As she ate, she thought about her plans for the day. It would be good to call her friends and try to meet up with them. She felt a little guilty not having time for them in the lead-up to the match. She would call them after she was done eating, she decided.

But she did not stop eating. As she cleared one plate or bowl her mother brought another in, and Wendy's hunger would roll over each time, space in her stomach appearing as if by magic. When she looked over at the grandfather clock in the hallway and saw it was coming on 11 she did a double-take.

And then her mother came in with a rotisserie chicken, and Wendy's thoughts snapped back to food.

Breakfast turned into lunch, Wendy's belly expanding slowly but noticeably as she continued feeding a hunger that would not be satisfied, and as her mother continued cooking for a daughter she was never more proud of. When the lunch hour was passed the afternoon was spent with various snacks and finger foods, and then dinner signaled a stream of full-course dishes that could suit a family, but which ended up in the belly of one person: Wendy.

When she was too tired to continue eating, Wendy's belly was twice as large as she had ever seen it. Whatever impossible power was allowing it to empty in time with Wendy filling it was nonetheless required to follow at least some train of logic. Wendy's belly has swollen bigger and bigger as she ate, until it was a boulder filling her lap and pushing her away from the table.

Wendy had no idea what was going on, but stranger still was her acceptance of it. Falling onto her bed, laying on her side, she went to sleep feeling as content as ever.
121112212221.title: Wendy wake up the next day, finding her hunger ...

choices: Wendy finds her friends, and the three head to the mall and gorge
Wendy finds her friends, but they're angry at her for leaving them
Skip ahead a week, Wendy and her teammates are still insatiable
1211122122211.content:
Monday and back to school, which for most students meant eating but which meant for Wendy and her teammates hours of stuffing without let-up. Her introduction to Kari, a blonde junior who was the fourth (and smallest) member of the team, was restricted by the fact that the girls needed to have food in their mouths at all time, leading them to keeping their conversations to a minimum.

Which suited Wendy fine, because just like Sunday and Saturday evening her stomach was just not filling up. Back and forth she went, from the cafeteria line to the table reserved for the eating team, carrying two overflowing platters at a time and clearing them as fast as she could. At one point she took to getting giant bowls of chowder and melted cheese (the latter intended for nachos or fries), drinking them in quick chugs, hoping to fill herself up.

No doing. Her stomach expanded throughout the morning and afternoon, never giving the slightest hint of having enough. Even as the other girls at the table hit their respective walls and fell into 'nibble and sip' mode, Wendy was still taking full-sized bites of food to be quickly chewed and swallowed.

It took a while for the other girls to notice their teammate's ungodly appetite, so used to unwavering gorging were they. But once they saw Wendy stand up and walk to the cafeteria line for another calzone and more mozzarella sticks and more eclairs, while they were all leaning back, stroking their bellies and taking small bites of food that had turned cold, they began paying closer attention.

It was Nicole who broke the silence.

“Jesus, girl. It's almost 2:00 and you're still shoving food into your mouth. Do you have a tapeworm or something?”

Taking another bite of calzone before she answered, Wendy replied

“I don't know what it is, but since the weekend I just haven't been able to get full. I eat everything in front of me and I just want more.”

The other girls laughed at this, Cassandra saying

“And I thought I liked to eat. No wonder Mrs. Hood wanted you on the team so bad.”

“It's not even the eating,” Wendy said. “I see food and it's like, I just have to have it. Call it greed, but I want it all. I want everything.”

She stopped talking as she finished her calzone and started on her mozzarella sticks. The other girls laughed again, but it was a less joyful, more subdued laugh. One by one they looked at the plates in front of them, which seemed more and more appetizing as the solidness of the food in their belly died down.

Tentatively, each girl grabbed what they had been picking at and took a real bite. Not a massive one, but a real one. As they chewed their stomachs felt better, less crowded, and they took another bite. Bigger this time.

Before long all three were eating as if they were starting a regular meal, no pains of fullness or weariness of food bothering them. When Wendy stood up to get another round of food for herself, Kari and then Nicole followed, Cassandra only a moment behind.

The rest of the cafeteria was rather inert; at this point in the day most of the students couldn't dream of eating any more. So the sight of all four girls going up for more food drew a few curious stares.

None more curious than Mrs. Hood, the coach of the eating team. When the bell rang signaling the end of the day she went right to the team's table.

“Ladies, I don't know what got into you but that was astounding. If you can keep up that level of dedication we might... I don't want to jinx it, but we might have the best season we've ever had!”

The girls all smiled and said nothing, the oddness of what had happened sinking in with Nicole, Cassandra, and Kari while Wendy simply transferred her remaining pizza to a paper plate so she could finish it while leaving. She wanted to see if she could catch up with Tracy and Danica, since she wasn't able to hang out with them the day before.
1211122122211.title: The next day, Wendy's appetite has an influ...

choices: Helga suddenly got not just hungry, but ravenous
Helga behaved like normal, no unexplained hunger
12111221222111.content:
Her friends were near the entrance to the school, chatting with one another. Wendy trotted over to them, her food-swollen belly bouncing this way and that.

“Guys! Guys!” she waved, stuffing down the last slice of pizza as she called to them. They both turned to her and, happily, did not immediately turn away. “I am soooooo sorry for not meeting up with you yesterday, it was just-”

“It's cool, Wendy,” Danica said.

“And I'm so sorry I was distracted with the eating team. Please don't hate me!”

Wendy grabbed her two friends into a bear hug, quite a feat given her own girth. Tracy started to laugh as Wendy's drama queen act.

“We don't hate you, Wendy. We know you were busy. And you did great on Saturday, by the way.”

“You two saw me?” Wendy asked.

“We were in the audience,” Danica explained. “Guess you couldn't hear us cheering, but you gave the blonde whale a run for her money.”

“Yeah, keep that up and maybe you'll go pro,” Tracey added.

“Right now I'll be happy just hitting the mall. I've had enough food for now.”

But the words were proven to be false, because by the time they got to the mall Wendy's belly was starting to protest the empty space inside it. The teenager thought she was used to her appetite's growth, but she honestly felt a little intimidated that her stomach, still inflated like a balloon by all she had eaten at school, was not just ready for more but demanding it.

Not that she could refuse it. The thought of eating, once in her head, could not be shaken off.

“Hey, you two...” she started, a little embarrassed, “Do you mind if we hit the food court first?”

Danica laughed out loud.

“Seriously? After an entire school day you're still hungry?”

But Tracey, turning pink, said

“Actually, I could go for a shake, myself.”

“Alright, let's get some grub.” Danica said. But though she trailed behind her other friends as they made their way past the shops and kiosks, she subtly swung around past Wendy when the food court came into view. Wendy said nothing, though she stifled a laugh at Danica wanting to join in.

Tracy went first, thoughts of a lone milkshake replaced with a need for a full meal.

“Hi, can I have a double-triple burger with extra cheese and bacon, upgrade my fries to chili fries, and a large mozzarella sticks on the side? Also an extra-large strawberry shake.”

Wendy, scanning the menu for anything that did <i>not</i> look tasty, turned her attention to her friend's order. Her intrigue only grew when Danica stepped up and ordered roughly the same thing.

“Guess I'm not the only one still hungry,” she said to Danica when it was her turn at the register. “But let me show you how a lady truly eats.” She turned to the cashier. “I'll have two triple-triple burgers, with extra bacon, cheese and onion rings on each burger, extra-large combos for both, the fries upgraded to chili fries with both, two large orders of mozzarella sticks, two large orders of chicken strips with sweet chili sauce, three biscuits – make sure to include extra honey and butter – three large chocolate shakes, two large strawberry and I'll take half a dozen of the key lime pies and half a dozen cheesecake.”

Her friends could only shake their heads when they heard all that, and again when they saw Wendy balancing the two trays of food as she waddled to an open table. But as they watched her make her way through that small feast, steady and never wavering, humorous disbelief turned to awe.

Tracey and Danica finished their own food well before Wendy did, and when they were done they continued to enjoy the spectacle of their gorging friend.

“Where are you putting it all?” Tracey asked at one point.

“In here!” Wendy slapped her belly, the sound like some sort of drum. Danica reached out a hand and pressed her friend's tummy.

“Careful you don't explode.”

But a moment later, Danica stood up from the table.

“I'll be right back. I just want some more dessert.”

“What were you just saying to Wendy?” Tracey called, but the laugh in her voice died down as she herself got up and went to get more food.

This was the second time today Wendy had seen the people around her become hungrier. Not quite a pattern, but as she continued with her own meal she started to muse... What if she was the cause? What if she had the power to make people hungrier?

It sounded preposterous, but after spending so much time in this world Wendy was learning to be a little more open-minded.

Her friends came back with new meals (smaller ones, but more than just a dessert each), and Wendy herself made a run on the Chinese food place before she was satisfied. During all this time eating she was thinking, thinking of a way to test this theory out.

“Let's call Helga,” she said, referring to a friendly acquaintance of the three but not an actual friend per se. “I think she mentioned wanting to visit Bebe.”

“OK,” Danica said, leaning back to give her engorged belly some room and texting the other girl.

They met her at the store, all three moving a bit slow under their full bellies. Helga was a tall yet robust girl, not a gifted eater but able to avoid detention on any given day. She carried most of her weight in her breasts, and a fair chunk in her ass. When they got near Wendy made sure to embrace the taller girl in a hug, wondering if physical contact could enhance whatever magic she was unwittingly working.

They then began shopping and...
12111221222111.title: Wendy finds her friends, and the three head to ...

choices: The team is accused of cheating, using appetite enhancers
A college scout wants to recruit Wendy
Just kidding, the established routine continues
12111221222113.content:
After waddling around the front of the school for ten minutes, the stream of students falling to a trickle, Wendy gave up on finding her friends. It was when she was halfway home that she thought about texting them. Danica answered first.

SORRY WEN, TRACY HAS TO BABYSIT HER SISTER AND I WENT TO THE LIBRARY. BUT TOMORROW, DEFS. MEET US AT THE BUSSTOP.

Satisfied her friends weren't angry with her, Wendy practically skipped home, finding another feast waiting for her, courtesy of her mother.

It was routine for her now, Wendy sitting down and not leaving until she had eaten everything her mother made for her, empty plates and bowls piling up before her. She wasn't sure, but she could swear her mother was preparing even bigger dishes now. To match her daughter's growing appetite, or to trick Wendy into eating more without realizing she was? If the latter it was pointless; Wendy has no qualms about spending all day, every day stuffing her face.

This was borne out at school, as Wendy continued to spend the full day cleaning out trays of food and replacing them with more with regularity. Only now she was joined by the other girls. As if infected by Wendy's unexplainable appetite, the other three members of her team were no longer hitting a wall after a few hours of binging. Now they were also cleaning their plates and getting more from the start of school until the bell sounded at three.

And from what they were telling Wendy, their gorging was carrying on after school as well. Nicole and Cassandra did not have family members mooning over their constant stuffing the way Wendy did with her mother, but both had parents who understood and were willing to indulge their daughter regardless. The fridges and pantries at their houses were being kept continuously full, despite their best efforts to clean them out every evening.

Kari, meanwhile, was perhaps the most ecstatic about this change (other than Wendy, of course). Coming from a family of big women, Kari had always been seen as the 'runt' of the family. She had three older sisters, a mother, and four aunts who were all immense. She could not remember a time when there had not been at least one person in the kitchen cooking or in the dining room eating growing up, and when her appetite never got as big as theirs she began to despair. Joining the eating team had been a last-ditch effort on her part to awaken what she felt should be her true appetite.

And now that it seemingly had happened, she was over the moon. It took forever to draw her story her story out of her, so intent was she on eating as much as she could at every moment, but eventually Wendy found a kindred spirit in the growing blonde girl; someone who wanted to gorge and get fatter, and was loving the experience.

On Thursday Mrs. Hood stopped the girls before they left at the end of the day.

“Remember girls, there's another match on Saturday. It's a home game again, so be here at 9 AM, ready to eat.” She chuckled. “Who am I kidding? You girls are always ready to eat, aren't you?”

“Who will be competing this time?” Nicole asked. The rules restricted a team to only three members in a match.

“You, Graham and Carlson. Shaftoe, you'll be on the bench this time.”

Cassandra nodded, no sign if she was disappointed to not be competing or if she was understanding.

On Saturday Wendy came to the locker room ready to eat. She had to fight not to raid the pantry for more food after the 'small' meal her mother had served her, the promise of a buffet of treats the only thing keeping her appetite in check.

“I swear this wasn't as tight last time.”

Kari was pinching a fold of the spandex suit competitors wore, tugging on it and testing its elasticity.

“You've been doing a pretty good job eating this past week,” Nicole said, “Hop on the scale.”

Kari did so, Nicole coming around to read the digital display hidden by Kari's gut.

“265 pounds. You've definitely gained.”

“Can you read mine?” Wendy asked, suddenly seized by curiosity. Kari stepped aside and Wendy took her place.

“304 pounds. What were you last week?”

“284.”

“Damn. Twenty pounds in one week? You should think about going pro, or at least trying for a scholarship. Here, read off for me.”

“289.”

“We're all getting big.”

Wendy did not have much time to muse on her gains, for before long she and the other two were summoned to the gym for their match.

Unlike last week's opponents – made up of one immense woman and two fairly skinny ones – the team they were facing this time was made up of a more balanced trio of girls. Other than one having a distinct pear shape, all three were in the mid-to-upper 200's. Wendy looked at herself and her teammates, then back across the table. In a pound-to-pound contest, she thought her team had the edge.

In terms of appetite, it was no contest. When the starting bell rang she, Nicole and Kari were at it immediately, stuffing themselves for all they were worth. So was the opposing team, but the impression of a neck-and-neck battle turned to a mirage, then a dim memory, as the hour passed.

It was no different than a normal day of school; Wendy and her teammates could not get enough, determined as they were to try. For the first ten to fifteen minutes the other team was eating about as fast as they were, but one by one (the pear first) they started to flag. Taking longer to chew and swallow, taking smaller bites.

At the twenty minute mark Wendy grabbed a tall metal pitcher of milkshake and chugged the entire thing in one go, then grabbed a meat lover's pizza and folded it in half, eating it like a taco. Across the table her counterpart was practically nibbling at her burger.

Kari and Nicole were doing similar damage, the three bellies of their team swelling outward and straining their spandex suits to prevent even a temporary slowing of their eating.

Before the halfway point was reached the contest was over, and everyone could see it. The audience, predominantly Wendy's classmates and their families, was cheering for the home team, but it seemed redundant. The girls did not need encouragement.

By 40 minutes the audience had quieted down, the cheering giving way to a surprised yet awestruck silence. Wendy, Nicole and Kari were still going at it as if they had just started. There was no hint of competition for them, they weren't worried about the other team getting their second wind, they were just hungry.

The fact it was a competition was not forgotten, but they had no reason to care. Noticing a tray of deep-fried cheesecake practically untouched, Wendy shoved the rest of her garlic bread into her mouth and took a swig of cola. Speaking around the food, she asked

“Either of you want any of the cheesecake?”

because the typical 'strategy' of a match was to eat a variety of food, keeping your taste buds energized by never giving them a chance to get tired of one thing. But the match was won, and Wendy wanted to indulge her sweet tooth.

The other girls waved her on, so Wendy pulled the tray closer to her and, picking up a piece in each hand, began shoveling the fattening confection down her throat, cleaning the entire platter.

Kari took a cue from Wendy's single-mindedness, grabbing the tray of fried chicken and stripping all the skin off before dunking strips of meat into barbecue sauce. Nicole was fine picking and choosing, but when she picked something she would grab two or three servings before moving on to another dish.

When the final minute was called Wendy got a little more serious, because once time ran out they would have to stop eating. The other girls were similarly concerned, picking up the pace as the seconds counted down. It was frustrating to have to stop, but the assurance of victory and the cheers of the audience made Wendy feel good.

She wasn't full, of course, and after accepting all the personal congratulations and praise from the spectators Wendy was eager to get home and continue eating. It was as if the match was just a change of venue for her only passion in life: stuffing her face.

Come Monday, she received surprising news
12111221222113.title: Skip ahead a week, Wendy and her teammates are ...

choices: Wendy pushes it out of her thoughts; she just wants to eat for pleasure.
Wendy can't get Jessi out of her mind. She's determined to be the best.
121112212221133.content:
For the rest of Saturday and all through Sunday Wendy ate, almost forgetting what it was like to have an empty belly except for those brief moments when she first woke up but had not started eating. On Monday her mother didn't let her leave without a taking a basket of muffins, something to tide her over on the busride to school. She certainly understood her daughter.

She wasn't the only one needing something to carry her between eating at home and eating at school. The rest of her team was still as insatiable as her, Kari in particular happily enjoying something at any given moment.

If it wasn't for the eating competitions themselves Wendy wasn't sure she would notice one day differing from the other. It was all one stream of food, broken up only by sleep or moving between school and home or at times the mall. The only thing that really changed was what she was eating, or who she was eating with. At school she was with her teammates, and at the mall she would be with Danica and Tracy, who also seemed to be influenced by Wendy's appetite. Not as big as her teammates, they were still eating more, turning rounder and passing the average size of their classmates.

Wendy was aware she was growing fatter, unsurprising given how much she was eating, but it did not mean that much to her. It was just a byproduct of her binging. And with her teammates also getting fatter at a relative rate, she had little frame of reference for how much fatter she was getting.

It was two months into her new life before it started to truly resonate with her. Every week her team had gone against another school in an eating competition, the contests becoming less and less competitive as time went on. It was not that noticeable, but Wendy had picked up on her appetite becoming even greater as she got fatter, a change echoed in her teammates. The margin of victory got larger each week, as did the difference in size between Wendy's team and their opponents.

It was their seventh match of their season, their first after a bye week, with Wendy, Kari and Cassandra taking on Woolridge in a rematch of Wendy's first eating match. She still remembered the rush of joy from pulling out a win over the giant of a woman Jessi Reynolds, possibly the fattest person she had ever seen. The sheer magnitude in size difference between Wendy and Jessi had made the victory all the sweeter.

So imagine her surprise when she was sitting across from Jessi and two other, much smaller women, and she realized that not only herself but Kari and Cassandra were in the same realm as her, size-wise. It was surreal, looking at the sumo of a girl before her and then looking down at her own body. Her hips and butt spread across the bench she was sitting on, her belly pushed her legs apart, her arms rested on her hips, snuggling into the folds of her fat a little.

And Jessi was almost a mirror of her. Larger, yes, but the 'David and Goliath' vibe from two short months ago was gone.

Jessi provided more of a challenge than any single competitor her team had faced since Wendy joined, but there was the same problem as last time: her horrible nature meant her team was made up of two newbies, somehow roped in to serving alongside the pushy, selfish girl and unlikely to return later. Compared to the three huge, gluttonous girls of Wendy's team, the contest was still a no-brainer.

As the hour elapsed, Wendy's gaze kept returning to Jessi. It was not a team-versus-team contest; Wendy was pitting herself against the behemoth personally.

Like Wendy, Jessi seemed to have no limits. Once or twice she seemed to slow down, but then she would let out a tremendous belch and resume eating at her initial pace. Wendy, for her part, never stopped eating either, but there was something about Jessi that made her feel... small. Not just in the physical sense, but as if all of Wendy's gluttony was a child pretending to truly eat.

Wendy's team won, but she was left without any feeling of satisfaction for either the victory or her performance. She wondered why it was. Was something missing? Had she grown too used to curbstomping other eaters?

On the bus back to her school, where her mother was waiting to pick her up, Wendy thought it over, never finding a right answer. All through the evening she continued to eat and ruminate. She thought about it going to sleep, she thought about it when she woke up. It still bothered her Sunday night, and she knew she needed to do something about it.
121112212221133.title: Just kidding, the established routine continues

choices: Wendy's mother is excited to hear this.
Wendy's mother is concerned about her daughter's appetite getting out of hand.
1211122122211332.content:
On Sunday Mrs. Hood called Wendy and told her to come to school early on Monday.

“They way you girls have been growing, we need to update our records. No way are you 284 pounds.”

Wendy showed up an hour early, before the other three showed up. Mrs. Hood was already there, so she went with Wendy to the locker room to weigh her.

“434 ½ pounds. Keep this up and you'll have doubled your size.” The admiration was plain in Mrs. Hood's voice, but Wendy was not as satisfied as her.

“Um, coach? Do you know how big Jessi Reynolds is?”

Mrs. Hood eyed Wendy, a sly grin coming to her face.

“Wondering how you stack up to her? Off the top of my head I don't know for certain, but it's definitely above 500 pounds. The quarter-ton mark is goalpost few high school students reach, but she passed it over a year ago. She has to be even larger now. I'll find out her actual number, the coach at Woolridge and I know each other.”

“Could you? I-... I'm just curious.”

“It's good to have a goal, Graham. I'll let you know before the end of the day.”

It was in the afternoon that Mrs. Hood came up to the eating team's table, leaning down to talk to Wendy.

“Just got off the phone with the coach at Woolridge. Jessi Reynolds was weighed at 610 pounds even a month ago, but her weight has not plateaued so she should be a little bigger.”

Wendy could feel a hole grow in her belly at the news, a yawning chasm. It was not the room for more food she was perpetually living with; this was true hunger. She had a number now, a comparison point between her and Jessi. She... she didn't know why, but Wendy had to beat that girl.

She ate faster. She selected the most fattening fare and then covered it with whatever sauce, cream or syrup she could. She grabbed several milkshakes and drank them down. Liquid calories were easier to consume. She filled her mouth to bursting before chewing.

The other girls watched her, curious but by now used to Wendy's appetite. Attempting to break tension, Kira turned to the other two.

“So how big have you gotten?”

“340 pounds,” Nicole said.

“359,” Cassandra beamed.

“I'm up to 375. Want to hit 400 before the end of the semester.” Kira said, proudest of the three. From the smallest to the second-largest, she had transformed into a proper member of the team.

“You'll have no problem,” Cassandra said. “How big is Marcia?”

Kira's next oldest sister was 425 pounds, give or take. A good goal to aim for, she felt.

“But when you're sharing a house with my mother and aunt Clarissa, you always feel skinny.”

“Hey, Wendy. How big are you now?”

Wendy spoke around a mouthful of pancake and syrup. The first time the other girls didn't understand her, so she had to swallow and quickly repeat herself before cramming another forkful of pancake into her mouth.

“Holy crap, really?”

“And look at her still go. Are you really that hungry, or are you trying to get even bigger?”

“She's going pro, like I told her she should. Look at her. Not even Gina McKenzie can eat like that.”

Wendy could barely hear them, her mind was on her food. For the rest of the school day she ate like she had the metabolism of a hummingbird, and when the bell rang she made one last trip to the cafeteria line, filling her mother's basket with burgers and fries to eat while on the bus home.

When she got home she had already cleaned out the basket, getting anxious as the minutes passed by without anything to eat. She practically barreled through the door in her hurry to get to the dining room, stopping short when she saw her mother standing at the table, a sad expression on her face.

“What's wrong?” Wendy asked, expecting some horrible news about her father or other family member.

“I'm sorry, Wendy, but the oven broke this afternoon. It's an old thing, and the cost of repairing it isn't justifiable when it would make more sense to buy a new one. Dinner tonight is going to have to be takeout.”

Wendy exhaled. Was that all?

“What would you like me to order: Chinese or pizza?”

“Yes,” Wendy said, a tone of finality in her voice. Her mother laughed.

“OK. Let me place the orders, and if you want to start with dessert there's plenty of ice cream and cake ready as well. You feeling hungry?”

“I'm always hungry, mom. I-” She paused, cutting herself off. She had adapted to this new world pretty well, rolling with the unreality of having her dreams come true like this, but she hesitated before saying what she was about to say. Why? Why had it been so easy to accept her mother's change in personality and take advantage of it, but so difficult to open up to her?

Her mother turned around to look at her, an expectant look on her face. Frack it.

“I always want to eat, mom. It's why I joined the eating team, they let me do what I want to do all day at school. I don't know if you can ever make enough food for me. You can order the entire menu from Pizza Hut or Panda Express and I'll just want more. All I want to do is eat, all day, even day. To be the biggest, fattest woman who ever lived.”

Her mother did not react for a moment, and Wendy wondered if she had gone too far.
1211122122211332.title: Wendy can't get Jessi out of her mind. She&...

choices: 575 pounds. Still smaller than Jessi.
610 pounds. The same as Jessi's official weight.
645 pounds. Bigger than Jessi.
12111221222113321.content:
Her mother practically glowed. Closing the distance between the two of them, she embraced Wendy in a bearhug.

“I've wanted to hear that for so long. I never wanted to push you, but I've been waiting for you to become a true glutton. Don't worry, we'll have you fattened up in no time.”

Wendy smiled wryly. She couldn't be disturbed by her mother's excitement, when it was what she herself wanted, but it was still odd, her level of enthusiasm.

And 'odd' became something of a thread over the next week. Using the broken oven as an opening, Wendy's mother remade the entire kitchen into something appropriate for a restaurant. Knocking out the wall dividing it and the dining room, she brought in a second, larger refrigerator, a rotisserie oven, a stove with eight ranges, and a deep fryer fit for a McDonald's. She ordered cooking oil wholesale, cases of it coming in each week as she was experimented with deep-frying anything and everything she could think of.

If she was going overboard, Wendy was not about to complain. She loved the greasy taste of it all, often ordering seconds of things she particularly liked. But better than the taste was the results: Wendy's weight skyrocketed.

From 434 pounds she reached 450 before the week was done, then 476 by the following weekend. When spring break came Wendy did not even need to lose eating time traveling from her house to school and back. She would just wake up, shower, dress, and go to the dining room, where she passed the entire day.

Tracy and Danica would come by almost every day, as well as her teammates on the eating team. They were all astounded by Wendy's gains and insatiability, but being around her they were unable to feel a growing hunger themselves. There was always plenty of food on hand, Wendy's mother deathly afraid of ever leaving her daughter hungry, so more often than not the visiting girl would pull up a chair and spend an hour or so stuffing themselves alongside Wendy.

Come the first Monday back at school, the results of this regiment were obvious to anyone. Wendy stepped off the school bus like a hippo padding down the street. Her clothes, bought weeks ago, strained to keep her in line with the school's lax dress code; it looked like one sneeze would leave her naked.

There wasn't a part of her not buried under flabby flesh, from her face with its shrunken eyes and perpetually full cheeks down to her feet, the tops of them rising out of her pumps like bread rising in the pan. Her elbows and knees were gone, as was her neck. She was a stack of rolls on top of rolls, a pile of fat given human form.

Her teammates almost looked svelte next to her, and Nicole, standing near the school entrance when Wendy arrived, intercepted her before she reached the cafeteria.

“We've got to weigh you,” she said, Kari and Cassandra following behind.

“But I'm hungry,” Wendy said. That wasn't entirely the truth; she was always hungry, but that's not why she tried to fight back against being steered to the locker room. The truth was she was worried. Worried she hadn't gained enough, worried she was still a full step down from Jessi Reynolds.

“It'll only take a minute. Get on the scale.”

Wendy stepped gingerly on the scale, holding her breath as Nicole tried to bend over and read the results.
12111221222113321.title: Wendy's mother is excited to hear this.

choices: Her school and Jessi's were on opposite sides of the brackets
Her school and Jessi's could meet in the first round of the playoffs
121112212221133213.content:
“645 pounds,” Nicole recited softly. “Seriously, Wendy. How do you do it?”

“I just eat,” Wendy shrugged her pillowy shoulders. “Like I'm going to eat now.”

And she slowly turned her bulk around, heading for the cafeteria. She wasn't letting it show, but inside she was a storm of emotions. Joy and elation at passing Jessi, a slight tinge of caution (perhaps Jessi was bigger than her official record), and a lingering sense of unfulfillment. Was it enough to be bigger than her? Should she try to make her victory more real somehow?

As she ate the day away, Wendy thought it over. Would there be another rematch against Jessi's school? Wendy hadn't actually learned about the eating season and how it was carried out. And what about the playoffs? Were they playoffs? Jessi's school usually qualified, she had heard. Maybe she could meet her there.

But that wasn't enough. Wendy wanted something more personal. A one-on-one match. She should find Jessi's number, challenge her directly somehow.

The feeling of smallness that had haunted Wendy for weeks now was replaced with a feeling of immensity. She could feel her body's size and weight better than ever, and the knowledge that she built this, that she had transformed herself, filled her with pride. And it made her hungry.

She bested herself that day, cleaning more trays of food than she had ever done before and always returning for more. Wendy was still a girl on a mission, besting Jessi Reynolds, but with victory looking possible now she was not slacking off. She was more eager than ever to win.

At the end of the day, Wendy found Mrs. Hood and asked about how the competitive eating season was carried out. She didn't ask if there was a chance she could face Jessi, but when Mrs. Hood pulled out a chart of the qualifying matches (beginning in only a couple weeks) Wendy realized
121112212221133213.title: 645 pounds. Bigger than Jessi.

choices: Wendy continues to gain and get hungrier, leading to the first match
Wendy's appetite levels off, then shrinks before the first match
1211122122211332131.content:
Woodridge, the school Jessi Reynolds attended, was on the left side of the bracket, and Wendy had to search before finding her school on the other side.

“Earlier in the season I would have been a bit happy with this,” Mrs. Hood said, “We're up against Jackson High first, and after that it would be whoever won between Vargas and King. There would be an actual chance our school could get through the first round, maybe the second. Making it to the quarterfinals would have been amazing. Our school hasn't done that well in decades.

“But now you're on the team, and I don't know what it is but you've brought the best out in your teammates. To say nothing of your own dedication.” Mrs. Hood gave an approving look at Wendy's girth, practically bursting out of her clothes. “I think we have a chance to go all the way.”

“Woodridge is on the other side,” Wendy observed, keeping her thoughts private, “So we might have another match against Jessi for the finals.”

“Maybe, maybe not. Reynolds' lack of team spirit often undermines her team as a whole, and the past couple years they've been knocked out in the semifinals because the opposing team knew they only needed to beat one person to win. That's a powerful mental boost, you know?”

But Wendy was already treating this as a one-on-one contest.

She cleared her throat.

“Um, Mrs. Hood. I know this is my first season on the team, I'm not as experienced as the other girls, but I was wondering... If we make it to the finals, and we're facing Woodridge, can you promise to put me on the starting roster?”

Mrs. Hood filled the room with her laughter.

“Eager to face off against Reynolds again, Graham? I know what you're thinking, I know that look in your eyes when I mention Reynolds. You've got a rivalry with that girl. I'm certain it's what's been driving you these past couple months, and I'm not about to let that go to waste. Start you in the finals? Graham, I'm starting you in every match of the playoffs!”

Mrs. Hood clapped a hand onto Wendy's massive shoulder.

“You're the backbone of this team. The other girls are always trying to play catch-up with you and your appetite, but you keep pulling ahead. I'm not going to bench you during the most important part of the season.”

Wendy almost blushed, pleased as always by the support of her coach, but inside she was still conflicted. Yes, she wanted another match against Jessi; she wanted to not only best her but destroy her. But if Woodridge didn't make it to the finals she would... what, wait until next year?

She shook her head. No. She couldn't wait that long. But what could she do to make sure Woodridge advanced? Nothing, unfortunately. All she could do was concentrate on her own matches. The first one would be in two weeks, with three others after that, and she couldn't stand the idea of getting knocked out before she had a chance to face Jessi again.
1211122122211332131.title: Her school and Jessi's were on opposite sid...

choices: ...Jessi came into the restaurant.
...false alarm.
12111221222113321311.content:
Wendy was so fat, so gluttonous, that changes to her body and appetite were harder to see. As the days to the start of the competitive playoffs counted down the change she experienced was not in herself, but in everyone around her.

Miller High had qualified for the playoffs more times than not in recent memory, but had never made a real showing. But now they were dominating the other schools in the region, and it was sinking in that they could actually win this. Not just getting to the quarter- or semi-finals but winning it all.

Everyone knew who was responsible for it: Wendy. Her popularity at school was going up in leaps and bounds as she assumed the title of 'star athlete,' a new experience for her. She wasn't surprised by the guys inviting her on dates or the popular kids trying to draw her into their circle, but like so much else in this world these outings were always focused on food. The most popular kids were either the fattest (aside from Wendy, of course) or ones whose families owned buffets or fast food places in town, or often both. Access to the fattiest, most delicious food was one's ticket to social status in this world; Wendy picked up on this when a couple girls and guys would try to subtly impress her by offering her a free meal at this or that restaurant.

But her classmates were subtle compared to their parents. Like football back in Wendy's old world, competitive eating was a beloved past-time from professional on down to high school, and Miller High had its own booster club for the school's team. They hadn't been too active recently, but as the team's chances grew with Wendy's waistline so did the club's interest and membership. This meant even more invitations to free meals, but by people less shy about putting as much food in front of Wendy as they could.

Some of them seemed to be trying to get Wendy fatter than she was, but she quickly allayed any misconceptions about needing outside assistance getting ready for the tournament. She was too polite to outright say 'Just keep bringing me food, I can't get full,' but when a parent or restauranteur was showing a pronounced interest in her she went into competition mode, clearing plates and platters in record time and subtly implying they weren't feeding her fast enough. People caught on quick that Wendy was no flash in the pan (or that she was pregnant, a rumor that spread for a while to explain her leaps in appetite).

Though she was getting all the food she could want at home, her mother more or less living out of the kitchen by this point, Wendy welcomed the change in menu afforded by eating out. Even if it meant being surrounded by various admirers, hangers-on and bookies sizing up the competition in the coming playoffs, constantly interrupting her meal.

“Are there any competing eaters you're particularly worried about?”

The question came from a reporter for the local paper. Wendy was at a Chinese buffet, the hostess/owner bringing her trays of food so she didn't have to get up herself.

Wendy thought the question over, absentmindedly stuffing her cheeks with Peking duck and chewing. She had kept her preoccupation with Jessi secret so long she was afraid to voice it now, either because no one would think Jessi posed a threat or because she wanted to keep her major goal – best Jessi – private.

“I take every contest seriously,” she said, choosing a neutral route. “Some girls may be better eaters than others, but to me I always try to visualize them as bigger and hungrier than me. My appetite seems to kick into overdrive when I have to call upon it.”

“Any plans to go professional? There's been word that several college recruiters are coming to town, and everyone thinks you're the reason.”

“I haven't even finished a full season yet, but yeah, I can definitely see myself trying to go pro.”

Just then...
12111221222113321311.title: Wendy continues to gain and get hungrier, leadi...

choices: Horrified! Jessi is bigger than her again- how is she gonna catch up??
Smug! Jessi's downright pathetically thin next to her! Barely a quarter as big!
121112212221133213111.content:
The bell on the door rang loudly, cutting through the atmosphere of the place- and Wendy heard an all too familiar voice suddenly stop speaking. She tensed- it was Jessi, Jessi was here! And judging by how suddenly she'd cut herself off upon walking in- she'd spotted Wendy too.

Wendy was nervous- but the media was still crowded around her, so she didn't let it show. But...she hadn't seen Jessi in so long. She had no idea how big she was at this point- and she was afraid to find out, in case she didn't like the answer. But...she had to know. She just had to.

Slowly, the titanic teen turned her head- trying to keep it cool so it looked like a casual glance. She was too fat to turn her head that far- too many chins and rolls of neck fat, and her cheeks were too big- blocking her peripheral vision. Fortunately, Jessi had moved into the restaurant a bit- so Wendy didn't have to strain or move her blubber too much to see her.

1,500 pounds.

Of course- she had no way of knowing that- but she had a gut feeling Jessi's weight was around that number. The girl was huge compared to how Wendy remembered her- Wearing a massive pair of jeans that were barely covering her large doughy butt, and riding up to her shins. Her fat, doughy arms rested on her love handles- and her belly poured out in front of her, to the point where she needed a sort of cushioned shopping cart or wheelbarrow looking thing to hold it in as she waddled along.

Jessi was acting aloof, not looking at Wendy- so she couldn't get a read on how she felt. But Wendy was feeling...
121112212221133213111.title: ...Jessi came into the restaurant.

choices: Wendy's gluttony & body grow and grow- she gets exponentially fatter and fatter!
Suddenly, Jessi marches up and confronts Wendy in front of everyone
1211122122211332131112.content:
A sly smile slowly spread across the teen superstar's face, as she quickly returned to the sprawling banquet laid out before her- digging in and stuffing her face almost faster than the eager crowd could replenish her supply.

Jessi was getting big, and Wendy still looked forwards to facing her and beating her once and for all- but looking at their progress compared to one another made Wendy's anxiety about the match melt away. Heck, it was almost sad!

There currently wasn't a chair under Wendy's enormous, voluptuous, blubbery rump- as no chair in the whole restaurant would be capable of holding it. Even if they had a loveseat or sofa on hand, it wouldn't withstand Wendy's wonderous weight. For that matter, Wendy's rump was bare- her pale flesh on open display. Nobody cared about her modesty, of course- they were all too amazed, and people were more likely to fawn over her figure than tell her to cover up. Especially since most people were understanding that even the largest pair of sweatpants you could custom order wouldn't do much good. Each of Wendy's thighs- heck- each of Wendy's calves were thicker than a fully mature tree trunk. Even her feet had grown too big to be covered, poking out of her calve fat like big bags of dough, with five cute pudgy toes coming out from between a fold.

The only thing Wendy had in the way of clothes was a quote unquote 'shirt'- which at this point was barely a bra. Wendy's breasts were enormously oversized- billowing out in front of her, wobbling with her breaths- being just barely constrained by so much fabric you could make a hammock out of it.

A whole section of the restaurant had been cleared out to make way for Wendy- several sets of tables and chairs being pushed aside and put in the back, creating a cleared out area you could park a couple of cars in- which Wendy's blubber filled a majority of. Her glorious gut was pouring out in front of her- so big that she was not only able, but forced to eat off of it instead of a table- the crowd bringing her tray after tray of more and more food setting it on the surface of her belly. Wendy merely reaching out, straining slightly to reach around her bust as her arm fat squished up against it, grabbing mittfulls of food and shoveling it into her mouth, between the two large chubby cheeks which were fatter than some girl's bellies- and over a staircase of five proud jiggly chins.

She was able to waddle around laboriously with the help of several wheeled palettes- like they use to carry shipments of crates in a warehouse, but cushioned for her comfort. Two were under her butt- one for each cheek- since it was so big it would've rested on the ground when she stood up. Meanwhile, three were under her belly- all lined up next to each other, all laid vertically- because her belly went out in front of her several feet as well as being several feet wide. In fact, Wendy had grown too fat to fit through double doorways. But nobody minded- everyone just loved her more for it- and all the restaurants in town quickly remodeled to include a triple doorway, hoping for the honor of Wendy choosing their establishment to eat at. Heck- some places were getting ready to install quadruple doorways- anticipating the teen's continued growth.

Practically everywhere Wendy went, she was swarmed by a crowd of admirers- advocates- reporters and supporters- all clamoring to get a glimpse of the amazing athletic champion, the pride of their town- and her glorious ever growing body. The papers were full of close ups of her rolls and fat folds, cataloging how they seemed to get thicker and more plentiful by the day, as she was practically worshipped- the crowd awed by her gluttony, and eager to indulge it.

"Miss Wendy?" One of the reporters asked, snapping the utterly enormous fifteen year old back to reality. It seemed he'd noticed her look at Jessi. "Who was that? Someone you know? A competitor?"

Wendy smiled, pausing for a moment in her endless binge, her smiling face framed by blubber on all sides- the girl was so unfathomably fat her head almost appeared submerged in her own fat, as if in a sea. "Yeah- I've faced a lot of people, after all-" she replied, keeping her cool, neutral air. "It makes sense I'd see a few of them out in the open."

And so, Wendy continued eating- her newfound assurance that she was far ahead of Jessi not slowing her down in the slightest. If anything, it made her wanna eat more- get bigger faster! She was proud of herself for achieving such a size- surpassing someone who was once a real challenge. And she wanted to keep it up! Of course, it didn't hurt that everyone loved her for it.

So what if Jessi was 1,500 pounds? Heck, she could be generous and put Jessi at 2,000!

That didn't matter.

Not when Wendy's latest weigh-in put her at 9,670 pounds. And that was before she'd had her breakfast that morning~
1211122122211332131112.title: Smug! Jessi's skinny compared to her!

choices: Skip to the day of the contest
During the training to the contest
