Externally she said “I see we meet Woolridge in the first match,” trying to desperately keep calm. Mrs. Hood laughed loud enough to fill the room. “Eager to face off against Reynolds, again, I see.” “Yes,” Wendy admitted, trying to keep the excitement. “Don't burn the calories. You are jumping up and down,” Mrs. Hood said. Wendy only then realized that she was indeed jumping up and down. “Sorry,” Wendy said. “Go home and eat. Gain more weight to eat more,” Mrs. Hood said. “Yes Ma'am,” Wendy said, waddling off to her home.
1211122122211332132.title: Her school and Jessi's could meet in the fi...

choices: Another cooking class!
History, as expected...shedding light on the whys of this world...
12112.content:
Wendy trotted off to her first period class, her pudgy fingers greedily wrapped around a donut. As she shoved the treat down past her lips, she arrived at her classroom, only to find a kitchen in its place. Was she in the wrong room? The welcoming glances from her peers and teachers said otherwise, but this wasn't her class at all. She took a seat by her friends from the class she was supposed to be in, who were seated her, all slightly rounder than she recalled.

"So, today we're going to prepare chocolate fondue," her teacher said, her pudgy stomach pushing the buttons of her shirt.

What was going on her was a question Wendy chose not to answer. Instead, she focused on devouring the fondue and the ingredients to make it. Working in a group meant sharing, yes, but the vat of fondue in the end was more than enough to satisfy their guts.

Wendy walked away from the class rubbing her distended stomach, only to find, walking to her next period...
12112.title: Cuisine

choices: Next up: Lunch?!
School Assembly (Meaning eating contest!)
121121.content:
Wendy's jaw dropped, and her belly growled. Surely not ALL the classes would be cooking classes! Though, in her daze of gluttony, she currently saw no problems with this.

An overweight (natch), cheery italian chef motioned for everyone to walk in. A sluggish troupe of stuffed bellies marched in, their proud owners patting them and rubbing them as they awaited their teacher's instruction.

"Today," he said in the most stereotypical italian accent she'd ever heard outside of Nintendo, "We will be cooking deep dish lasagna." He motioned to his example, which was swimming in sauce, grease, and meat.
"Before we begin, samples, everyone! Mangia! Mangia!"

Plates of the lasagna were passed all around, and quickly messily devoured. Wendy belched, her shirt starting to ride up her taut belly.

The class progressed incredibly. They sampled every ingredient at least three times each, and by the time their lasagnas had actually been made and devoured, they were all in a daze, bloated bellies occasionally bumping into one another. Wendy massaged her own, then looked down at a bit of a surprise; Along with her now-almost potbelly, her breasts had begun to fatten up.
121121.title: Another cooking class!

choices: "We don't have classes after lunch...it lasts until 2:30..."
"We all share the same class: history...of food."
1211211.content:
Leaving the class, she found every student, tall and short, dashing toward the cafeteria. Curiously, she followed them, finding it mildly tricky to navigate through the fields of bloated bodies while massaging her stuffed paunch. The lines for the cafeteria food stretched out the door, and Wendy had to wait for several minutes, her mouth watering as fragrances drifted out from the open doors. Never before had cafeteria food smelt so good.

Still didn't explain why they were waiting.

An assembly?

"So why're we all here, again?" Wendy asked her group of pudgy friends as she appeared at their regular lunch table, her tray nearly breaking under the mounds of meats, sweets, and treats.

"Uh, lunch?" Carol, a pudgy redhead, replied.

"This early?"

Wendy's friend Ai, a Japanese girl who was still shockingly slender, albeit her stomach was bloated, raised an eyebrow in confusion. "Uh, Wendy, we always have lunch time now. Duh."

This world clearly was not her own. Smiling jubilantly to herself, Wendy pulled in next to her friends, ready to dig into her delicious food. "Oh, right. Just a bit out of it. Sorry! So what classes do ya have next?"

Again, they all stared at her as though she were nuts.
1211211.title: Next up: Lunch?!

choices: Lunch progresses, the food getting fattier and fattier.
Later, after school...
12112111.content:
Wendy struggled to first stifle a laugh, then upon realizing she was telling the truth, struggled to hide her extreme joy.

She eyed the room: Hundreds of bloated, fattening students as far as the eye could see, more than a few mildly gassy from eating all day. Food was stacked high up all around on grease-laden trays, the hungry students encouraged to just walk around and take what they pleased. Some students didn't even bother getting plates; they merely walked around, gobbling anything their greedy hands could reach.

It only took a minute for Wendy to mesh in with the clockwork machine: Get in a line, eat, repeat. Five doughnuts, a Sloppy Joe, a slushy, twelve cream puffs, not even a whole cheesecake made it past her rumbly, sloshy belly! And still it growled for more.

"Oop!" she squeaked after her belly had strained itself to the nth degree, finally popping a button off her shirt.

"Cute belly button." Ai giggled, poking Wendy's soft tummy.
12112111.title: "We don't have classes after lunch...it...

choices: Free choice

When the car finally got to Wendy's house, she squeezed out, said goodbye to her friends and made her way to the door while holding her big bloated gut. As she opened the door she was met by a mouthwatering smell of bacon, pizza and other foods that were definitely as unhealthy.

"Wendy, I was starting to get worried" came a voice from the kitchen. "Oh, I can tell by the way you look that you went to eat somewhere. Well I hope you still have room for dinner".

It was Wendy's mother, though Wendy couldn't almost recognize her at first. Her mother had gotten massive. Just this morning she had looked like her normal self just like the day before. But now Wendy's mom looked even fatter then Wendy herself. She was still wearing the the same clothes as she had in the morning, though saying she was wearing them wasn't that true. Her, now giant, belly was fully exposed and had her big breasts resting on it. It was a miracle her shirt was still able to cover them. The yoga pants she had on looked like they couldn't hold her bulk in for long. They were bursting at their seems and only barely covered her buttocks and you could easily see her panties that were on the brink of breaking apart.

Wendy looked at her mother in shock. "Hey mom... have you umm, put on some weight?" She said a bit nervously, while trying to think how her mother could have gained so much weight.

"Oh sweetie. You don't need to flatter me if you want some extra dessert. But thank you for noticing."

Thank you for noticing. Did her mother want to gain weight, Wendy thought. The same woman who has been commenting on her weight for years now.

"Now, I have already eaten my dinner... dinners, so don't worry about leaving me anything"

Wendy stepped in to the kitchen where her "dinner" was waiting for her. The table was completely covered in food. From pizza and hot dogs to cakes and ice cream, it was a meal that could feed families for weeks. If her mother had eaten even more then this, it was no wonder she was so huge. Wendy still felt full from her previous feasts but once she sat down she started to feel a little better. And once she started eating it felt like she hadn't eaten the whole day.

Wendy sat in the kitchen eating the mountain of food for a couple hours. During that time her mother had come in from time to time to snack on few handfuls of fattening foods and to comment on how it was so good to see Wendy growing into an attractive young lady. Finally after getting through most of the food Wendy started to feel the effects of the food she was eating. Her belly felt huge and it was starting to get hard to finish the meal so her mother had to help her get the last bites in.

"Now, now, Wendy, what kinda of a mother would I be if I let you leave your plate empty?"

Once Wendy had finished her meal she slowly made her way to her bedroom. She was finally able to get out of her clothes that have been constraining her growing body the whole day. Wendy looked so much fatter after this long day of stuffing her face. She wasn't sure if she had any clothes that could fit her, But right now she was too tired to think about that. Wendy plopped her massive bloated body down on her bed and fell fast asleep.

1211211111222.content:
The bell rang, and the school groaned. Lunch was over. Wendy had managed to eat a full 39 meals at the cafeteria today, and it showed. The entire school looked at her in admiration. Across from her, Ai looked from behind her own platters and spoke. “Looking good Wendy,” she said. Slowly Wendy staggered out of the cafeteria supported by her friends Danicia and Tracy. “What do we do now?” Tracy asked. “My mom planned a feast for all of us after school.” Ai responded. Is all I need to think about eating? Wendy wondered. “More food sounds good to me,” Tracy said. “Me too.” said Danicia. “Me three,” said Wendy. “That settles it. To my house we go.” Ai clipped. Motioning towards a car in the parking lot, she began walking. All of her friends climbed in. “Oh how the suspension sinks under our weight!” Tracy shouted excitedly. Getting in, Ai drove off.

Wendy remembered vaguely that Ai was came from a big family, but she did not expect the family to be the size that it was. Her father weighed about what she knew the last time they met, but her mother at least 1800. And each of her three sisters weighed 900 each. When the girls walked in, their mother was sprawled out on the couch watching sports. Competitive eating was on. “Mom. I brought my friends over to eat,” Ai said. Slowly getting up from the couch, staggering under her folds of fat, her mother responded, “Good for you. I will make sure to feed them right. They look so skinny,” she said, grabbing a fold of fat on each. “When I was your age, I was twice your size,” she said to Wendy. The four girls walked over to the dining room table and saw platters of food on them. “I apologize for the size of the feast. More will come,” Ai's mom said. The girls began eating.

“This chicken fajita is the best I ever tasted!” Wendy exclaimed. “Glad you like it.” To show her appreciation, Wendy devoured another two plates of fajitas at incredible speed. Tracy and Danicia ate at similar rates. It seemed only 30 minutes later, all the food on the table was eaten. And robots were serving the next course. “What's with the robots?” Wendy asked. “Because this is too much food for one human to carry and I don't want to burden my husband that much,” Ai's mom responded' grabbing a bowlful of rice as a robot passed by.

The meal continued, and eventually everyone had eaten their fill, or more accurately gorged themselves to the point where they could not even move. Wendy ate 40 platters worth of food. Tracy 39. Danicia 30. And Ai 60. Her belly bulged out from her generous clothing, spilling out onto her lap. Then Wendy got an idea, “How about if we have a weight gain contest?. The one who gains the most at the end of the month wins, in two categories.” she said. “Good idea. What categories?” “Percent of starting mass and absolute numbers. Prize to be determined by the winner.” “Okay. Let's all go home and start this.” the girls gain in unison.

12113.content:
Wendy groaned, more-or-less literally rolling out of bed. She looked in her mirror before anything, vaguely surprised to see the beginnings of a potbelly had plopped themselves on her previously average tummy. It wasn't a great surprise, yesterday had been nothing but eating, eating eating. Just before she began to question the weird new world, the glorious smells of breakfast had wafted to her nose.

"What am I smelling?!" she practically sung, walking into her kitchen, still in pajamas.
Her mother smiled back at her (She noticed her mom had gotten a big bigger herself).
"I made you your favorite: Frosting-dipped cheesecake with heaps of bacon and huge buttery pancakes! With doughnuts on the side!"

Wendy drooled, plopping her cushiony ass on her chair and digging in. Her tastebuds sung as the fatty, greasy food was shoved down her gullet, and her belly gurgled with satisfaction. Upon finishing the feast, she belched, and the abrupt movement caused the seam of her pajama pants to tear, fat bottom having bested her jammies.

"Oh, looks like we'll have to get you some new clothes!" her mother giggled.

121131.content:
Despite the tear in her seams, Wendy kept her cool. She got up off the chair, turned a full half circle, and walked off to her room, letting her mom know that she would be out "in a little bit."

"These damn pants..." The culprit refused to button, Wendy's pants, which had been somehow moved to just halfway up her thighs, were now refusing to button. The excess amount of pure white fat that grouped up whenever Wendy tried to button May have been the reason. "Alright, I need some new clothes." And with that, Wendy called her friends, Tracy and Danica, and arranged to meet at the mall.

-----–--------------------

"Hey!"

Wendy waved over to her two gal-pals, both looking slightly more pudgier than they had yesterday, though the combination sweatpants and sweatshirt made the job of judging weight that much harder.

"Hey Wendy! You ready to go in?" Tracy motioned towards the clothing shop, TrendyWare.

"Yeah, are you guys going to buy anything?"

"Nah, I'm covered," Tracy said.

"We'll just watch," followed Danica.

"Alright."

The next few minutes were full of grunts, sighs, and excuses as to why Wendy's size had gone up by two in just one day. "Impossible, no one gains weight that fast." The sad reality was that, somehow, Wendy had packed on enough poundage to cause her wardrobe malfunctions.

A small chorus of growls filled the area around the changing station, the three originators all looked up. "Time for lunch?" Tracy said.

Wendy looked once more at the mirror in the booth, her body stared back in all of its soft, chubby glory. "Yeah, time for lunch..."

1211312.content:
Heavenly Delights was a bakery just outside the mall. Normally the bakery was small and compact, serving delectable desserts to a handful of regulars and the occasional office worker who had forgotten donuts on the way to work. Now, the bakery stood three stories high, with multitudes of cakes and baked goods scattered throughout the store. Naturally, this all was free for the customers (and workers) to eat and enjoy, which a large group of people were already doing.

So it was that when Wendy and her gang showed up, Wendy was surprised, though that was slowly fading away as she grew accustomed to this new world, by the large amount of patrons gorging themselves.

"Alright, here we are. Let's get to it," Tracy said as she walked across the floor to a particularly appetizing cake, crammed with melted chocolate, and began stuffing her face.

"Count me in," Danica was already starting her lunch with a collection of eclairs.

Wendy, for her part, looked at her two best friends with some confusion. Why are they just letting themselves go like that? This can't be real, no business would just give away free stuff like this. But as her friends ate on, Wendy quickly realized that this business was definitely not normal. And so, with some hesitation, she began to look over a pile of doughnut holes, glazed and sugared varieties about as big as her fist, gingerly reaching out a hand to take one with.

"Nom, fheh Wenfdy, juf starf eatin'." It was hard to hear Tracy over the sound of cake in her mouth, but the girl's lack of manners aside, Wendy took that as her call to dig in and did just that.

The taste was glorious.

Now Wendy had always enjoyed junk food, as represented by her size, but these doughnut holes were putting all of her chips and cookies to shame. It was like a paradise in her mouth, with combinations of sugar and glazing mixing together to form a combination that would make any sweet-tooth cry. Wendy was just that sweet-tooth, and though she may not have been crying, her mind was screaming out in pure ecstasy. Never had she been able to enjoy something so profoundly delicious, and never again would she not!

One pile of thirty soon became two piles, then three, then four, then a blur of frantic eating to stuff as many delicious little holes as she could into her mouth and down her gullet. Small burps made extra room for more food, as a glass of milk somehow appeared next to Wendy as she ate. But it wasn't just doughnut holes that were being devoured, soon entire pies were finding their way into Wendy's stomach. The pants she was wearing, which had been tight that morning, had been completely opened in order to make room for her burgeoning belly.

------------------------------------------------------------

"Oh, ugh, never - Urp - again." With the maximum amount of food stuffed into her tummy, Wendy had stopped to let the mass digest. An intense stomach ache was the reward for her eating, but she could live with it, considering the food had just been so good. "It's like a rock."

If Wendy was doing bad, her best friends were in worse shape. Whereas Wendy had stopped at a reasonable (albeit still risky) amount, her friends had kept going, pulling their own bellies taunt in order to fit the absolute maximum amount of food. Groans and gurgles filled the area as the girls waited for their lunch to settle.

"What time is it?" Wendy asked.

"Around 3:00, we must've been in here, what, a good three hours?" Danica replied.

"Yeah, something, oh, like that," Tracy moved her self into a sitting position, resting against the bottom of a cake stand for support. Her belly reached out past her mid-thigh, defying conventional physics by still somehow sticking straight out.

And so it was the girls gurgled their way to sleep, letting the exceptionally fatty food make its way through their figures, filling fat cells around their poor bodies. Needless to say, the trio had a big future ahead of them.
1211312.title: Desserts and Pastries, Oh My!

choices: Wendy goes home to a huge dinner and some more loafing around.
The outcome of constant junk food is seen by the end of the week.
12113121.content:
Sweatpants are a great invention. Not only do they conceal any unwanted bulge, they are also extremely comfortable and somewhat cheap while also being fashionable. Right now, Wendy was really digging sweatpants. Considering her four sundae dinner last night, complete with around a full gallon of milk, her stomach refused to fit well into any of her pants.

And so, as Wendy got on the bus, she witnessed roughly three-quarters of her classmates wearing sweatpants or yoga pants or some other stretchy bottom that would comfortably hold their girth.

"Hey Wendy!" Towards the back of the bus sat Danica and Tracy, both of them were munching on chocolate bars, with Danica also eating from a bag of chips. Their own bellies were slightly visible underneath their shirts, peaking out to say hi to their laps and the world. Danica let out a small fart, "Excuse me!"

The bus ride was normal, or rather the new normal, every person on the bus was eating something, letting out small burps and farts to relieve the excess gas in their stomachs. Wendy had more or less stopped questioning this new world, after all, eating donuts for breakfast (along with more ice cream, some waffles that were closer to syrup than actual dough, and a half a cake) was not a bad thing to her. So what if her belly was constantly gurgling and her pants didn't fit her anymore, good food was constantly coming her way.

---------------------------------------------------------

Looking at her school, Wendy knew the bus ride could be considered a prologue to the amount of food and eating that was present in her school. Without missing a beat, Wendy followed her friends and grabbed an assortment of cookies from the cart located at the entrance. Sugar cookies, chocolate chip cookies, peanut butter cookies, all six inches across, all delicious.

1st period Geometry was no different, learning about tangent lines had never been as much fun as it was with a belly full of apple pie. 2nd period French was great with some eclairs, oui. 3rd period health class was a joke by this point, as the teacher had simply given her students liters of soda and to quench their thirst.

But Wendy noticed something unusual by 4th period. Whereas the hallways had been the same example of kids walking to class they had always been, now they were full of students with full tummies. And walking with a full tummy was rather hard to do. Wendy, Danica, and Tracy were all resting on the stairs, along with roughly forty of their chemistry classmates (some were sleeping off the food), eating some fried cheese. "I didn't know they had something like fired cheese, but it is pretty great!" Wendy said. "You bet! Nothing like some -pft- oh, 'scuse me, cheese to hit the spot." Tracy rubbed her belly, which was starting to feel the effects of constant junk food. "Oof, I think I might need to use the bathroom, seed you two later," she got up and slowly made her way towards the end of the hallway, cradling her upset stomach.

By the end of 4th period, Wendy wanted to simply fall asleep and not do anything for a while. Her body was trying to find some form of energy in all the food she had consumed, but all there was was fat, grease, and empty calories. So, when a thirty minute break came around, the whole school was in fact ready for some downtime, which they got and promptly used. Wendy slept for about fifteen minutes before her nose picked up a sour fragrance.

Turns out eating nothing but junk food all day has some adverse side effects, as with what happened with Tracy, but there was more. Wendy's belly had consumed just a little too much grease for one day, and the gas build-up in her bowels wasn't the only case of that. Surrounded by her classmates, all in the same predicament, the amount of foul air was quite high. Additionally, some girls had snapped their pant's button off, and needed to find some new bottoms.

Lunch was the same as before, filled with junk, Wendy and her friends tried to gorge themselves on the meal, and they all made it through three servings before their full stomachs had reached maximum capacity. Shuffling through the rest of her day, Wendy was in a complete haze. Food induced sleep plagued her throughout her classes and constant gas kept her belly bloated. By the end of the day, Wendy felt she had gained five pounds (which may have been accurate).

Going home, Wendy followed her classmates as they plodded out the front door, completely stuffed and bloated. Tracy had just used the bathroom for the third time that day, Danica was experiencing a wardrobe malfunction after ripping her bottoms down the crack (though she wasn't the only one), and Wendy was just in general reeling from the junk-filled day.

121131212.content:
"Wendy, time for breakfast!" Wendy's mom hollered from down the stairs, hoping to wake her daughter. "It's your favorite, ice cream!"

"Uggghhhh," Wendy turned to her side and rubbed her belly, which was gurgling and groaning. The past week had quickly gone from cool to terrible. The constant junk food had left Wendy bloated, lethargic, and gassy all the time. Even worse, she was constantly hungry, and being surrounded by junk food only made the problem worse. She hadn't done anything in school except eat, then she would snack until dinner, stuff herself to the max, then go to sleep. "Why does it have to taste so good?" Wendy's stomach growled, she was hungry again, but she knew that eating would just increase her worries.

One of her worries was currently rising and falling slowly under the covers. Her belly, which had been big even beforehand, had absolutely exploded over the past week. Her mom had bought her clothes on Wednesday and she had outgrown them by Saturday, as evident by her pajamas, which were straining to keep her behemoth belly in check. Her pants were overridden by her massive size, giving way to the globe of fat that stuck over them, practically consuming them. And Wendy's belly wasn't the only problem, her butt had fluffed out to form an extra cushion when she sat, and her thighs were permanently stuck together.

"Honey, your breakfast will melt!"

"Coming Mom!" Wendy tried to sit up, and after the fifth attempt she made it. Her belly splayed out across her lap, making the chore of getting out of her bed that much harder. If it wasn't for the desire to stuff her face with ice cream, Wendy may have never left.

Trudging across her bedroom, Wendy was stopped by the sight of her bathroom scale. Wanting to know just what the week had done to her figure, Wendy stepped onto the scale. The cold plastic startled her, but the real issue was trying to see past her tummy, which had hidden the numbers and most of her feet from view.

After bending over to see, Wendy was shocked by what the scale read.

262

Wendy had gained 22 pounds in a week. Or maybe it was just bloating. Either way, the numbers told her what she already knew: She was getting fat, and quickly.

But what was Wendy supposed to do? All the food in her world was junk food, exercise was out of the question as she was so bloated all the time that even walking was difficult, and trying to starve herself was out of the question. A loud grumble from her stomach interrupted Wendy's thoughts, she would have to take care of breakfast first.

The kitchen was like a feeding trough. A collection of sundaes, cones, waffle bowls, and ice cream pints was set on the counter. "Morning honey."

If Wendy had gained some serious weight, then her mother was gaining at the speed of light. Though her mom's figure had never been perfect, it certainly wasn't the corpulent women she saw today. A butt that was round like two watermelons, a stomach that was pooched out by her pants, and a chest that pushed her bra to the limits, all in all, Wendy's mom was filling out her clothes to the breaking point. And seeing her mom stuff another Twinkie into her mouth made Wendy realize that she wasn't stopping anytime soon.

Wendy sat her blossoming backside on a chair and began eating the sweet confection. She was used to the usual feast each morning, but her mom had been slowly upping the amount of food each day, to keep up with her daughter's new habits. And seeing how her daughter set about eating her breakfast, it wasn't without reason.

Wendy couldn't keep track of the food as she procedurally stuffed it into her gut. Flavors mixed together into a cacophony of tastes, all delicious, and left a gentle buzz from how cold they were. Chocolate syrup and whipped cream made the experience that much better, and before thirty minutes were up, Wendy had eaten through the meal.

"UUUURRRPPP, oh the was good. Thanks Mom." Wendy let out a few small burps as she waddled to the couch to watch the tube. And for the next four hours that was where she sat, letting the food settle while letting out small belches. She had gotten up, after some difficulty, to grab chips and soda, but other than that her morning was spent in a post-breakfast haze.
121131212.title: Coming Back to Bite Her (Larger) Butt

1211312121.content:
Wendy had almost expected the mall to have undertaken a similar transformation to the previous one. It seemed like everything in this new world was developing a more and more extreme attitude towards forcing junk food onto its greedily willing citizens. As it was, the same three story Heavenly Delights complex was still standing like a great monolith just on the entrance of the northern side of the centre, and the layout in general seemed to fit her previous knowledge. Wendy marvelled how, even before the alteration to reality, how the mall was geared towards slovenly behaviour, excessive consumption, and idle, frivolous expenditure of resources. It just seemed that in this new world, people were less inclined to be self-conscious or subtle about it. Now, hedonism was not just encouraged, but revelled in. But no matter how carefully designed the world was to cater to the voracious mouths, human biology was not so well-equipped.

Danica and Tracy were waiting for Wendy to arrive, and they both appeared to be dealing with the unlimited junk food even worse than Wendy herself. Though Wendy had at least made the walk, and was feeling tired but still basically capable of putting one foot in front of the other, her friends seemed to be really struggling.

"Jeez Wendy I don't..." heaved Danica, in a seated position and not willing to get up just yet, "I don't understand why I feel like this. I'm normally OK with this much food".

Wendy was not inclined to admit that "normally" was just an imaginary myth, and that in fact the world had not always been this way. But she helped her friend to her feet, amazed by the chub around her arms and midsection. Wendy had a chuckle to herself as she thought about how her "social circle" was finally growing. And being more circle-like by the day too.

The gluttony and desire that Wendy felt before the reality change a few days beforehand was what separated her from her friends. They were gaining weight but they didn't have the willpower and single-mindedness to eat through the pains of a full stomach. Even though Wendy had eaten a huge breakfast, her mind was already hovering into the realm of her next meal.

"Let's go to the food court next" Wendy interjected as the girls were standing outside a jewelry store staring at the plus-size rings for chubby fingers. Danica and Tracy were both a little wide-eyed at Wendy's suggestion, given how clear it was that the threesome were still digesting their respective massive morning meals. But by the laws of the new universe, they each had to give the impression that this was normal, that it was lunch time and therefore food must be consumed prolifically.

Human biology might not be infinitely malleable, but it can certainly stretch some way, and more than anything, it's very good at gradually getting used to new circumstances. So when Wendy shuffled into the food court, expecting to be greeted by waves of fullness that would have prevented her from enjoying her meal, she felt surprised to feel something different. Hunger. Not just a little big of hunger. Real desirous waves of hunger. Huge pulsating spasms of food-lust. Not only did her appetite return to her, but also her energy, that should not have been there given her weeks meals.

Wendy went to the first place in her eye-line, a taco stand, and ordered two extra large burrito meals. As the words came tumbling out of her mouth she felt a disorientation, and greedily demanded more and more. Nachos, and a beef taco, and ice cream and churros, and a milkshake, no two milkshakes. And make everything large. LARGE.

Wendy turned to her friends as she waited for her order to see the looks on their faces...

12113121221.content:
Author’s Note:

I found the last chapter to be of more quality and I didn’t like where it was heading. As such, I have left the option to continue the story below but I am treating the chapter below like the last chapter never happened.

Wendy woke up to the growling sounds of her belly. “Uggghhhh," Wendy moans as she started to rub her belly, hoping to calm it down a little. “Maybe the late night fried cheese balls wasn’t the best idea before bed,” Wendy thought to herself.

“Wendy, c’mon dear, breakfast is made and you have to still get ready for school,” her mom called from the kitchen below.

“Coming mom!” Wendy bellowed. Wendy got out of bed with a few grunts and burps escaping. She slowly walked over to the bathroom to freshen up. She looked over her body in the mirror and picked up her belly and then letting it drop and wobble for a few seconds. “I must have put on at least 5 pounds over the weekend,” Wendy said while patting her belly affectionately. Wendy thought back to all of her meals over the two day binge that was her weekend. After the ice cream breakfast she feasted on heavy pastas, greasy pizzas, and thick cheesecakes moving only to get more food, go to the bathroom, or sleep. Her stomach grumbles at the thought of all that food.

She makes her way over to the dresser and looks through her clothes. She then realized that her sweatpants and t-shirt she wore to bed were the only pieces of clothing to fit. Her t-shirt failed to cover her lower half of her doughy middle that hung over her waistband and sweatpants that looked close to being painted on. But they would have to do. “I should ask mom for new clothes today,” she remarked to herself as she slowly trudged her way down the stairs.

121232111221.content:
Her heart thumping in her chest, Sasha pushed the trolleys overloaded with sugary treats to within arm’s reach of Wendy, then quickly stepped back. The teen didn’t notice her skittishness: she was already starting on the first mass of food, gobbling up doughnuts and pies as if she had just woken up and needed to break her fast.

Sasha almost ran to the living room, where Wendy’s mother – herself a blubbery 900-pounds and just as lethargic and greedy as her daughter – was sitting on the sofa, eating bonbons by the bucket and watching trash TV.

“This is going to sound absurd, I know,” Sasha began, “but I think Wendy just ate Danicia and Tracey.”

Wendy’s mother gave her an ‘Are you kidding me?’ look.

“I just went into her room to give them all more snacks, and it was just Wendy, sitting on top of the largest belly I’ve ever seen. The other girls are gone.”

From down the hall, coming from Wendy’s room, the sound of a loud belch rang out.

“Guess she must have been really hungry,” her mother said, half-sarcastically.

“You don’t believe me?” Sasha was distraught, but she did understand how ridiculous she sounded. But she also knew what she had seen, and there weren’t exactly a lot of other explanations.

“It sounds incredible, but...” Wendy’s mother tossed a couple bonbons into her mouth, chewed them, and shrugged. “That girl’s got an appetite. Maybe you’re telling the truth.”

Another belch rang out, then a cry.

“Hey, Sasha. I’m almost done here.”

“Better get back to work.”

“But what if she eats me?” Sasha didn’t understand how Wendy’s mother hadn’t even considered that obvious question.

“If you keep feeding her she won’t.” A pause as more bonbons were munched, “Unless you want to quit.”

“No!” Sasha said reflexively. She had needed this job, and her fear of losing it immediately outweighed her fear of becoming another snack for Wendy. Even once she calmed down, returning to the kitchen to get more food, she reasoned that, like Wendy’s mother had said, she should be safe enough so long as she kept bringing Wendy more food.

And that was safer than her prospects if she lost this job. Her landlord wasn’t going to cut her any slack if she was late with rent again.

As she was pushing another pair of trolleys laden with cakes and tubs of ice cream down the hall, Wendy’s mother called out

“Tell her I just heard back from the school. All the renovations are done, they’re reopening on Monday.”

1212321112212.content:
Monday morning saw the herd of students returning to school, their footsteps plodding as they walked willingly or not-so-willingly back into their academic prison. The impromptu vacation, initially promised to last an entire year, had been a welcome respite from textbooks and pop quizzes, but now the fun was over.

There were a few students happy to be back, one of them (surprisingly) being the fattest of them all. Weighing over 2,500 pounds, Wendy lumbered her way through the parking lot and to the main gate, happily munching on a sackful of breakfast burritos and chicken biscuit sandwiches.

She was far from the only transformed student. Over the break many of her classmates had taken to overeating and lazing about, and the pounds had come to them just as they had Wendy. Not to the same extent – though Wendy didn’t think anyone had been following the same diet she had, she chuckled wickedly to herself – but almost half of the student population was straining their shirts and pants and dresses, so many overstuffed bellies, overripe butts and jiggling boobs or moobs barely contained by outfits that not too long ago had been form-fitting at least or baggy at most.

To the recently awakened cannibal they all looked so delicious, even more appetizing than the food she had in hand at the moment. And Sasha, out of fear for her life, had become an exceptional cook in a very short time, so that was saying something.

The first period of the day was preempted by an assembly, so everyone was ushered to the gym to crowd into the bleachers that were no longer up to the task of seating them all. A number of skinnier students were left standing on the sides, and a few of the heavier ones – 500 or 600-pounders – simply parked themselves on their ample rears on the floor.

Wendy didn’t pay much attention to the principal explaining that the out-of-the-blue school shut-down had been for the purposes of expanding the space in all the classrooms and the cafeteria. Walls between classrooms had been taken out to double the size of them, and temporary classes had been set up on the football and baseball fields.

He said something about the national population growing fatter faster than ever before, which made Wendy’s ears perk up, but then he went into some dry shit about reinforcing infrastructure or whatever and she tuned him out again.

Then they were released to go to second period and resume the school year for real. Wendy, not used to moving around too much at her current size, let everyone else file out of the auditorium first before she heaved herself back to her feet and began waddling to her physics class.

Even the quarter-ton students moved much faster than Wendy, who was left alone making her way down the hallway after a while. Panting, sweating a bit, she began to second-guess her decision to come back to school.

Then things began to go her way. Rounding a corner, she came across a boy and a girl standing in the middle of the hall, looking over a piece of paper.

“Room 115 is there,” the boy said, pointing behind him, “so we need to go that way.”

And his finger almost poked Wendy right in the belly.

“Oops,” he said. “Sorry.”

“No (huff) problem.” Catching her breath, she looked over the two lonely students. The boy was nicely plump, at least 200 pounds, but his friend had a good hundred pounds on him, with large basketball-sized breasts and a belly that hung down over her crotch. Mouth salivating, belly grumbling expectantly, she asked “Which class are you trying to get to?”

“120,” the girl said, as the boy leaned against her belly and showed her his map.

“I guess they changed all the numbers,” he said, but before he could finish his thought Wendy struck. Grabbing him by the arm, she jerked him across her belly and to her mouth, widening to cavern-size.

She swallowed him in a pair of heartbeats, before his friend could even process what she was seeing. Wendy didn’t give her a chance to react; even as she was slurping up his legs she was reaching out to grab the girl by her meaty shoulders, and then she was starting on her second course.

And then Wendy was by herself, her belly sagging heavier on the floor. Letting out a proper belch, she smiled and said

“At least I got a decent breakfast today.”

For the rest of the morning Wendy did the typical student thing, making space for herself to sit on the ground towards the back of the class (shoving classmates and their desks aside with her ample hips) and using her belly for a desk as she half-heartedly took notes.

When recess came she went into the women’s restroom, hoping to find one or two ladies unaware. On this she was disappointed, but when lunch came she made a slight detour back to the restroom before heading to the cafeteria to try her luck again.

This time fortune favored her. A trio of sophomores, two quite chubby and one proudly fat, were standing around gossiping when Wendy lurched her way through the door (even though all doors had been widened as part of the school remodeling it was still a tight-squeeze for the ton-plus teen). Three pairs of eyes bugged out, but the trio quickly recovered and resumed their gabbing.

Until Wendy was right in front of them, eyeing them as if lustily and licking her lips.

“Uh, what’s your problem?” the fattest girl asked, but Wendy was already grabbing her friend and gobbling her up. Then she grabbed the other not-as-fat girl and did likewise, before zeroing in on the 500-pounder left alone.

“Still so much room inside,” Wendy said to herself, “I wonder if I can ever get full.”

The quarter-ton girl started to scream, but Wendy pounced like a cobra, throwing her mouth over the other’s head and shoulders and then lifting her off the ground.

Then it was just Wendy.

Or so she thought. As she stood there, savoring the filling out of her belly, her happy moment was broken by a gasp from behind her.

12123211122122.content:
Wendy tensed up- having been caught red handed devouring classmates. She turned her head- but her fat cheeks obscured her view. Slowly, she hoisted a thick doughy leg and shuffled to the side, turning enough to get a look at who was behind her- the one who she heard gasp.

It was a student- respectably fat, around 450 lbs. Of course, they were utterly dwarfed by Wendy- who now, after eating up five corpulent classmates, weighed in just over a staggering 4,400 lbs- nearly gaining an entire second ton after eating some of the students. Though, Wendy hadn't fully digested her meals yet- so her body still mostly looked like it did at 2,500- already monstrously fat, with wide hips and a doughy wobbling rear, rolls of fat hanging off of her that were thicker than some other girl's thighs. The students she ate still sat in her behemoth belly- which was pouring out in front of her, great and round like a globe- bulging out several feet in front of her, almost as big as the rest of her body. Just imagining all that belly digesting and turning into more and more beautiful fat- it made Wendy's mouth water.

She took a labored step, grunting and heaving her belly along, moving towards the student- but they quickly stepped back- putting up their hands defensively.

"Wait- no no no, don't eat me!" They cried out.

"Whuh..." Wendy said, dumbly, panting from the effort of dragging her immensity around. "why...not?"

The student calmed down, before getting excited. "You- I saw you in assembly, you're Wendy, right?" Wendy nodded, her quadruple chin limiting her head movements a bit. The student grinned- "Wendy- oh my gosh, you're amazing! You're the fattest girl in the entire school, by a long shot!"

Wendy couldn't help but smirk, chuckling a little as she proudly rubbed her belly. "Yeah... I am pretty impreshive, but I'm alsho shtill hungry, y'know."

The student gulped nervously, "I- I know, but- you don't have to eat me! I can help you!"

Wendy raised an eyebrow. "Help me? How?"

The student jumped for joy- their plump belly wobbling as they did. "Ooh- this is great! I can't believe I get to help you keep growing! You're the most beautiful, perfect, fattest girl ever- I'm so glad I can help feed you!"

Wendy thought about it- she didn't even actually say yes yet. But...she was lazy- and waddling around getting her own prey was getting harder as she grew. And she did love being revered and praised. She sighed, smiling. "Alright- shure, kid. You can...feed me...help me keep....growing."

The student let out a squeal of delight. "Thank you, Wendy! Here- follow me, I know the perfect place you can sit down and rest- And I can bring a whole buncha students for you to eat right to you, without you needing to move a muscle!"

Wendy smiled, waddling after the student- her footsteps heavy and slow as she heaved her bulk along.

"Oh! Wait- I didn't even tell you my name!" The student said, turning back to face Wendy.

121232111222.content:
Wendy had always been a greedy gluttony girl, even before she made that wish which changed her life for the better. She'd been able to out-eat her whole extended family combined at every thanksgiving dinner, and if she ever found out about a new food she liked, she'd find a way to get her hands on it and gorge to her heart's content. And, as she'd discovered since eating Danicia and Tracey, she had a bit of a taste for people. In fact, since that day, Wendy had managed to eat seven more delicious, heart, obese individuals.

The first two had been Tracey's parents, who'd waddled on over to check on their daughter. Tracey's mom had been 850 pounds, and her dad was 750. Wendy's mom had told them that she could bring them both to where Tracey was...and she didn't technically lie. Danicia's parents on the other hand heard what happened, and came over, furious at first. Something odd happened though, when they had actually seen Wendy- her enormous blobby form jiggling like crazy as she continued to eat even then, they actually came around. They admitted that they loved how fat everybody was becoming, and saw the weight someone gained as a badge of honor. They'd hoped Danicia would outgrow her friends someday, but they agreed that for her to be added to the bountiful flabby rolls of such an amazing eater like Wendy was just as big an honor. In fact, they were proud she was the first one Wendy ate, viewing her as a trendsetter. That in mind, Danicia's 870 lb father and her 1,040 lb mother (even bigger than Wendy's mom), both willingly dove headfirst between Wendy's luscious, soft, fatty lips- Feeding themselves to her as well.The fifth person had been a pizza delivery girl, who seemed to clock in at a comparatively humble 600 lbs. Like many other delivery people, she'd been amazed by Wendy's sheer size, and had begged for the opportunity to feed the fleshy mountain of a teen all 2,000 triple extra large pizzas she'd ordered all by herself. And...well, around pizza 1,200 the poor girl got too close and her hand went into Wendy's mouth. Incapable of resisting another heftier treat, Wendy's greedy nature took over and she gulped the whole driver down. The owner of the pizza place was angry, and he was almost going to sue Wendy's family. But when the especially hefty man was driven over in the back of a van, and waddled his 1,330 pound body (likely a benefit of getting free pizza due to owning the joint) into their house to speak with them, he was so shocked and impressed by Wendy's size and weight that- just like Danicia's parents had- he agreed that she deserved all the fat more than he did, and settled out of court with both a promise of free pizza for life, and his own self.

The seventh person had been an odd but welcome case- A handsome young man of 2,260 pounds- the biggest one yet, just as big as Wendy after eating Danicia and Tracey- came knocking on Wendy's door, asking to see the amazing girl. He was almost entirely naked, wearing only a t-shirt covered in rips and tears, soaked almost entirely through with sweat, and barely able to cover his moobs. He waddled around with a wheeled platform on the ground, like the kind you'd transport cargo with, except he had to use it to hold up his massive quivering belly. His bare feet, too fat to squeeze into shoes or even socks, sweat so much that they left footprints, and his sloshy quivering butt was only a few inches from touching the ground even as he stood up. When he did get to squeeze through the door and see Wendy herself, he immediately professed his love for her- That he'd admired her for a long time, since he was actually a senior at her highschool. When he heard all those rumors about how she'd started eating people, he immediately began to binge as hard as he could, eating so much he couldn't breathe- Gaining as much weight as possible, so that he could be a satisfying snack. He apologized if he was too skinny for her, and begged her to eat him. Wendy had been taken aback at first, but giggled after a moment- wiggling one pudgy, useless finger- the closest thing she could do to a come hither gesture, considering how mind bendingly obese she'd become, and said to him in a singsong playful seductive voice, "....hurff....C'mere....hurff...ya...hurff....big.. ..BBUUOOOORRRRRRRPPP......hunk~" The boy's face lit up, as he gleefully wobbled forwards as fast as he could, his toes squishing into Wendy's belly fat as he, huffing and puffing, climbed up to her mouth. He embraced her squishy cheeks passionately, leaning forwards so much his moobs rested on her chins, and gave her a loving kiss on the lips. Those same thick, full, plump, luscious, stain-covered lips which her pudgy salivating tongue was licking clean of the young man's sweat a few minutes later, Wendy releasing a bout of flatulence so powerful it made her oceanic ass cheeks be blasted apart for a moment, before slamming back into eachother violently, clapping so loud it almost matched the fart itself, before the spoiled, greedy, titanic teenage slob called out between her mighty belches "BLLURURRRUUUAAAARRRRRURURP....More....GGGRRLLOOOORRRP{/ i}....donuts! UURRRRRRRPPP" Wendy's mom, Sasha, and the two additional maids Jane and Phoebe who Wendy's mom hired, eagerly set about their task, stuffing the fifteen year old blob who filled up most of the room herself. Even with all four of them working together- Wendy's mom even helping since she'd lost 400 pounds, going down from her impressive 900 to a mere 500. She didn't mind though, since she knew every calorie she burned, every pound she shaved off, every crumb of food she refused to eat, ended up making her beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, BEAUTIFUL daughter that much fatter. She considered hiring a few more maids to help, as she knew that making sure her amazing girl grew as much as possible was the most important thing in the world, and she feared that the four women working together would be unable to satisfy her incredible, beautiful, perfect appetite, squeezing around the ghostly pale stark naked blobby teen that filled up the room, wading through the two inch deep puddle of sweat which filled up the whole floor, climbing her tender fatty rolls to get close enough to her face covered in stains (some dating all the way back to the day all this started, since she literally never washed herself at all since this started) to feed her yet more, relishing the intoxicating stench of her body odor which was strongest around her deep armpits, massive sweaty bare feet the size of pillows- cute round toes wiggling lightly, the four women euphoric whenever one of her frequent bouts of hot, humid, explosive blasts of a belch or fart would wash over them. Just being around her divine enormity, drinking in her glorious atmosphere, Wendy's mom knew she just had to feed this girl- More and more and more, keeping her gaining and growing fatter and fatter was the most important thing in the world, and she couldn't fail her.

Wendy herself sat, blissful and greedy as ever, in the epicenter of her own body, joyously savoring the feeling of being so grossly indulged and worshipped.

Wendy weighed 14,660 pounds. That's more than 7 tons. That's heavier than an elephant.

Wendy was in heaven.

122.content:
Wendy screamed again "what have you done with my mother!"

Her mother just stood there for a moment, looking confused. Then, the anger evident on her face, she bellowed "I was always your mother. I was your mother when you took your first steps. I was your mother when you bought your first mini oven. I was your mother when you ate your first strip of bacon. Surely your remember eating your first strip of bacon? It was at 7:05 A.M, ten years ago yesterday." She paused "I AM your mother." she said, really emphasizing the AM.

Wendy stepped back for a minute, considering. She did in fact eat her first strip of bacon ten years ago yesterday. She apologetically whispered "Sorry mom." Recovering, she said "I had a nightmare last night in which you were replaced by a psycho robot. I had to make sure I was not still dreaming . No robot would know when I ate my first piece of bacon. Sorry."

Her mom, hugging her, said "that's okay. If you don't want to eat today, you don't have to. But everyone else will, I assure you."

Wendy responded "thanks".

Her mom then bellowed "John, Crysta, time to eat!"

Her older brother John and younger sister Crysta practically ran down the stairs to eat. Wendy looked them over for a minute. John was still the slender man he always was. But her sister Crysta was not. the Crysta she knew was 100 pounds, tops. This one looked easily thrice that. She decided not to comment on this. Having had to come up with a lie about a dream involving robots to explain her odd behavior to her mother, she did not want to do so again. She said she already ate when her sister asked, and then proceeded to get ready for school.

Wendy had a dream that she found a land of sweets in her closet. She ate and ate until she burst out of her clothes. It was then that she woke up and saw her parents in the doorway. "What?"

(For clarity's sake, the family's surname is Graham.) Mrs. Graham then said, "Wendy, are you all right?"

"Mom, Dad, why can't you just let me eat what I want? So what if I'm a little fat?" Wendy was still angry about last night. Mr. Graham then said, "Wendy, you know we love you, but you can't eat so much junk or you'll end up getting sick."

"Please, Wendy, we're just trying to help you," Mrs. Graham said. "We talked it over, though, and we've got an idea." Mr. Graham said, "We did find that there are some benefits to being fat, so we'll help you gain if that's what you want."

"Really?" Wendy was surprised that her parents are letting her get fat, but she was happy nonetheless. "Wow, thanks!"

Mr. Graham had a strange look on his face, but then said, "One thing, though, Wendy; you can still eat junk food, but just be careful about it, all right?"

"All right, Dad, fine." Wendy then rubbed her belly in anticipation for food. "I'm hungry."

Mrs. Graham then asked Wendy what she wanted for breakfast.

She changed into a yellow tank top that let her belly flow out and a white skirt that gave her a muffin top. "Hey, I look pretty good!" Wendy thought for a second and then rushed downstairs (with her belly jiggling of course).

She opened the pantry looking for ordinary food to stuff herself with. The second she opened it up, all the food she remembered being there was now junk food! The cereal was now M+ms, the loaf of bread was now chocolate cake, the applesauce was now fudge, the canned tuna was now canned hotdogs and more. Wendy then checked the refrigerator; same result. The pasta was now donuts, the salad was now ice-cream, the salad dressing was now chocolate sauce, and all the vegetables were now pizza, hamburgers, and cookies.

Wendy also looked at the kitchen as a whole. There was more food then usual, spilling out everywhere. "What the..." Wendy whispered to herself. Wendy's mom then walked into the room with grocery bags filled with more food.

"Hi dear, I saw that we are extreamly low on food so I went out and got some more." Mrs. Graham said. "What happened to our food?" Wendy asked. "What do you mean? It's always like this." "Where are all the vegetables?" "Vegetables? What are those? Some kind of new chips?" Mrs. Graham handed Wendy a bag of food. "There's your lunch." She said. Wendy then licked her lips and rushed up to her room.

She devoured the entire bag. She crammed each piece of candy, chips and other unhealthy food into her mouth. After that, she washed it down with a belly rub and a chocolate milkshake. She layed on her back, burped, and giggled. "Nothing can go wrong!" She said to herself.

Wendy was ravenous. Her appetite had become insatiable. She started grabbing and eating food with out even thought. Eating had become so automatic for her. Her mother kept bringing more and more food to her at the table and Wendy kept putting it away in to her gut. The past month had gone by in such a blur. Wendy currently sat at the table wearing a tank top 4 sizes too small. The extra 100 pounds didn't help out the wardrobe situation the plump girl had. Now at a bursting 260 lbs not much fit Wendy. Her pale white belly hung wildly out of her tank top and rested on her tree trunk thighs. Her thick meaty arms wobbled as she brought her hand to and from her mouth. Her swelled boobs hung freely in her tight tank, stretching the fabric.

Although the initial pleasure of eating beyond her bounds was past her, Wendy still loved to pack it away. During her breakfast, while she was consuming a tower of donuts, she remembered what she like so much about them. It was not just the fact that they were sugary and filled her growing stomach, it was how each one was unique and had their own texture and flavor, and not to mention delicious.

Wendy decided to slow down on the pork fest and start enjoying the flavor of all the junk food she was now surrounded with.

Wendy stopped to take a breath. She looked down at her expanded form. Her belly was so much bigger than she remembered it when she was only 160lbs. She didn't mind her new girth, and maybe, just maybe she enjoyed it.

1312321.content:
(Note: the last chapter contained an error. In the introduction she already weighed 260 lbs, so after gaining 100 she'd be at 360)

Mrs. Graham sighed in relief, wiping some sweat off of her forehead as she looked out proudly at her work. Mr. Graham smiled, placing his arm around her shoulder. "You did amazing, honey." He said. She giggled, "well I wouldn't have been able to do it without your help." He laughed, saying "Well it's a good thing we make such a great team, since we're gonna have to do this everyday." Mrs. Graham nodded, as a bright smile spread over her face. "Speaking of which...WENDY!" She called out joyfully. "Breakfast is ready!"

Her call was answered by a long silence, before a roaring explosion of flatulence which seemed to shake the whole house rung out from Wendy's bedroom, the huge fat teenage girl belching and farting at the same time as she woke up. They could smell it from the kitchen- hell, anyone who happened to be walking by could smell it from the sidewalk. A few moments later, they heard a resounding BOOM, which made a bit of plaster dust fall from the ceiling as they also felt it make the ground shake, like a tiny tremor. A few moments later, BOOM, again. BOOM. BOOM. BOOM. A few seconds between each mighty impact as they got closer, and closer. As the lumbering thundering behemoth slowly drew closer, they heard her breathing. Between every resounding stomp, a few long seconds of panting, huffing, and wheezing, more often than not accompanied by a couple good burps or a fart. As the BOOMs got louder, the smell got stronger and stronger until it was a thick miasma which filled the air. Slowly, a bit of pale, stained flesh, absolutely drenched in sweat which dripped off of it into a puddle, came into view, and Mr. and Mrs. Graham beamed as their pride and joy finally came into view.

Wendy grunted, pulling herself forwards, and sighing in relief as she finally squeezed out of that dang hallway, which she alone completely filled up. Her gargantuan body spilled out into the kitchen, free from the tight, restrictive walls. Wendy had been 5 feet tall just two months ago, back before her life mysteriously changed for the better. She was now five feet and four inches tall...at least, if you measured from the bottom of her foot to the top of her head. And all four of those inches came from the fat on her feet themselves, thick meaty soles and five round soft toes squishing like bags of doughy lard when she waddled. Of course, if you wanted to count the top of her breasts, belly, or butt- Or even her cheeks, like the ones on her face, then she'd get a few extra inches in height.

Over the past month, Wendy had continued to relentlessly gorge herself, taking sheer bliss in the endless hedonism of her lifestyle and the thrill of her growth. Her parents had seemed to somehow take an even greater bliss from her gain than she did, they'd gotten downright overzealous how much they stuffed her. In fact, on the rare occasions she did see other people they all seemed overly dedicated to stuffing her silly too. Delivery guys who would drop off more than three hundred pizzas at a time, saying they were all for her- All completely free. People from the neighborhood who were coming back from grocery shopping suddenly make a pit stop at her house, eager to feed her all the items they'd just bought because she "deserves it so much more" than they did. Complete strangers who seemed to just be passing by felt an inexplicable urge to pull in to the nearest fast food place and order everything they could possibly afford, only to suddenly get a second inexplicable urge to drop by Wendy's house and donate everything to her. Everyone all of a sudden seemed to hold her up on some sort of pedestal, eager to the point of fanaticism to feed her.

With all these sources so eager to stuff her, Wendy couldn't help but give in to her gluttonous, hedonistic, greedy nature and eat it all up. She wasn't a very tall girl, so she simply grew out while staying the same height. Even as her weight more than doubled...and then more than tripled, the tubby teen growing wider and wider rapidly, surpassing the one ton mark within the first two weeks of the month. It was no wonder she stopped wearing clothes...and stopped showering. And stopped brushing her teeth, and trying to hold back all her gas, and doing anything resembling exercise aside from stomping wherever the nearest food was.

Now Wendy was a staggering 2,700 pounds of pure greedy spoiled slob. She was more than three times wider than she was tall. Her naked body was usually spread eagle, her arms and legs so encased in thick fat that she had to keep them straight out, like she was in the middle of a jumping jack. Even her head was being totally squished between her chubby cheeks, each one as big as her belly back on the night all this started. Her belly and butt were so big they touched the ground, and piled up to be higher than her head when she was standing up. Sweat trickled down her several dozen square feet of fat rolls and deep folds, so much that it looked like she was being rained on by some invisible hurricane, droplets almost always flying off as her pale nude body almost constantly wobbled and jiggled. She was covered in a mosaic of food stains from her relentless messy gorging, Her body odor could make a person faint, her breath could knock someone out, and that wasn't even taking into account her near constant burping and flatulence. There was no denying it, in such an insanely short time Wendy had become the epitome of a slovenly spoiled hedonistic glutton. She stopped struggling to lift her enormous bare feet to stomp around, which sweat harder and stank worse than any other part of her body considering they were usually smotherd under all the flab of her legs. Relieved to be finished walking for now, she stood in place, panting, wheezing, gasping, belching, and farting up a storm, before she slammed her gargantuan fat rotund sweaty ass against the floor, making it jiggle like jello on steroids and cracking the tiles as she sat down on the floor, her legs sticking out so her oversized dirty sweaty bare feet were poking out in midair. Her ass seemed to rise even higher up when she sat, a good foot and a half taller than her head now. She belched again, incredibly loudly, making her cheeks jiggle.

"Good morning- cough- sweetheart!" Mrs. Graham said, lovingly admiring her the blob sitting in front of her. Wendy mumbled a lethargic "mrrph...gmornin...mstarvin..feed...feed..me.." before burping yet again. Mr. Graham laughed. "That's our growing girl!" He said proudly. "I think you'll really like what we planned today, Wendy! But you can't really appreciate it on an empty stomach now can ya, poor thing? You're just wasting away-" Wendy cut her off with a loud simultaneous belch and fart, kicking her fat feet and demanding "Then feed me!"
1312321.title: From two-sixty to two-tons in just two months

Wendy woke up later that night with an all-too-familiar pang in her big tummy. It was hunger. She made her way down the stairs as quietly as a girl with her... generousness... could.

141.content:
“No junk food, but I won’t complain about this,” Wendy mischievously whispered, licking her lips and patting her thick belly. Before she reached into the fridge, however, she heard a small sound behind her and turned around with a yelp. It turned out to be her little sister Crysta, a six year old girl with a plump figure similar to her big sister.

“You okay, Wendy?” Crysta was the only member of the family who was okay with Wendy’s eating and actually ate more then she should to be like Wendy. She clutched her stuffed bunny and stared at her big sister. This was another reason for their parents’ concern. They didn’t want Crysta to follow a bad example, but Crysta didn't mind her weight gain. She was rather proud to be 80 lbs. and rising.

“Mom and Dad want me to stop eating so much.” Wendy started reaching into the fridge and took out a piece of leftover pizza. “Who cares? Even if I am fat, if I want to eat, I’ll eat all I want!” Wendy stuffed the piece into her mouth and handed a slice to Crysta.

“Yeah, who cares? Eat until your tummy pops!” The two sisters finished the pizza between them, holding very stuffed bellies that popped buttons on their nightgowns. Crysta patted hers as she said, “We might get yelled at tomorrow.”

“Maybe, but it’s not like we can bring the pizza back now.” Wendy licked her fingers and gave her tummy a big slap. “I can say I ate it all so you don’t get in trouble.”

“Uh-uh, we can be grounded together.” The sisters had an unusually strong bond, not willing to leave each other in the lurch. They made it back to their room, dropping back into bed and falling asleep to the gurgling from their bodies.

The gurgling continued as the girls dreamed of swimming at the beach. They were growing fatter in their dream, bulging out of their swimsuits as they were turning into whales, at least in their minds. What happened outside their dreams was even stranger: cheeks swelled to greater volume, stomachs stretched out, more buttons flew off their gowns. Wendy and Crysta didn’t realize it, but they would wake up to an enormous surprise.

The next morning, just before 7 AM, the Graham sisters finally awoke, but how?

Wendy took out as much food as she could, set it down on the table, and began to dig in. She feasted for hours, until the fridge was empty, and Wendy, stained with food, was full. Her belly was bigger now, and she lumbered upstairs, to "sleep"...

When she awoke...

The huge cold pizzas, the pie, the cake... It had all been too good. And even though it was filling, Wendy's appetite had felt limitless. This is what it felt like to really eat without any restrictions! Despite her huge weight of 265lbs (the scales confirmed it, 5 more than last she knew), Wendy had always been a little held back in her consumption by her parents. But at midnight the fridge had been heaving and nobody could stop her. She had emptied the entirety of it into her heaving gut.

She wanted that sensation again. Bounding down the stairs, happy to note that nobody appeared to be at home, Wendy shuffled into the kitchen to find...

1421211.content:
Wendy's best friends, Tracy and Danica, were already waiting at the bus stop. Wendy was too preoccupied with her own increased girth to notice that her two classmates were also a little chunkier than normal. But she could be excused for missing her friends small change when her own belly was so noticeably larger and her school clothes were being strained to such uncomfortable tightness.

"Wow", said Danica, eyeing up Wendy's tummy. "Looks like you enjoyed your weekend. Midnight feast or what?"

Wendy burped as she thought of all the food she had consumed over the last two days. "Yeah, you could say that. It was the weirdest thing, my parents were just being total losers, telling me I shouldn't eat so much, and I said I wished they'd give me junk food for every meal. Then last night I woke up and the fridge was so full and I just ate soooo much oh my god it was SOOO good" Wendy explained, her own gluttonous thoughts running away with her. "And then for breakfast Ma made me cake! And lots of it. She's never done that before."

"I thought you normally had cake for breakfast?" Tracy said a bit bemused. "That's what all the other girls have. And why should you be eating less? Everybody loves a girl who can eat a lot."

Wendy was about to dispute this weird comment when Danica suddenly opened her bag and pulled a dozen muffins out. "Everybody knows you're the best eater in the school. And I couldn't finish my breakfast this morning so I brought leftovers for you."

"Oh yeah you can have mine too," said Tracy as she too opened her bag to reveal sweet treats. She dumped them onto Wendy, who immediately felt her large taut belly leap to attention with a mighty grumble. Putting sense and fullness aside, Wendy started to nibble on a muffin, watched on with something approaching awe by her two friends. What had happened here? Wendy seemed to have entered a world where gluttony was held up as a virtue, her perfect world!

In fact, Wendy was beginning to realise that she was enjoying food even more now that she seemed to have encouragement. Danica and Tracy were piling more and more cake into her hands and the nibbles were becoming larger bites, which were becoming whole muffins in one mouthful. Wendy's desire to consume every piece of food put near her was even more colossal then her rotund belly. In fact, Wendy pondered the possibility that if she had entered a world where attitudes food could change, maybe basic human biology could change too. Maybe things like stomach limits or sickness from over-eating were also a thing of the past. It certainly seemed that way as her stomach grew larger and tighter.

As Wendy chowed down on another muffin, the bus arrived...
1421211.title: Wendy's friends are not fat yet, but growing

choices: Wendy still wanted more food, she skipped lesson and stayed in the canteen
Wendy went to period 2, a history of cookery lesson
14212111.content:
The bus ride to school was a little odd, but frankly everything that had happened recently was odd from Wendy's perspective. The boys on the bus seemed to fawn over her a little bit, like all of a sudden she as the hottest girl in school, whilst the girls talked to her like she was the leader of the pack, the numero uno. And like Tracy and Danica, the other girls on the bus gave her their breakfast leftovers, like peace offerings. Wendy knew she would normally feel at least a little full but today she was ravenous for anything she could lay her hands on. She would eat a giant sugared donut handed to her by one girl in the year below and before she could even swallow another girl would appear with a bacon roll, or a half-finished waffle, or some other fatty breakfast treat, and Wendy would greedily consume it with barely a second thought, and her stomach would grumble with desirous pangs regardless of her constant consumption.

Wendy quickly got used to keeping quiet about how odd her new world was and just eating, it seemed as if her biology was keeping track with her psychology, meaning that anything she wanted to eat, her body was suddenly able to handle it. The uniform she had squeezed herself into had ridden up into a belly shirt, a muffin top was plainly visible above the standard-school skirt, and though the clothes were generally unflattering Wendy's boobs were an impressive sight, somehow she had manage to grow enough to produce a line of cleavage that the school had presumably thought impossible when their designed the line.

Arriving at school she found, to her surprise, not that she allowed that shock to be noticeable, that first period was not a lesson but was in fact breakfast. Forty-five minutes out of the day which was dedicated to every student sitting in the canteen and filling themselves with as much food as possible. When Wendy first went to the counter she asked for ten rashers of bacon, ten sausages, four burger patties, five portions of fries and an entire pizza, but she found that she had finished all this within twenty minutes, and needed to go for seconds. This time she decided to go with all dessert, which she had bizarrely missed first time out, and found herself walking back with a tray laden with a mountain of cake and ice cream topped with whipped cream. She gorged herself, unaware of her friends sitting with her remarking on what an immense meal she had brought back, even for a well-known glutton such as herself.

Wendy was simply incapable of feeling full, no matter how much food was forced into her mouth, (and she was forcing as much as seemed physically possible). Her belly stretched, her clothes grew tighter, her weight climbed, and yet, inside her body, there was no fullness. She just ate and ate and ate and ate and enjoyed and savoured and felt an almost orgasmic satisfaction and ate and consumed and ATE. But full? Never.

And so finally, after some astonishing number of plates, period one ended and period two was due to begin...

She felt each of her sides graze the double width doorframe.

Though, she sort of got the impression that they got extra just for her, as evidenced by the seven three-decker cakes, nine full platters of cheeseburgers, and 14 entire pizzas (not counting the tons of spare slices, which must have equalled like 20 more).

She squeezed into the door to period 2, and squeezed... and squeezed. It was only with the help of dozens of students, pushing her backside (doubtlessly in paradise), did she finally get through. At this achievement, several people gave her reward food.

The teacher smiled at the class, and wrote "History" on the board. Wendy was ready to sigh in annoyance, before the teacher wrote "of fast food and sweets".
