1422.content:
Wendy awoke to find her belly was empty: she was, in fact, having a dream. Wendy pouted a little when she discovered she wasn't stuffed to the brim like she thought, but then she noticed something by her bed: a mini-fridge with a note on it.

"Dear Ms. Graham: your refrigerator should now be in fine working order. We thank you for your patronage. Sincerely, Silver Repairs."

Wendy had never had a min-fridge in her room before, (her parents wouldn't have it in order to control her eating), but she didn't question it and opened it to find a small collection of cakes and pies that she drooled over, then quickly gobbled. She felt her tummy stretch her nightgown as she finished and giggled as she patted it and licked her lips.

"Yummy! But I still don't feel full...." Wendy usually filled up after a few desserts like that, but she was still feeling hungry. She walked over to her closet to change into her school uniform, a white buttoned t-shirt and pink plaid skirt, though they were both quite short on Wendy, exposing her belly and either just barely or not quite covering her white panties. "Well, I guess that's still normal." Wendy liked how tight her clothes became as she got fatter, especially with the aforementioned exposure taking place. Just then, Wendy caught a whiff of something delicious. She bounded downstairs to find her mother cooking a huge stack of chocolate chip pancakes.

"About time you got down here, sleepyhead," her mother told her. "Did you get the note about the fridge?"

Wendy fidgeted with her red ponytail a bit. "Yeah, mom, I got it."

"Then you must have also had your cakes and pies. Hope you still have room for breakfast." Now Wendy was truly confused. Just last night, her parents wanted to put a stop to her eating junk food, and this morning, her mother is making her pancakes. Wendy's belly gave a small rumble, letting her know to stop thinking and start eating.

Things only got stranger after breakfast, though. After Wendy had her fill of pancakes, popping a button on her shirt in the process, she waddled out of the house to her bus stop, patting her overstuffed tummy all the way there. She then noticed two other girls doing the same thing at the stop. Wendy discovered they were both about as fat as she was, exposed bellies and panties included. She then noticed their hair: one girl had a long black low ponytail, like one of her best friends, Danica Yun. The other had medium-length blond pigtails, the same style as her other best friend, Tracey Smith. Wendy was shocked to find that they were indeed her two best friends, at double the size she remembered them.

"Hey, Wendy!" The girls shouted in unison and waddled over to give their best friend a hug. Wendy embraced her two friends in the squishy hug, but wasn't sure what to do next.
1422.title: It was a dream... but something's off...

choices: The girls learn more about cooking and fattening.
The girls learn about regular academics.
14221.content:
"Hey, girls," Wendy said as they released her from the hug. She looked over her friends as they adjusted their skirts, which, like Wendy's, exposed their panties a little, though they didn't seem to care that much. Wendy noticed flashes of white around their rears each time they took a step, and their shirts rode up their bellies when they stretched.

"So Wendy, you feel like going shopping after school?" Danica asked. Wendy snapped out of her state of observation.

"Yeah, sure," Wendy responded.

"You okay, Wendy? You seem a little off," Tracey replied. "You sure you had enough to eat this morning?" Of course she did, but Wendy didn't really know what "enough" was here. She was also a bit skeptical about her friends' new support of her eating habits, since they were a little concerned before. Ultimately, Wendy just ignored it and continued the conversation.

"Yeah, I'm fine, Tracey. Hey, Danica, where's your sisters? They should be here soon."

"Oh, those little balls of energy can't get enough of my mom's cooking," Danica replied. "They'll be here after they finish their seconds." Danica wasn't kidding when she said her sisters were balls of energy, though they were also balls of fat now. They came by the bus stop once Danica mentioned them, half bouncing and half rolling to their big sister.

"HEY DANI!" Danica smiled at the nickname her little sisters gave her, and hugged them both. Lily and Carrie Yun were 6 year old identical twins who gained a penchant for their appetites and were rather chubby, at least that's how Wendy knew them. Here, they were little girls who were fat and round enough that they rolled like balls wherever they went. Both wore their hair in pigtails like Tracey, only they were much longer, reaching to their fat rears, both clad in white panties with pink flowers. The twins wore the same uniforms as the older girls, except smaller, completing their identical appearance. The only way to tell them apart was their bellies: Lily had freckles around her navel shaped like a star, and Carrie's were shaped like a heart.

"Looks like you two had a filling breakfast," Danica teased, tickling and patting their stuffed tummies. The twins giggled and did the same to each other. As the girls started laughing, their bus arrived and the five of them walked on, or in the twins' case, bounced on. Wendy noticed that the rest of the girls on the bus, as well as at the school, had all apparently doubled in weight or greater, showing off their bellies and panties as if it were an everyday occurrence. Younger girls like Lily and Carrie had also become little balls of fat, rolling around and having a good time. (The Norton Girls' School worked with girls of all ages from kindergarten to high school age, as there weren't many people in the city.) What's more, the bus served the girls donuts, vending machines filled with junk food were everywhere, and the cafeteria served full breakfasts filled with fattening food that all the girls, even those like Wendy and her friends that stuffed themselves to the brim earlier, were eager to chow down on. Wendy couldn't believe it, but she was too excited to stuff herself more to care. After the meal, the girls heaved themselves to their classrooms, with the twins heading to the area for younger girls. In both cases, snacks would be provided to satisfy, though they'd be too stuffed to accept right now.
14221.title: Ignore it for now

Wendy was surprised when she waddled into her class and found a fork and knife at every desk. She squeezed into her desk and noticed that her teacher was fat as well.

Wendy was a bit confused in class. Her first period class was supposed to history but instead they just learned about desserts. She whispered to Danica “what class is this?”

“Uh, what? This is intro to desserts and pastries. You know that silly.” Danica said with chuckle. Wendy just went along with it. The class consisted of trying different desserts and studying various kinds of desserts. It was the best class Wendy had ever had. In fact the whole school day had been the best school day she ever had. All her classes were about cooking, eating, and food. Her classes covered how to use butter more in meals, what things could be deep fried, as well as a breakdown of the standardized mcdonalds menu. Plus there was a 2 hour lunch period which Wendy happily took advantage of. She spent the bus ride home massaging her bloated belly, eating various snacks they had on the bus, and recapping her day with her friends.
142211.title: The girls learn more about cooking and fattening.

1422111.content:
Wendy might not have understood what was happening around her, but she was rather pleased that the fat life was the life for girls in her town. Her classmates were all stuffed and happy as they rode home on the bus, eating snacks or comparing bellies that bounced as the school bus did. Occasionally, a button that managed to stay on during the school day would pop off a girl's shirt or a skirt's zipper would break as well, only adding praise for that girl. Wendy couldn't help but giggle at these developments, as did her friends.

"I'll see if my mom can give us a ride to the mall," Wendy told Tracey and Danica after getting off the bus. Since Norton was so small, the nearest big attractions were a city over in Seattle. As the girls waddled, or in Lily and Carrie's case, rolled home, Wendy thought about what else might have changed.

After Wendy got home, she went to see her little sister Crysta, who'd been sick for the last couple of days. She was the same age as Lily and Carrie and their best friend, whom they'd missed the past week. Like the twins, Crysta was initially a big eater and merely chubby, and had become a big ball of fat in this new world. She was laying on her bed watching TV and eating cookies with a sense of complete abandon. Wendy laughed a bit as her sister's tummy grew out of her pink nightgown and stretching her matching panties. She patted Crysta on her hair bun to get her attention.

"Hey, Crysta." "Hi, Wendy." "What're you watching?" "Sam and Cat. I mean, the girls who play them." Wendy then saw something rather shocking: both Jennette McCurdy and Ariana Grande appeared to have tripled in weight, looking somewhat fatter than Wendy herself, much like the girls in her town. Both actresses also looked rather content with their fat, standing rather proudly. They'd also pat their bellies absentmindedly every now and then. The girls' mother Mary then came in with another bowl of cookies and a gallon of strawberry milk.

"Girls, I brought more snacks. Oh, Wendy, just give me about an hour and I can drive you girls to the mall." As she set down the new bowl, Wendy began asking more questions in her head about the new world, such as if every actress had suddenly gotten huge. After eating and drinking her fill, she checked the Internet and saw that the younger actresses out there had gotten fatter, and it extended to fictional characters, too, such as Kim Possible and Sailor Moon, despite the shows having been finished for years. Although Wendy still enjoyed this new fat-positive world, she had more questions than ever now.

As she changed into a yellow tank top and blue knee-length skirt, she wondered what to do first. The new Super Sumo Sisters game was coming out at the mall (Super Smash Bros. still existed, but this was a side series beginning with this installment.), but she was still very curious about what had happened.
1422111.title: Extra Stuffing

choices: Get some clothing. Wendy's outfit is feeling tight.
The game store. Maybe get an idea of how pervasive fat women are in pop culture.
14221111.content:
Wendy started to move her searches back further in time, looking up actresses and singers famous at the turn of the century, then in the 90's, finding the same thing: famous women, and apparently all women, were much fatter than they had been the day before. How long had this been going on?

Her search was cut short when her mother called her to drive her to the mall. Putting her questions on hold, Wendy bounced out to the car. Stopping to pick up Tracey and Danica first, her mom drove the three to the mall. Handing a wad of bills to Wendy, she said she'd be back in a couple hours to pick them up.

“Where we should go first?” Tracey asked as the three went in through the side entrance near the parking garage. But Wendy didn't hear her, because she was too busy being surprised by the sudden appearance of a food court at one end of the V-shaped mall. Wasn't the food court always in the middle of the building?

But then they passed a kiosk with a floorplan of the mall, and Wendy saw there were actually three food courts here: the old one in the middle (which seemed a lot larger now), and one at each end of the V's legs. Was eating really that constant in this world?

Before she could question it, Wendy felt her own stomach growl again.

“Hey, before we do any shopping can we grab a snack?”

“What a surprise!” Danica said good-naturedly. “Yeah, let's load up on fuel first.”

Wendy was in the mood for some fried chicken, pleasantly surprised to see an option on the menu for a basket of nothing but chicken skin. Grabbing one of those, a basket of chicken strips, and a bowl of gravy for dipping, she found a table and waited for her friends to get their own food.

As she was digging in Wendy looked around. At the table next to her was a middle-aged mother with a pair of daughters who looked to be 7 or 8. The smaller of the two girls, an almost literal ball of doughy flesh, was moaning.

“MooOOOooom! I want to go to the toy store.”

“We're not going anywhere until you finish your ice cream and cheesecake, young lady. Keep eating.”

In front of the girl was a giant sundae, something Wendy would hesitate to tackle. Sitting next to her, her sister (who had to be at least twice as round as her, though was apparently the same age) was scooping up the last remnants of her own ice cream and cheesecake concoction.

“I'm finished, mom!” She said triumphantly. “Can I have some French fries now? With mustard and ketchup!”

“Of course, baby.” The mother's mood warmed up instantly, and as she got up to buy more food the fatter girl turned to her sister and stuck her tongue out. Clearly the mother's favoritism was well-established, as was the reason for it. When the mother returned it was with a salad bowl of French fries painted red and yellow and a 128-oz shake. The fatter girl dug in greedily.

“That's my little piglet,” the mother said sweetly.

When Wendy's friends came back and started eating Tracey repeated her earlier question

“Where do you want to go first?”
14221111.title: Just head to the mall.

142211111.content:
“I want to hit Express and get some new clothes,” Wendy said, dipping chicken skin in gravy and taking a big bite.

“Why? You just got some new things last month, and you've got a great thing going with your belly hanging out,” Tracey said.

“Yeah, I'm jealous,” Danica added.

“Well...” Wendy stalled, caught off guard by the sudden realization of what should have been obvious: that revealing clothing was the norm for women in this world. But she had already said she wanted new clothes, so she need another reason. “My shirts are getting tight around the arms and boobs. I don't want something uncomfortable, you know.”

The other girls nodded in understanding, and as Wendy went back to eating her attention was brought back to the neighboring table.

“Honestly, Michelle. It shouldn't take you this long to eat a simple sundae.”

“I'm just not hungry, mom.”

“If you don't have energy to eat, you don't have energy to play with new toys, then.”

“I can finish her food, mom!” The fatter sister chirped happily.

“I know you can, piggy,” Again, the abrupt change in tone, this time paired with an affectionate pat on the head. “But your sister needs to learn fat doesn't just magically appear. Beauty and size are things you need to work at and earn, if you're going to have them.”

Groaning, the smaller sister scooped up another massive bite of ice cream. As Wendy and her friends ate their own food, the girl slowly whittled down her snack until all that was left was a melted sludge of ice cream, chocolate syrup and whipped cream.

“OK.” The mother conceded, sounding annoyed it took so long. “We can go.”

And it was time for Wendy and her friends to get going too. Heaving themselves up and letting their swollen bellies lead the way, the trio made their way to Express.

“Hi, welcome to Express,” a cashier said, looking up from hanging a set of skirts. Wendy gaped briefly when she saw the woman: close to 500 pounds, Wendy estimated (actually it was 650; the girl had no frame of reference for sizes this large), she was wearing a mini-skirt that not only didn't cover her bright pink panties, but which seemed designed to draw attention to the fact that they provided no modesty, and a blue top that snuggled around her breasts and did nothing else. The woman's belly, cascading before her to cover her crotch and knees, was bare to the world.

For all the skin she was showing it seemed odd she would work in a clothing store, but as Wendy looked around, still orienting herself to how things worked in the world, she noticed the mannequins and blown-up pictures of models lining the walls. Exhibitionism seemed to be the height of fashion; rather than cover up and emphasize the entire body, shirts, pants, and skirts were designed to frame and accentuate whatever part of a woman's body was the biggest.

For Wendy that was the belly, and as she modeled several tops for her friends she picked up on what they expected her to already know: her belly was her best feature, and she was supposed to let it hang out for all the world to see.

Once she got on the same wavelength as the new world she inhabited, Wendy started to have fun trying out new styles based around the idea that she not only could bare her midriff, but that she should. She got into it, and the realization that not only was she given a world to indulge her penchant for junk food but that her stock among her peers might even go up as she became more gluttonous and bloated.

Could her life get any better? What if...

142211112.content:
"Let's try the game store first, Trace," Wendy responded. For the moment, Wendy was fine with her outfit being tight, even if her panties were peeking out. As for her friends, who were splitting a pizza looking about 2 feet around, Danica's pink t-shirt and jean skirt were riding up a bit with every bite, and Tracey's belly had long since burst the zippers off her red hoodie and miniskirt. Neither of them were overly concerned, however. Even the little girls next to them had very liberal clothes: both wore little blue dresses that barely reached their belly buttons. Wendy noticed the smaller one finally catch up to her sister by finishing her dessert and actually started eating out of her sister's bowl of fries, returning the stuck out tongue.

"Mooom! Michelle's stealing my fries!"

"Michelle, if you wanted your own, just tell me, don't steal Allison's, okay?" Michelle rolled her eyes, but nodded. Allison eventually relented and gave the rest to her sister, looking a bit tired.

"Never mind, Mom, she can have them, I'm full." Michelle finished them off, finally satisfied and looking as round as her sister. The mother sighed and took care of the trash, her daughters bouncing off their seats and slowly rolling off after their mother, heading in the toy store's direction. The trio of older girls looked amused and couldn't help but giggle at the sisters.

When the trio finished, they slowly walked to the game store to pick up Super Sumo Sisters: many of the female video game characters from Nintendo that Wendy recognized were present, and all were quite fat, rolling or bouncing to get around if they wanted just as girls did in this new world. This extended to their respective main series and to others by companies such as Sony or Microsoft, with some females getting their own spinoffs if they didn't already have them. Their wardrobe was similarly altered to those in the real world: one way or another, the girls' bellies were apparently always exposed, and their panties seemed to be as well, which Wendy had to take note of looking at the rest of the female shoppers. Wendy noticed something else that was strange: anything focusing on a male character wasn't altered: they were virtually the same as they were before. Men in the real world didn't change, either, nor did they eat the same food as women. They ate and dressed as they regularly did.

Wendy felt this was a lot to process, but was too excited to have her game to care. After making her purchase, she and her friends left for another store.
142211112.title: Gaming and Gaining

1422111121.content:
The trio made their way to the clothing store, where they roamed around to see some of the latest fashions. One thing that the different styles had in common is that they all specialized in keeping a generous amount of flesh exposed, primarily the belly. Skirts and dresses had become more commonplace, possibly because they were easier to move in, and because panties could be exposed more easily. Underwear was displayed more prominently and clerks would actually recommend different styles depending on the accompanying clothing. Definitely an unusual fashion statement even for Wendy, but little girls seemed to enjoy it greatly.

"This is so weird," she muttered to herself. Far more had changed than Wendy realized, but ultimately, she wasn't particularly concerned. Overall, this new world seemed to be an improvement, with all the extra food and fattening (health wasn't an issue). It also looked more inviting to females in general: the media was at least more equal. "Well, I guess this is my life now." Wendy decided not to question what had happened to change things so drastically and try to enjoy life. She looked around, seeing Tracey find a new short sleeved hoodie and Danica looking at young girls' panties as gifts for her sisters' birthday. Wendy made her way to a section of tube tops and eventually found a blue one matching her skirt, giggling with delight.

After meeting up with her friends, Wendy decided to just take a look at some of the girls shopping around. A group of apparently goth girls popped open their shirts to try on new ones (only girls allowed and could undress at any time in the store). Michelle and Allison, the sisters from the food court, had rolled in and started looking at panties with their mother close behind holding a couple of toys. To Wendy's surprise, her mother had walked in with Crysta bouncing along.

"Wendy!" Crysta came over to hug her big sister, looking quite confused.

"Mom, I thought Crysta still needed until Sunday to go anywhere."

"Well, her fever was gone and she started to roll around more today," Mary told her older daughter. "I figured she's earned a bit of time outside the house." Crysta rolled to the section for younger girls, with Mary following after her. Eventually, Crysta picked out a petticoat skirt and wanted to hang out with Wendy for a bit. Mary accepted, deciding to find some cosmetics. "Just keep your phone handy, sweetie," she told Wendy. "I'll let you know when we should meet up or leave." The younger girls parted ways with Mary and headed off to explore the mall some more.
1422111121.title: Dressing to Show off

choices: The girls stop by an entertainment store before leaving.
The girls are called by Mary and leave the mall.
14221111212.content:
Boys were giving Wendy some appreciative stares and a whistle or two after she changed into her tube top in the boutique. Wendy's face flushed and stayed that way until she caught the overwhelming scent of chocolate. She and her friends and sister soon found themselves in front of Choco-halla, a confectionery specializing as a chocolatier. Machines were set up all around to create the perfect assortments for the customers. A bar was also set up with sweet drinks on sale. Wendy noticed Crysta had quickly rolled into the shop and started guzzling a glass of strawberry milk, as well as the girl working behind the counter.

"Hey, girls, what'll you have?" The girl was one of Wendy's classmates, Ai Oshiro. Ai was once probably the smallest girl Wendy knew but she too had become fat in this new world, going from about 85 lbs. to likely around 300, outweighing even Wendy. She now resembled a sumo wrestler, with a prodigious belly bursting from her pink shirt. Her black skirt did little to cover her cream colored panties, and her hair was tied in a tight topknot. Ironically, she had no interest in Sumo, but she did like American football.

"Whatever's good, Ai," Danica piped up.

"Congrats on the job, Ai!" Tracey shouted after sitting. Ai flushed a bit.

"Thanks, it was a tough process. I'm glad I made it. Oh, and Wendy, your sister's first drink is on me. I heard she was sick."

"Uh, thanks, Ai," Wendy said. She was once again taken aback by the new, fatter Ai, but that was mainly because she was so thin before. Regardless, Wendy joined the girls in taking a break from shopping to take in some coffee and milk. The beverages left them too full for candy, however, but Ai was invited to a sleepover at Wendy's for the next night as they left.
14221111212.title: Choco-halla

142211112121.content:
F.Y.E. was the last stop for the girls before leaving: Mary would pick them up there. As Wendy looked around, she once again saw fatter versions of young actresses and songstresses she knew strewn throughout the store. Not much besides that changed about them: the quality of their work remained the same, something Wendy definitely could appreciate. She spent a few minutes sampling some music and doing some light dancing. Her shaking left her panties exposed for the duration. Tracy poked her during the dancing, laughing a bit.

"Who're you trying to fool, Wendy?" she asked with a grin. "You know you're no good at dancing. Remember my 13th birthday party?" Wendy thought back and recalled when she bumped into her friends while trying to dance to a song. The strange thing about it, however, was that when she remembered, she noticed Tracy and Danica were both fat like her at that party. She knew, or thought she knew, that they had only been fat for this one day. Wendy started to question other things: she thought a bit more, and the memory of more parties came back, but like the first, her friends were fat in each one.

"Hmm...." Wendy then flashed back to last night and what her parents told her, realizing that was the only such memory of her life. Nowhere else did anything like that come up, and Wendy's memory was better than most, meaning last night was indeed a dream. Wendy couldn't believe it, but the world she lived in now was the real deal.

"Earth to Wendy, you feeling alright?" Tracy waved a hand in front of Wendy's face, bringing Wendy back to her senses.

"Yeah, I am now, Tracy." Wendy went back to her dancing, earning questionable looks from Tracy and Danica, who'd joined while holding plushes of Pokémon alongside Crysta. Unlike the older girls, Crysta didn't mind Wendy's dancing and joined her sister, bumping in time to the music. With the song stuck in their heads, the sisters kept bumping after Mary met up with them and all the way to the car. Wendy bumped more to the fact that she was living in a fat female-friendly world now, and she could indulge without worry. What made this day even better: tomorrow was Saturday and she was without homework. Thus, Wendy was free to do whatever.

The sudden change in her mother was unnerving. So, unnerving I fact that Wendy could no longer handle in. She bolted off her stool bacon still in her mouth, sprinted through the hall way crashing out of the house. Her eyes adjusted to realize something had changed drastically.
The roads and every thing man made was the same but the plants, trees and dirt were distinctly different in a strange way. Wendy walked up to a tree and touched its bark. The bark was chocolate, Wendy grabbed a chunk of bark pulling it off the tree trunk. Wendy careful took a bite out of the chuck of bark and then moaned in pleasure it was unbelievable. Wendy went to grab more realizing that the wood underneath the bark was just normal wood but it was seeping out tons of maple syrup even if though was not a maple Tree. Wendy licked the stick syrup off her had.
“Ah, I see you just wanted some fresh food I get it.” Her mother trotted up to some grass taking it off the ground and eating it. “Boy I sure do love sugar candy. Oh, and before you forget I did pack launch for you so once your done eating your all natural meal come in and get it.” Her mother walked back into the house grabbing a flower made of Doritos. Wendy was still confused looking around she saw some of the neighbors out eat the plants and gathering flowers too eat. Most of these people were the same weight but it still freaked out Wendy. “Hey guys you wanna skip school and hit the town,” Wendy asked because she wanted to get used to her new world but secretly.

Wendy knocked on the door to Elaine's house trying not to wake anyone in the rest of the street. As she waited, Wendy heard a loud creaking coming from inside going from the upstairs floor of the house to ground level. 'What's that noise?' Wendy thought to herself and her question was quickly answered as the door swung open to reveal Elaine.

Elaine was always the skinniest of the two ever since they were kids. While Wendy loved watching movies and reading comics, Elaine loved dancing and playing Basketball. This helped Elaine always be one of the skinniest girls in their school, even getting jealous looks from some of the cheerleaders.

That was not the Elaine that greeted Wendy. This Elaine looked like she hadn't exercised a day in her life and was around 430lbs by Wendy's guess. Her face once slim and angular was now soft and round. Her arms looked like logs and her thighs were the same. Her clothes clung tightly to her giant body with a large part of her belly poking out of the space between her vest and her panties.

"Oh, hey Wendy." Elaine said yawning and rubbing one of her eyes. "Here for another nighttime feasts. Come on in." She stepped aside to allow Wendy to walk in."

Wendy walks in a bit weirded out by her friend's new size. After grabbing a giant tub of ice cream, Wendy sits down on Elaine's seemingly wider couch. Elaine sits down next to her taking up twice the room Wendy does and starts eating some ice cream and washing it down with a large bowl of melted chocolate.

Wendy looked around at Elaine's living room. None of Elaine's dance mats or basketballs were anywhere to be found and in family photos Elaine always looked incredibly fat. "Umm.. Elaine, where did you put your dance mats?" Wendy asked as Elaine licked chocolate from around her lips.

"My what?" She replied puzzled.

"Your dance mats. You're the best dancer in the school."

Elaine laughed at that. "Haha, that's funny. I've never owned any dancing stuff. Who'd want to waste time moving when I could be eating and watching movies?"

"Yeah... I guess you're right." Wendy said a bit weirded out by these events. "Am I dreaming?" She asked herself aloud.

"I hope not. This chocolate is too good to be a dream." Elaine said chugging down some more.

info.brief_description: Wendy wakes up to a world were there is only junk food.
info.description:
A 15 year old girl named Wendy loves to eat junk food, but when her parents put a stop to her unhealthy eating, Wendy gets angry. She wishes that she lived in a world where every food was junk food. When she wakes up, she comes to find that her wish came true. Could this be the best thing ever? Or will the junk food make a BIG problem?
